— Rwanda Revenue Authority (@rrainfo) March 25, 2020

Title: Banki zasabwe gufunga amwe mu mashami yazo mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya COVID-19
Body:
Ihuriro ry’Amabanki mu Rwanda (RBA) ryasabye banki zose gufunga amashami yazo mu gihugu ariko zibanda ku yo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hagamijwe gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Ihuriro ry’Amabanki mu Rwanda (RBA) ryasabye banki zose gufunga amashami yazo mu gihugu ariko zibanda ku yo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hagamijwe gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Mu itangazo ryo ku mugoroba wo ku wa 24 Werurwe 2020, RBA yagaragaje ko iki cyemezo cyafashwe bijyanye n’ingamba zashyizweho zo guhangana n’ubwiyongere bwa COVID-19.
Kuva umurwayi wa mbere yaboneka mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, abagera kuri 40 ni bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye iki cyorezo cyibasiye Isi.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RBA, Robin Bairstow, rivuga ko “RBA yasabye amabanki gufunga by’agateganyo amwe mu mashami yayo by’umwihariko ayo mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu kugabanya ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 no gushyigikira ingamba zashyizweho na leta zo gukuraho ingendo zitari ngombwa mu gihugu.’’
RBA yijeje gukomeza kugenzura uko ikibazo kimeze, kumenyesha abanyamuryango, abakozi, abakiliya n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa amakuru agezweho kuri COVID-19.
Mu butumwa bwa RBA igira iti “Buri banki izamenyesha abakiliya bayo binyuze mu buryo isanzwe ibikoramo uko bazakomeza kubona serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga.”
Leta y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba zo guhangana n’ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 zirimo gufunga ibigo by’amashuri na kaminuza, insengero no guhagarika ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yasabye abaturarwanda gukomeza kwitwararika no gukurikiza ingamba zashyizweho na Leta zijyanye no kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 zirimo guhagarika ubucuruzi bw’ibikorwa bitari iby’ibanze, guhagarika ingendo zihuza imijyi n’uturere n’izindi zitari ngombwa no kuva mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa.
Abantu bose bageze mu Rwanda mu byumweru bibiri bishize basabwa kwishyira mu kato mu gihe cy’iminsi 14 guhera igihe bagereye mu Rwanda ndetse no gukurikiza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima yo gukaraba intoki kenshi kandi neza no kubahiriza intera ya metero imwe hagati y’abantu.
Ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 saa 23:59, nibwo Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, yasohoye amabwiriza avuga ko ingendo zitari ngombwa zihagaritswe, abantu basabwa guhagarika gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa, uretse abatanga n’abashaka serivisi z’ingenzi zirimo kwivuza, guhaha, iza banki n’izindi.
Serivisi za banki zari zimaze iminsi itatu zikoreshwa ariko hibandwa ku kwinjiza abakiliya bazo mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga haba mu kubitsa no kubikuza amafaranga.
Ku wa 18 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yanzuye kwemerera amabanki gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo kugira ngo azorohereze abayabereyemo imyenda mu gihe cyo kwishyura, yanakuyeho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga ku bigo by’itumanaho mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Mu gushishikariza abantu kwishyurana no kohererezanya amafaranga batayahererekanyije mu ntoki bishobora gukwirakwiza Coronavirus, BNR yemeje ko mu mezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki.
BNR yatangaje ko izakomeza gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’izo ngamba no gukomeza gusesengura ingaruka za Coronavirus kandi yiteguye kuba yafata izindi ngamba zikwiye.

Title: MINAGRI yasabye abahinzi n’aborozi kongera ingufu mu bikorwa byabo, birinda coronavirus
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (MINAGRI) yatangaje ko ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, gusarura, kugura, gutunganya umusaruro no kuwugeza ku isoko bigomba gukomeza, isaba inzego z’ibanze gukoresha indangururamajwi n’ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka abahinzi bakamenya ko bagomba guhinga ubuso bwose buhingwa.
Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (MINAGRI) yatangaje ko ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, gusarura, kugura, gutunganya umusaruro no kuwugeza ku isoko bigomba gukomeza, isaba inzego z’ibanze gukoresha indangururamajwi n’ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka abahinzi bakamenya ko bagomba guhinga ubuso bwose buhingwa.
Itangazo MINAGRI yashyize hanze ku itariki 23 Werurwe 2020 rigaragaza ko ibikorwa by’umuhinzi n’ubworozi bigomba gukomeza kugira ngo hatazagira ikibazo cy’ibiribwa kibaho bikubitiyeho n’ibihe bikomeye byo kwirinda coronavirus.
Iyo Minisiteri itangaza ko serivisi zo kubona imiti n’ibiribwa by’amatungo, inyongeramusaruro, kugura no gukusanya umusaruro w’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, iyamamaza buhinzi n’ubworozi n’inganda zitunganya ibiribwa bitagomba guhagarara.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Minisitiri Dr. Geraldine Mukeshimana rivuga ko Farumasi z’imiti y’amatungo zirakomeza gukora, isaba abayicuruza bakeneye kujya kuyirangura i Kigali kubisabira uruhushya rubigaragara ku Mirenge bakoreramo.
Inganda zisanzwe zemerewe gukora ibiryo by’amatungo zasabwe gushyiraho gahunda y’abakozi bake mu buryo bikomeza gukorwa bikagezwa ku maguriro ari hirya no hino mu Turere aho aborozi bakomeza kubigura.
Inganda zikeneye kugura ibikenerwa mu gukora ibiryo by’imvange by’amatungo i Kigali zibisabira uruhushya rw’inzira ku buyobozi bw’Akarere zikoreramo.
Ni mu gihe kandi ku bijyanye n’inyongeramusaruro aho zicururizwa hose hakomeza gukora mu rwego rwo kugeza imbuto z’indobanure n’ifumbire ku bahinzi hagamijwe kongera umusaruro.
Mu gucuruza no kugura inyongeramusaruro abantu bagomba gukomeza amabwiriza yo kwirinda. Umucuruzi asabwa kuba yambaye agapfukamunwa n’uturinda ntoki, abaguzi bakinjira umwe umwe kandi bakazirikana intera nibura ye metero imwe hagati yabo.
Abacuruzi b’inyongeramusaruro bakeneye kujya kurangura ku bubiko buri hafi yabo basabwa gukorana n’ubuyobozi bw’Imirenge baherereyemo kugira ngo bahabwe uburenganzira bwo kujyayo.
Amakamyo atwara inyongeramusaruro n’imodoka zitwara umwuka ubika intanga byemerewe gukomeza ingendo ariko ntizitware abantu barenze babiri. Ibyo bigakorwa no ku zijyanye ibyatunganyijwe ku isoko.
Muri iryo tangazo MINAGRI yasabwe gukangurira abahinzi guhinga ubuso bwose.
Yagize iti “ Hakoreshejwe indangururamajwi n’ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka harimo n’ubw’ikoranabuhanga mu Midugudu no mu Tugari, abakozi bashinzwe ubuhinzi ku nzego zose barasabwa gukomeza gufasha abahinzi babagezaho amakuru yose bakenera, babashishikariza guhinga ubuso bwose kandi neza hakoreshwa inyongeramusaruro ariko banabagezaho ubutumwa bwo kwirinda coronavirus.”
Inganda nini, ibigo na Koperative bifite imirima minini cyane cyane abafite inganda z’ icyayi, isukari, amata, umuceri, ikawa n’amafu zasabwe gusigarana abakozi bake ariko batuma imirimo ikomeza. Abari mu bikorwa byo gusarura no gutubura imbuto nabo basabwe gukorana n’imirenge kuburyo bahabwa ibyangombwa bibemerera gukomeza iyo mirimo.

Title: Airtel yijeje abakiliya bayo gukomeza kunoza serivisi zibafasha kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya Airtel Rwanda yatangaje ko yiteguye gukomeza gufasha abakiliya bayo kugerwaho na serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga zigamije kwimakaza uburyo bwo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gihangayikishije Isi.
Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya Airtel Rwanda yatangaje ko yiteguye gukomeza gufasha abakiliya bayo kugerwaho na serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga zigamije kwimakaza uburyo bwo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gihangayikishije Isi.
Ubuyobozi bwa Airtel buvuga ko buzirikana ibihe bigoranye igihugu kiri kunyuramo n’ingaruka biri kugira ku buzima busanzwe bw’abakiliya n’abakozi bayo nyuma y’ingamba zafashwe zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bitandukanye mu gihugu kubera Coronavirus.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Airtel mu Rwanda, Amit Chawla, yavuze ko biteguye gukora igishoboka cyose bagahangana n’imbogamizi abakiliya babo bashobora guhura na zo mu bihe by’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Yagize ati “Mu rwego rwo gushyira mu bikorwa amabwiriza yatanzwe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe na RURA ku ngamba nshya zigamije guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo mu Rwanda, twiyemeje gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zose zidufasha kugikumira ku bakiliya bacu.”
Chawla yakomeje avuga ko ibiro bya Airtel bitanga serivisi zayo zose bizajya biba bifunguye guhera saa 08:00 za mu gitondo kugeza saa 15:00 z’igicamunsi.
Yasabye abakiliya ba Airtel kwimenyereza gukoresha imiyoboro ibafasha kubona ibyo bakeneye bitabasabye kwifashisha undi muntu nka serivisi ya Airtel Money, kugura ama-inite na internet, kuko ari inyungu za buri ruhande kuba ibikenewe byose bibasha kuboneka muri telefoni y’umukiliya.
Airtel ivuga ko abacuruzi bayo ba Airtel Money bakomeje gukora nk’ibisanzwe, batanga serivisi zose z’ingenzi. Iyi sosiyete yijeje abakiliya ko abo bacuruzi bazakomeza kwita ku isuku y’intoki kandi bubahiriza intera ya metero imwe hagati ya bo mu gihe babaha serivisi.
Abakiliya ba Airtel bazakomeza guhabwa serivisi za Airtel Money no kwishyurana mu buryo butandukanye ku mashami ari hirya no hino hubahirizwa ingamba z’isuku nk’uko zagenwe.
Iyi sosiyete yongeye kwibutsa ko inyandiko zose z’abafatanyabikorwa bayo n’abakiliya bose zigomba koherezwa kuri email ya [[email protected]] kuko nta nyandiko zifatika zemewe muri iki gihe cyo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Airtel iri muri sosiyete zikomeye mu zitanga serivisi z’itumanaho mu gihugu igendera ku ihame ryo kwibanda cyane cyane ku kubungabunga umutekano n’imibereho myiza y’abakozi n’abakiliya bayo hashyirwaho uburyo butuma ibikorwa bidahungabana.

Title: BPR Atlas Mara yakuyeho ikiguzi kuri zimwe muri serivisi, isaba abayigana kwimakaza ikoranabuhanga
Body:
Tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yafashe ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga ku bigo by’itumanaho mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yafashe ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga ku bigo by’itumanaho mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Mu rwego rwo gushishikariza abantu kwishyurana no kohererezanya amafaranga batayahererekanyije mu ntoki bishobora gukwirakwiza Coronavirus, BNR yemeje ko mu gihe cy’amezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki.
Izi ngamba zafashwe mu gihe abarwayi bamaze kubonekaho Coronavirus mu Rwanda bageze kuri 19 , ariko bakaba barahuye n’abandi bantu basaga 680.
BPR Atlas Mara nka Banki y’Abaturage yatangiye gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro igamije gufasha abakiliya n’abakozi kurushaho kwirinda Coronavirus ihangayikishije u Rwanda n’Isi muri rusange.
Iyi banki yiyemeje gukuraho ikiguzi cya zimwe muri serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga mu gihe cy’iminsi 90.
Rigira riti “Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umukiliya wese wohereza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya BPR ajya ku yindi konti ya BPR hakoreshejwe mobile banking na internet banking.’’
“Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umukiliya wese wohereza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya BPR ajya ku yo mu yindi banki hakoreshejwe mobile banking na internet banking. Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umukiliya wese wohereza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya BPR ajya kuri konti ya Mobile Money (haba kuri Airtel na MTN).’’
Mu kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yo guhangana n’ikwirakwizwa rya Coronavirus, BPR Atlas Mara, yashyizeho amabwiriza agamije gufasha abakiliya n’abakozi kurushaho kwirinda.
Muri yo harimo gusaba abakiliya gukoresha konti bifashishije telefoni igendanwa (Mobile Banking), ukoresha iyi serivisi akanda *150# agakurikiza amabwiriza cyangwa se agakoresha “BPR Mobile Banking App” iboneka muri “playstore cyangwa Appstore” muri telefoni.
Ikomeza iti “Serivisi za banki zishobora kandi gukoreshwa hifashishijwe interineti “Internet Banking”. Igihe waba utarayindikisha kugira ngo ubashe gukoresha konti yawe ukoresheje telefoni igendanwa (Mobile Banking ) cyangwa internet (internet banking), urashishikarizwa kwegera Ishami rikwegereye kugira ngo bagufashe.’’
Abakiliya ba BPR Atlas Mara banasabwe gukoresha ikarita yo kubikuza mu kwishyura ibyo bakeneye byose ahantu hatandukanye bakira ayo makarita ndetse no kwifashisha ikarita zo kubikuza mu gihe bashaka serivisi za banki kuri agent (BPR Hafi).
BPR Atlas Mara yashishikarije abakiliya n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa kwishyura no kohererezanya amafaranga hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga bashyiriweho kugira ngo bagabanye ikwirakwizwa ry’ubwandu bwa COVID-19 ryaturuka ku gukora ku mafaranga n’intoki.
Iyi banki yashyizeho umurongo wa 1500, ushobora kwifashishwa ku muntu ukeneye ibindi bisobanuro.
Usibye serivisi abakiliya bashobora kubona bakoresheje BPR Mobile Banking cyangwa ku mashami ya BPR Atlas Mara ari hirya no hino mu gihugu, inafite abayihagarariye basaga 310, basanzwe bafasha abakiliya kubona serivisi z’imari bitabagoye.
BPR Atlas Mara ikorera mu gihugu cyose aho ifite amashami 186. Mu 2018 yagaragazaga ko yabonye inyungu ingana na miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Title: Umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu wiyongereye ku kigero cya 9.4% mu 2019
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare, NISR, cyatangaje ko mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu (GDP) wiyongereye ku rugero rwa 9.4 %, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare, NISR, cyatangaje ko mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu (GDP) wiyongereye ku rugero rwa 9.4 %, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Mu mibare yatangajwe kuri uyu wa Mbere, NISR yerekana ko mu mwaka ushize umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wagize uruhare rwa 24% mu musaruro mbumbe, inganda zigira uruhare rwa 18%, Serivisi 49% mu gihe ibindi bisigaye byagize uruhare ku kigero cya 9%.
Ubukungu bw’u Rwanda bwazamutse 9.4% mu gihe byari biteganyijwe ko buzazamuka 7.8% mu 2019.
Umuyobozi wa NISR, Yusuf Murangwa avuga ko ‘uyu mwaka wagenze neza kuruta uko byari byitezwe’.
Ati “Turabona ibijyanye no kubaka byaragenze neza cyane, ubuhinzi nabwo ntabwo bwakoze nabi 5% nubwo haba hifuzwa ko biba byiza kurushaho, na serivisi byagenze neza, ubucuruzi umwaka ushize bwagenze neza, ibijyanye n’ingendo cyane cyane iy’indege yazamutse neza”.
Murangwa avuga ko iyo ubukungu buzamutse cyane kuriya bivuze ko hafi ya byose byagenze neza kuko ‘ntabwo ubukungu bwazamuka kuriya bitewe n’ibintu bike’.
Umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 5%, uw’inganda uzamuka ku rugero rwa 16% naho uwa serivisi uzamuka ku rugero rwa 8%.
Ibihingwa ngandurarugo byiyongereye ku kigero cya 4%, ibihingwa byoherezwa mu mahanga byiyongera 5% bitewe n’ikawa yiyongereye ku kigero cya 7% n’icyayi cyazamutse ku kigero cya 3%.
Izamuka ry’umusaruro w’inganda ryatewe ahanini n’ubwubatsi bwazamutseho 33% n’inganda zitunganya ibintu bitandukanye zazamutseho 11%. Mu bijyanye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, umusaruro wa gasegereti wagabanyutse 23.7% naho uwa Wolfram ugabanyuka 6.6% mu ngano yoherejwe mu mahanga mu gihe uwa Coltan wiyongereyeho 42%.
Ubwiyongere bw’umusaruro wa serivisi bwatewe n’ubucuruzi budandaza n’ubugurisha ibintu icyarimwe bw’ibyakorewe mu Rwanda bwiyongereyeho 16%, ubwikorezi bwazamutse ku kigero cya 12% ahanini bitewe n’ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bwazamutse ku kigero cya 17%.
Serivisi z’imari zazamutse ku kigero cya 8% naho serivisi za hoteli na za restaurant zizamuka ku gipimo cya 10%.
Biteganyijwe kandi ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buzazamuka 8.1% mu 2020 na 8.2% mu 2021, bitewe n’ubuhinzi kubera ingamba mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga no kuhira.

Title: Minicom yijeje ko ibiribwa bitazabura ku isoko ry’u Rwanda mu gihe ruhanganye na coronavirus
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom) yasabye abaguzi n’abacuruzi kubahiriza amabwiriza y’ibiciro n’ingano y’ibihahwa umuntu yemerewe guhaha, yizeza ko ibiribwa bitazabura ku isoko kuko aho biva hafunguye.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom) yasabye abaguzi n’abacuruzi kubahiriza amabwiriza y’ibiciro n’ingano y’ibihahwa umuntu yemerewe guhaha, yizeza ko ibiribwa bitazabura ku isoko kuko aho biva hafunguye.
Kuwa 16 Werurwe 2020 nibwo MINICOM yasohoye itangazo risobanura ko hari abacuruzi bamwe bitwaje ko igihugu kirimo guhangana na Coronavirus bakuriza ibiciro, ibihanangiriza ko bitemewe kandi ko uzabifatirwamo azahanwa.
Hari abarenze ku mabiriza ndetse mu bugenzuzi bwo kureba uko byubahirizwa abarenga 54 barafashwe barahanwa bose hamwe baciwe Miliyoni enye n’ibihumbi 380 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Kuri iki cyumweru tariki 22 Werurwe 2020 iyo Minisiteri yasohoye irindi tangazo noneho ryerekana ibiciro byo kuranguriraho, iby’ikilo kimwe n’ingano y’ibyo umuguzi yemerewe guhaha.
Mu kiganiro ishusho y’umunsi cy’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Itangazamakuru, RBA, kivuga ku bucuruzi muri iyi minsi u Rwanda ruhanganye na Coronavirus, Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda Soraya Hakuziyaremye yavuze ko hafashwe ingamba zo gushyiraho ibiciro kugira ngo abacuruzi boye kubizamura uko bishakiye bitwaje coronavirus.
Yavuze ko ibyo babikoze nyuma y’uko kuva u Rwanda rwatangaza umuntu wa mbere wagaragayeho coronavirus, hari abikanze izamuka ry’ibiciro ku isoko bagahaha n’ibidakenewe bakeka ko amasoko agiye gufunga.
Yavuze ko ahanini mbere byari bigamije kwibutsa ibiciro ku bicuruzwa by’ibanze kugira ngo abacuruzi bamwe badakomeza kongera ibiciro bitwaje icyorezo naho ubu bakaba babikoze kugira ngo hirindwe ko ibiribwa byabura ku isoko kandi byikubiwe n’abantu bamwe.
Hari abacuruzi kandi bari batangiye gushyira ibicuruzwa mu bubiko ngo bategereze ko ibiciro bizamuka ngo bazabone kubicuruza. Uwo mwanzuro bawufashe babanje kugenzura ibyo abacuruzi bafite mu bubiko kugira ngo n’ubundi batabika ibicuruzwa.
Ati “Mu igenzura twakoze twabonye uko Minisante itanga amabwiriza hari ababigiriyemo impungenge bakagura ibintu bidakenewe, iyo abantu bagura ibintu byinshi hari abavuga bati reka mbe mbihishe kugira ngo igiciro kizamuke.”
Uwimana Marie utuye Mbugangari mu Karere ka Rubavu yavuze ko hari abacuruzi babyutse bakura ibiciruzwa muri za butike bajya kubibika ndetse bongera ibiciro nk’aho yavuzi ko ijerekani y’amavuta yaguraga Frw 26000 bakayashyira kuri Frw 27 500.
Ati “Bazindutse mu museke bakura ibintu muri butike bashyira mu bubiko bazamura ibiciro, umuceri, amavuta ibintu byose.”
Minisitiri Soraya yavuze ko ntawe ukwiriye kugira impungenge ko mu byumweru bibiri ibiribwa byashira ku isoko. Hari ukuba byinshi mu byo abanyarwanda bakeneye bikomoka imbere mu gihugu, hakaba no kuba aho u Rwanda rukura ibyinjira imiryango ifunguye.
Yatanze urugero rwo muri Kenya, ati “Uwinjiye muri icyo gihugu ajya kuzana ibicuruzwa Mombasa arakurikiranwa muri hoteli arimo ntagire ahandi ajya.’Uretse icyo yibukije ko indege zizana imiti n’ibiribwa nazo zikomeza kuza.
Ati “Ibiribwa byinshi dukeneye hano mu Rwanda ni ibiva mu buhinzi dufite n’ibindi biva mu mahanga n’aho ingendo z’indege zahagaritswe ni ingendo z’indege zitwara abantu iz’imizigo zirakomeza kuza mu Rwanda. Amakamyo nayo avana ibintu hanze biva ku cyambu cya Mombasa, Dar es Salaam arakomeza kuza.”
“ Ibintu byavaga mu Bushinwa mu byumweru bishize ntibyashoboraga gufungura ariko ubu bongeye gufungura biraza. Ku byerekeranye n’ibicuruzwa haragenda habaho gutinda ariko turagenda tubyigaho n’abikorera kugira ngo hatagira ikibura mu gihugu.”
Mu bijyanye no gusubika imirimo no kwikanga ko ibiribwa byaba bike, Minisitiri Hakuziyaremye yavuze ko bazareba uko abakozi bakora mu nganda zitunganya ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bakomeza imirimo harebwa ubwirinzi bwabo kuburyo bake bashobora gukomeza imirimo.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu (Minaloc) ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage, Nyirarukundo Ignatienne yavuze ko mu cyaro imirimo y’ubuhinzi ikomeje bityo ko impungenge z’ibura ry’ibiribwa zidakwiriye.
Yavuze ko mu kugenzura uko icyorezo cyifashe bari gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu cyaro bavugana n’inzego z’ibanze niba nta kibazo gihari.
Minisitiri Nyirarukundo yavuze ko abantu basabwa ubufatanye bwo kwita ku ngamba zashyizweho. Ku bijyanye no guhaha abantu ngo bagomba kujya ku mirongo isiga metero imwe hagati y’umuntu n’undi hanyuma umaze guhaha agasohoka undi akinjira bityo bityo.

Title: Coronavirus yajegeje Isi! Menya serivisi z’ibanze wabonera kuri internet utavuye mu rugo
Body:
Coronavirus imaze gufata intera ikomeye ndetse abantu benshi bakangaranyijwe n’ingaruka z’iki cyorezo ku buzima bwabo bw’ahazaza.
Coronavirus imaze gufata intera ikomeye ndetse abantu benshi bakangaranyijwe n’ingaruka z’iki cyorezo ku buzima bwabo bw’ahazaza.
Icyorezo cya COVID-19, gituruka kuri Coronavirus cyatangiriye mu Bushinwa mu mu Ukuboza 2019. Kuva icyo gihe cyatangiye gukwirakwira mu mpande zose z’Isi, aho kuri ubu abasaga 310 000 bayanduye, yahitanye 13 556 mu gihe abasaga ibihumbi 95 bayikize.
Mu Rwanda, hamaze kuboneka abarwayi 17 ba COVID-19 kuva kuwa 14 Werurwe 2020 ubwo uwa mbere yatahurwaga. Abo barwayi bahuye n’abantu basaga 688 kuva bagera mu gihugu.
Mu kwirinda ko ubu bwandu bwakomeza gukwirakwira kuva mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatandatu saa 23:59, hashyizweho ingamba zigomba gukurikizwa zirimo guhagarika ingendo zitari ngombwa, abantu bakaguma mu ngo.
Itangazo rya Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, rivuga ko ‘‘Gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa birabujijwe, keretse abajya gutanga no gushaka serivisi z’ingenzi harimo kwivuza, guhaha, serivizi za banki n’izindi.’’
Abaturarwanda basabwe kwishyurana hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga ahashoboka hose kurusha kujya muri za banki na za ATM.
Muri serivisi z’ingenzi zizakomeza gukora harimo izijyanye no guhaha no gushaka imiti biri no mu bihangayikishije abatari bake. Inama zafasha abantu kwirinda kwandura cyangwa kwanduza abandi harimo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu guhaha cyangwa gutumiza ifunguro.
Icyorezo cya COVID-19 kimaze kwigisha Isi imibereho ishingiye ku ikoranabuhanga aho buri kimwe cyose kuva ku gutuma ibicuruzwa no kubyishyura rikoreshwa.
Mu Rwanda by’umwihariko hari serivisi zikenewe zijyanye no guhaha ziri gutangirwa kuri internet kandi zakwifashishwa na benshi.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Ikoranabuhanga, DMM HEHE Ltd, Iribagiza Clarisse, yatangaje abinyujije kuri Twitter ko guhahira kuri internet bifasha mu kurinda ubuzima.
Yagize ati ‘‘Mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, HeHe iri gukorana n’ibigo by’ishoramari by’imbere mu gihugu, ushobora guhahiramo ndetse ibicuruzwa ukabigerezwa mu rugo mu kwirinda kugera ahantu hari abantu benshi.’’
Mu gutanga izi serivisi, Hehe yafatanyije n’amaguriro, farumasi, amaduka acuruza imyambaro n’inkweto, ibitabo, telefoni n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, ibikoresho n’imitako byo mu rugo ndetse n’iby’abana.
Ubusanzwe mu kwishyura ibi bicuruzwa hakoreshwaga uburyo butandukanye burimo gutanga amafaranga mu ntoki [butari gukoreshwa], Airtel & MTN Money ndetse no gukoresha amakarita ya VISA & MasterCard.
Ku mbuga zisanzwe zitangirwaho serivisi zo kuri internet hariho amabwiriza afasha abazisura kubona uko batumiza ibicuruzwa bakeneye, bakabigerezwa aho batuye, kandi ku giciro kiboneye.

Muri ibi bigo by’ubucuruzi hiyongeramo Vuba Vuba, itanga serivisi zo kugeza ibintu bitandukanye byiganjemo ibinyobwa n’amafunguro ku babikeneye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Ikorana na restaurent 50 mu Mujyi wa Kigali hose; bihesha amahirwe abatumiza amafunguro bayifashishije guhitamo ibyo bakeneye byose kandi biboroheye. Uyifashisha asabwa kugira ‘application’ ya Vuba Vuba imuhesha amahirwe yo kubona restaurents zamufasha guhitamo ibyo ashaka.
Uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwashyizweho ni amahirwe yabyazwa umusaruro mu kwirinda no gukumira icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyugarije Isi.
Mu Rwanda ubucuruzi bwo kuri internet bumaze imyaka hafi irindwi ariko buracyagaragaramo icyuho kuko butaritabirwa na benshi.
Mu 2017, imibare y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Bucuruzi n’Iterambere (UNCTAD) yo mu bihugu 152 ku Isi yagaragaje ko kuri internet hahererekanyijwe tiliyari $3.9, inyongera ya 22% ugereranyije n’umwaka wari wabanje.

Title: Amahoteli mu Rwanda ari kubara miliyari z’ibihombo kubera COVID-19
Body:
Urwego rw’amahoteli yo mu Rwanda ruratangaza igihombo cy’asaga miliyari 13 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda kuva muri Gashyantare 2020 kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Urwego rw’amahoteli yo mu Rwanda ruratangaza igihombo cy’asaga miliyari 13 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda kuva muri Gashyantare 2020 kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’amahoteli mu Rwanda, Barakabuye Nsengiyumva, kuwa Gatanu tariki 20 Werurwe 2020 yabwiye itangazamakuru ko amwe mu mahoteli yahagaritse abakozi mu rwego rwo kugabanya ibihombo no kwishyura imishahara itishyuye kuri abo bahagaritswe.
Ati “Aho bigeze bamwe mu banyamuryango bacu bavuze ko bamaze kubara igihombo cya miliyari 13 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda uyabariye hamwe. Turacyategereje raporo ziva mu yandi mahoteli ariko imibare ikomeje kuzamuka.”
Yavuze ko bari kuganira na Guverinoma ngo irebe uko yagoboka amahoteli kugira ngo ave muri ibi bihe bitayoroheye cyane ku bijyanye n’imisoro.
Ati “ Banku Nkuru y’u Rwanda yatangaje ibijyanye no kuvugurura amasezerano ku bijyanye n’inguzanyo za banki ariko ntabwo turatangira kubiganiraho mu buryo bwagutse. Dufite n’ikibazo cy’imisoro kubera ko nta mafaranga kubera kubura abakiliya.”
Nsengiyumva yavuze ko bakeneye ibiganiro na Guverinoma bigamije kubemerera kugabanya bimwe mu biciro byashyizweho kugira ngo bagumane bamwe mu bakozi.
Mu Rwanda hari amahoteli, amacumbi n’ahandi hakira abantu hagera ku 7,000 hatangaga akazi ku bantu barenga 84,000. Ni mu gihe urwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteri muri rusange bifite imirimo ibarirwa ku bihumbi 142,000.
Nsengiyumva yavuze ko kubera ihagarikwa ry’ingendo z’indege zitwara abantu n’inama u Rwanda rwagombaga kwakira, urwo rwego rwatakaje imirimo myinshi kubera coronavirus.
Ihagarikwa ry’abakozi
Kuwa Gatanu mu gitondo, nibura abakozi batandatu bakiriye bo muri Kigali Diplomat Hotel amabaruwa abahagarika ku kazi by’agateganyo.
Ibaruwa yashyizweho umukono n’umuyobozi w’iyo hoteli, Alphonse Semugaza igira iti “Kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus cyakoze ku bikorwa byose, tubandikiye tubamenyesha ko tubahagaritse ku kazi mu gihe kitazwi guhera tariki 20 Werurwe 2020 ibintu nibisubira mu buryo tuzongera tuguhamagare.”
Umwe mu bakiriye iyo baruwa yavuze ko atazi uburyo arabaho mu minsi iri imbere kubera ko ako kazi ariko kamwinjirizaga.
Ati “Nakoraga kuri iriya hoteli mu myaka irenga itanu ishize, ubu ntabwo nzi uko biraza kugenda. Ndasaba ko sosiyete zafata amafaranga zazigamye zikatwishyuraho make ndetse agakomeza kutwishyurira ubwishingizi mu gihe tugitegereje gusubira ku mirimo.”
Ingingo ya 21 y’itegeko rigenga umurimo mu Rwanda ivuga ku isubikwa ry’amasezerano y’umurimo kubera impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa iza tekiniki, igaragaza ko mu gihe habayeho isubikwa ry’amasezerano y’umurimo mu gihe gito kubera impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa iza tekiniki, umukozi “adashobora gushyirwa mu gihe cyo kudakora ku mpamvu z’imirimo mike inshuro imwe cyangwa nyinshi mu gihe kirenze iminsi mirongo cyenda mu mwaka umwe.”
Ikomeza ivuga ko “Iyo igihe kivugwa mu gika cya mbere cy’iyi ngingo kirenze, bifatwa nk’aho umukozi yasezerewe agahabwa impererekeza ziteganywa n’iri tegeko. Umukoresha, nyuma yo kubigaragariza abahagarariye abakozi mu kigo, ashobora gusezerera umukozi umwe cyangwa benshi bitewe no guhuza imirimo isa, kuvanaho cyangwa kuvugurura imikorere y’ikigo kubera impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa guhindura ikoranabuhanga ryakoreshwaga hagamijwe kugira ngo ikigo kirusheho guhigana kandi akabimenyesha mu nyandiko umugenzuzi w’umurimo ubifitiye ububasha.”
Ingingo ya 22 iviga ku burenganzira bwo gusubizwa mu kazi. Ivuga ko umukozi usezerewe ku kazi kubera impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa iza tekiniki, kandi akaba atarengeje amezi atandatu uhereye igihe yasezerewe, afite uburenganzira bwo gusubizwa mu kazi adakoze ipiganwa iyo yujuje ibisabwa ku mwanya umukoresha akeneyeho umukozi.

Title: Abacuruza Mobile Money bijejwe ko nta gihombo bazaterwa n’ivanwaho ry’ikiguzi cyo kohereza amafaranga
Body:
Abacuruza Mobile Money bijejwe ko nta gihombo bazaterwa n’ibyemezo bya Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) byo guteza imbere guhererekanya amafaranga no kwishyurana hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kurwanya coronavirus, kuko amafaranga bishyurwa ku muntu babikirije (komisiyo) atakuweho kandi n’uzakenera kubikuza bakazajya bamukata nk’uko bisanzwe.
Abacuruza Mobile Money bijejwe ko nta gihombo bazaterwa n’ibyemezo bya Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) byo guteza imbere guhererekanya amafaranga no kwishyurana hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kurwanya coronavirus, kuko amafaranga bishyurwa ku muntu babikirije (komisiyo) atakuweho kandi n’uzakenera kubikuza bakazajya bamukata nk’uko bisanzwe.
Mu gihe bamwe bishimira icyemezo cya BNR cyo gukurirwaho amafaranga bakatwaga baherekenya amafaranga bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga, abacuruzi ba Mobile Money batangiye kugaragaza ko bazabihomberamo kubera bungukiraga ku mafaranga bakata abohererezanya amafaranga.
Rutagengwa Arthur ushinzwe imikorere ya Mobile Money muri Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda, yabwiye Radiyo Rwanda ko abo bacuruzi (agents) ntacyo bazahomba kuko amafaranga bagenerwa ku muntu babikilije atakuweho.
Ati “Iyo umukiliya aje avuga ngo ndashaka kubitsa, uwo mukiliya amuha 1000 Frw n’umu-agent akamuha amafaranga 1000 kuri telefoni ye ariko iyo amufashije muri ubwo buryo tumuha komisiyo, izo komisiyo ntabwo zavuyeho urumva ko ntacyo yahombye aracyafasha abakiliya kugira ngo amafaranga yinjire kuri telefoni zabo.”
Abacuruzi ba Mobile Money baganiriye na Radiyo Rwanda bavuze ko bizatuma, bakoresha ku gishoro bahabwa kuko ayo bakataga yabafashaga mu mibereho yabo.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari uwahishuye ko nubundi koherereza umuntu amafaranga bitari byemewe ahubwo babikoraga kugira ngo babone ayo kubabeshaho mu gihe bategereje iyo Komisiyo.
Yagize ati “Kuri twebwe hari amafaranga twacaga umukiliya yo kohereza no kubikura, ubundi batubwira ngo koherereza umukiliya ntabwo byemewe ariko hari igihe umuntu aza akambwira ati jye nyoherereza ukamwoherereza wenda nawe ayo 250 Frw cyangwa ayo 200 Frw akakugirira akamaro mu gihe wicaye hano utegereje ko ukwezi kwashira ngo ugire icyo ubona.”
BNR itangaza ko ikigamijwe ari ukugira ngo abantu bahane serivisi, baherekanye amafaranga kandi bishyurane bitabasabye guhererekanya amafaranga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Guverineri wa BNR, John Rwangombwa na we ashimangira ko nta muntu uzabihomberamo kuko abanyarwanda bazagira ukwirinda kandi n’inyungu y’abacuruza Mobile Money itazahungabana.
Ati “Nukenera kujya gukura amafaranga yawe kuri telefoni, icyo gihe bazakwishyuza. ariko ugiye gafata amafaranga yawe ngo uyashyire kuri telefoni yawe uyoherereze undi muntu cyangwa uyakoreshe kugura ibintu ntabwo wishyura. Icyo twashishikariza abantu rwose duhagarike ibintu byo gukoresha kashi.”
Ku rundi ruhannde uretse kwirinda coronavirus iyi ni gahunda igaragara ko izateza imbere uburyo bwo guhererekanya no kwishyurana hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga (Cashless).
Mu rwego rwo gushishikariza abantu kwishyurana no kohererezanya amafaranga batayahererekanyije mu ntoki bishobora gukwirakwiza Coronavirus, BNR yemeje ko mu gihe cy’amezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki.
Ibyo kandi bizajyana n’uko nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa abantu bahererekanya amafaranga kuri Mobile Money cyangwa umucuruzi mu gihe yishyuwe hakoreshejwe imiyoboro y’ibigo by’itumanaho (Mobile Money na Virtual POS).
BNR yatangaje ko izakomeza gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’izo ngamba no gukomeza gusesengura ingaruka za Coronavirus kandi yiteguye kuba yafata izindi ngamba zikwiye.

Title: MTN Rwanda yakuyeho ikiguzi cyo kohereza amafaranga kuri Mobile Money mu gufasha kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Ikigo cy’itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko cyakuyeho ikiguzi cy’amafaranga yajyaga acibwa abantu bohereza amafaranga bakoresheje MTN Mobile Money, mu korohereza abakiliya bacyo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus binyuze ku mafaranga ahererekanywa mu ntoki n’abantu benshi.
Ikigo cy’itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko cyakuyeho ikiguzi cy’amafaranga yajyaga acibwa abantu bohereza amafaranga bakoresheje MTN Mobile Money, mu korohereza abakiliya bacyo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus binyuze ku mafaranga ahererekanywa mu ntoki n’abantu benshi.
Iki cyemezo gikurikira inama iherutse guhuza Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, amabanki y’ubucuruzi, ibigo bitanga serivisi z’ubwishingizi n’ibindi bigo bifite aho bihuriye no guhanahana amafaranga birimo n’iby’itumanaho […].
Muri iyo nama bemeranyije gufata ingamba zose zishoboka zatuma abaturage boroherwa na zimwe muri serivisi bahabwa n’ibyo bigo, muri iki gihe icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje gukwirakwira hirya no hino ku isi.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko icyemezo yafashe ku ruhande rwayo kigamije kurinda abakozi, abakiriya ndetse na buri muntu wese ufite aho ahuriye na serivisi itanga, hakumirwa ko hari uwafatwa n’iki cyorezo.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa MTN Rwanda, Mitwa Ng’ambi, yavuze ko ikigo ayobora cyakuyeho amafaranga yajyaga acibwa buri muntu wohereje amafaranga kuri mugenzi we; ayakura kuri konti ya banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money; ayakura kuri Mobile Mooney ayohereza kuri banki cyangwa mu gihe yishyura ibicuruzwa, bikazakorwa mu gihe cy’iminsi 90.
Ati “MTN Rwanda yifatanyije n’igihugu cyose muri ibi bihe bikomeye, inafatanya na leta gusakaza ubukangurambaga bugamije kwimika ingamba zo gukumira no kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’iyi virusi.”
Yakomeje avuga ko bazi neza ko abakiliya babo bazabangamirwa, bityo ko bari gushyiraho uburyo buzatuma bakomeza kuba hamwe mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga, bagahererekanya amafaranga ndetse bakanishyura ibyo bakeneye mu buryo buboneye kandi bufite umutekano igihe cyose.
MTN ivuga ko izongera uburyo bwari busanzwe mu kwishyura bwa MoMoPay kugira ngo hagabanywe ibyago byo kwandura binyuze mu guhererekanya amafaranga afatika mu bacuruzi, amasoko, za farumasi n’ahandi.
MTN ivuga ko intego y’iki cyemezo ari ugufasha ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi gukomeza gukora. Muri iki gihe ngo serivisi zishobora kuzagira ibibazo bitandukanye ariko icy’ingenzi ni ukugumishaho umuyoboro w’itumanaho, ibikoresho bikaboneka ndetse hakongerwa n’ubushobozi.
MTN ivuga ko izakomeza gukurikiranira hafi ikibazo cya COVID-19 kandi igakurikiza inama zitangwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abantu 11 banduye Coronavirus. Mu rwego rwo gukumira no kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo, ibikorwa bitandukanye byahagaritswe.
Byatumye Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) ifata ingamba zirimo kwemerera amabanki gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo kugira ngo azorohereze abayabereyemo imyenda mu gihe cyo kwishyura no gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.

Title: COMESA yashyizeho ibihano bya $300.000 ku bazacuruza ibitujuje ubuziranenge byitwa ko bikumira Coronavirus
Body:
Komisiyo ishinzwe ibikorwa by’ipiganwa mu bucuruzi mu Muryango w’Isoko Rusange ry’Ibihugu bya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba n’Amajyepfo (COMESA) yashyizeho ibihano bingana n’amadolari ya Amerika ibihumbi 300 kuri sosiyete izacuruza ibikoresho bitujuje ubuziranenge ibyita ko bifasha mu gukumira Coronavirus.
Komisiyo ishinzwe ibikorwa by’ipiganwa mu bucuruzi mu Muryango w’Isoko Rusange ry’Ibihugu bya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba n’Amajyepfo (COMESA) yashyizeho ibihano bingana n’amadolari ya Amerika ibihumbi 300 kuri sosiyete izacuruza ibikoresho bitujuje ubuziranenge ibyita ko bifasha mu gukumira Coronavirus.
Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara n’iyi komisiyo ku wa 17 Werurwe 2020 riburira “ibigo byose n’abantu ku giti cyabo bari kugurisha ibintu bitujuje ubuziranenge cyangwa se bitemewe babyita ko bivura cyangwa bifasha mu gukumira Coronavirus”.
Ibyo bigo byose n’abantu ku giti cyabo bamenyeshejwe ko bakwiye guhagarika ibyo bikorwa kuko binyuranye n’ingingo ya 27 y’amategeko agenga ibijyanye n’ihiganwa ku isoko, agenderwaho na COMESA.
Rikomeza rigira riti “Bityo rero, mu gihe hari ikigo icyo aricyo cyose cyangwa se umuntu ku giti cye ufashwe, Komisiyo ntizaca ku ruhande mu gushyira mu bikorwa ibiteganywa n’amategeko birimo gucibwa amadolari ya Amerika ibihumbi 300.”
Abaguzi bagiriwe inama yo gushishoza bakagenzura neza niba nta bicuruzwa bitujuje ubuziranenge bahangitswe ndetse bakamenyesha iyi komisiyo mu gihe hari ibyo baketse.
Kuva aho ingamba zo gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zishyiriwemo imbaraga, ku masoko atandukanye arimo n’ayo mu Rwanda hakunze kugaragara abacuruzi bahangika abaguzi.
Hari nk’aho abantu bagiye kugura alcool yifashishwa mu gusukura intoki, ugasanga bahawe amavuta yo kwisiga mu cyimbo cyayo bitewe n’uko ku macupa babaga bahinduye bakandika ko icyo umuntu aguze ari uwo muti yashakaga kandi atari byo.
COMESA ni umuryango ugizwe n’ibihugu 19 watangiye mu 1994 ariko u Rwanda rwinjiyemo mu 2004.
Ibyo bihugu ni u Burundi, Ibirwa bya Comores, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Djibouti, Misiri, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Kenya, Libya, Madagascar, Malawi, Ibirwa bya Maurice, Ibirwa bya Seychelles, Sudani, eSwatani, Uganda, Zambia, Zimbabwe n’u Rwanda.

Title: Banki zemerewe korohereza abazifitiye inguzanyo, igiciro cyo guhererekanya amafaranga kivanwaho
Body:
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yafashe ingamba zirimo kwemerera amabanki gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo kugira ngo azorohereze abayabereyemo imyenda mu gihe cyo kwishyura no gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yafashe ingamba zirimo kwemerera amabanki gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo kugira ngo azorohereze abayabereyemo imyenda mu gihe cyo kwishyura no gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Coronavirus yabaye icyorezo cyugarije Isi ndetse mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abarwayi bayo 11, bari kwitabwaho n’inzego z’ubuzima.
BNR yatangaje ko nyuma y’aho Coronavirus igaragariye ku Isi ndetse ikaba iri kugira ingaruka ku bukungu, ifatanyije n’izindi nzego za leta bagiye inama n’amabanki n’ibigo bitanga serivisi z’itumanaho mu rwego rwo gufata ingamba zigamije guhangana nazo.
Itangazo yashyize hanze kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 18Werurwe 2020 rivuga ko mu ngamba zafashwe harimo kwemerera banki kongerera abakiliya bazo igihe cyo kwishyura imyenda isigaye, mu gihe bagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus.
Rigira riti “Amabanki yemerewe mu buryo burenze ubusanzwe gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo, kugira ngo zorohereze abazibereyemo imyenda (inguzanyo) uko bakwishyura mu gihe bagize ingorane zo kwishyura uko byari biteganyijwe bitewe na Coronavirus.”
BNR yakomeje itangaza ko yasanze ari ngombwa gufasha amabanki kubona amafaranga ahagije, bituma kuri gahunda isanganywe yo kuyafasha kubona amafaranga yongeraho ‘Inguzanyo y’ingoboka yishyurwa mu gihe cyisumbuye ku gisanzwe’.
Yashyizeho inguzanyo y’ingoboka ya miliyari 50 Frw banki yakwiyambaza igihe igize ikibazo cy’amafaranga.
BNR iti “Iyo nguzanyo izishyurwa ku ijanisha ry’urwunguko fatizo rya banki nkuru. Iyo nguzanyo ikaba yamara igihe kingana n’amezi atatu, atandatu cyangwa 12. Iyi nguzanyo y’ingoboka ihari mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu kandi BNR izajya iyitanga mu bushobozi bwayo.”
Mu rwego rwo gufasha amabanki kubona amafaranga ahagije kandi BNR yafashe ingamba yo ‘koroherezwa mu kugurura impapuro mpeshamwenda ziri ku isoko”.
BNR yatangaje ko mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu yemeye ko izajya igura impapuro mpeshamwenda ku giciro cy’isoko mu gihe uzifite yabuze undi muguzi ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane kandi igihe cyo gutegereza undi muguzi igikura ku minsi 30 gishyirwa kuri 15.
Indi ngamba BNR yatangaje ni iyo ‘kugabanya igipimo gitegetswe cy’amafaranga y’ubwizigamo banki itajya munsi’.
Yatangaje ko “Mu rwego rwo gufasha amabanki gukomeza gufasha inzego z’ubucuruzi zazahungabanywa na coronavirus, yiyemeje ko kuva tariki 1 Mata 2020 igipimo gitegetswe cy’amafaranga y’ubwizigamo banki zitajya munsi kigabanukaho 1% bityo bikaba 4% aho kuba 5%.”
 	Kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus
Mu rwego rwo gushishikariza abantu kwishyurana no kohererezanya amafaranga batayahererekanyije mu ntoki bishobora gukwirakwiza Coronavirus, BNR yemeje ko mu gihe cy’amezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki.
Ibyo kandi bikazajyana n’uko nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa abantu bahererekanya amafaranga kuri Mobile Money.
Itangazo rikomeza riti “Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umucuruzi mu gihe yishyuwe hakoreshejwe imiyoboro y’ibigo by’itumanaho (Mobile Money na Virtual POS).”
Iryo tangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Guverineri wa BNR, Rwangombwa John, ryemeza ko igipimo ntarengwa cy’amafaranga yoherezwa hakoreshejwe imiyoboro y’ibigo by’itumanaho (Mobile Money) cyongerewe kiva ku bihumbi 500 Frw gishyirwa kuri miliyoni 1.5 Frw ku bakiliya bo mu rwego rwa mbere naho ku bo mu rwego rwa kabiri kiva kuri miliyoni 1 Frw gishyirwa kuri miliyoni 4 Frw.
BNR yatangaje ko izakomeza gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’izo ngamba no gukomeza gusesengura ingaruka za Coronavirus kandi yiteguye kuba yafata izindi ngamba zikwiye.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda yashishikarije abaturarwanda gukoresha aya mahirwe yo gukurikirwaho ikiguzi cyo kwishyurana no guhererekanya amafaranga hadakoreshejwe kashi bityo bakitabira uburyo buhari bw’imiyoboro y’ikoranabuhanga.

Title: Ba rwiyemezamirimo bakajije ingamba zigamije kurinda abakiliya babagana Coronavirus
Body:
Coronavirus yahinduye uko abantu babayeho ku Isi cyane ko serivisi nyinshi ziri gutangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, yugarije Isi.
Coronavirus yahinduye uko abantu babayeho ku Isi cyane ko serivisi nyinshi ziri gutangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, yugarije Isi.
COVID-19 yatumye hashyirwaho ingamba zifatika zo guhangana na yo zirimo gushyiraho aho abantu bakarabira, kwirinda amahuriro y’abantu benshi, kuramukanya n’ibiganza n’ibindi.
Iki cyorezo cyageze ku Isi yose ndetse kuri ubu mu Rwanda abantu bagera kuri 11 bamaze kugaragarwaho iyo ndwara.
OMS yemeje ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020 ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi bitewe n’uburyo umubare w’abandura iyo ndwara wiyongera ubutitsa, kuva yaboneka mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Coronavirus imaze guhitana abantu 8,790, mu gihe abayanduye magingo aya bagera ku 213,541, muri bo 84,314 barayikize.
Ibigo bitandukanye byashyizeho uburyo buzafasha ababigana gukomeza ingamba zo kwirinda ko bafatwa n’iki cyorezo.
Umuyobozi wa Sosiyete Nyarwanda Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans, Nsengiyumva Ramadhan, uri mu Banyarwanda bafite ibikorwa byabo mu Rwanda nyuma yo gushaka ubumenyi mu mahanga.
Rwanda Cash yaje kuvamo izina rya Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans itanga serivisi ku bohereza amafaranga mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.
Mu gukomeza gutanga serivisi zayo muri iki gihe, Nsengiyumva, yavuze ko ikigo ayoboye cyafashe ingamba zo kongera umutekano ku bijyanye n’ubuzima ku bakozi n’abakiliya bayo ku buryo bwihariye mu guhangana na Coronavirus.
Yagize ati “Ibiro byacu biri i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi birafungura ariko umuntu umwe ni we wemerewe kwinjira yamara guhabwa serivisi undi akaba yakurikira. Turakomeza kubagezaho ibyemezo bigenda bifatwa n’ubuyobozi mu kubungabunga ubuzima bwacu muri ibi bihe.’’
Yavuze ko n’ishami ryo mu Rwanda ryakajijwemo ingamba zo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Yakomeje ati “Ibiro byacu mu Rwanda nabyo byafashe ingamba, ni ukugira ubudakemwa mu bisabwa ngo ntihakwirakwizwe coronavirus. Amasaha yo kwakira abantu ni uguhera saa Mbili n’igice za mu gitondo kugeza saa moya z’umugoroba.’’
Abashaka kohererezanya amafaranga bifashishije Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans bashyiriweho imirongo ya telefoni bashobora kubazaho andi makuru zirimo +32 2 227 18 20 ku bari mu Bubiligi na +250 788 35 87 87 ku bo mu Rwanda.
