Title: Inyungu mu kwihuza gushobora kuba hagati ya banki zikomeye mu Rwanda
Body:
Guverineri wa Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, John Rwangobwa, yavuze ko ukwihuza gukomeje kuvugwa hagati ya BPR Atlas na Equity Bank, kwabyara inyungu ku rwego rw’imari, bigatuma habaho ubushobozi bwo gutera inkunga imishinga minini maze banki zifite amikoro aciriritse zikagumana imishinga zifitiye ubushobozi.
Guverineri wa Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, John Rwangobwa, yavuze ko ukwihuza gukomeje kuvugwa hagati ya BPR Atlas na Equity Bank, kwabyara inyungu ku rwego rw’imari, bigatuma habaho ubushobozi bwo gutera inkunga imishinga minini maze banki zifite amikoro aciriritse zikagumana imishinga zifitiye ubushobozi.
Yabigarutseho mu kiganiro n’ikinyamakuru Rwanda Today, aho yabajijwe ku kwihuza kumaze iminsi kuvugwa hagati ya BPR Atlas Mara na Equity Bank.
Muri Mata umwaka ushize nibwo Equity Group Holdings Plc yatangaje ko byemejwe mu buryo bw’ibanze, ko izahabwa imigabane 62% Atlas Mara ifite muri BPR Plc na 100% muri African Banking Corporation Tanzania Limited, African Banking Corporation Zambia Limited na African Banking Corporation Mozambique Limited.
Atlas Mara yo yagombaga guhabwa imigabane miliyoni 252 muri Equity Group Holdings Plc ingana na 6.27% muri iki kigo gikomeye muri Kenya, mu igurana ry’imigabane rifite agaciro ka miliyari 10.7 z’amashillingi ya Kenya (miliyoni $106).
Byateganywaga ko ari igikorwa gishobora gufata amezi ari hagati y’ane n’atandatu ku ruhande rwa Equity Group, bikabanza kwemezwa n’inzego zigenzura ibi bigo birimo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda n’ibigo bigenzura isoko ry’Imari n’imigabane.
Mu itangazo yasohoye muri Mutarama uyu mwaka, Equity Group yavuze ko impande zombi zitarashyira umukono ku masezerano ya burundu agena ihererekanya ry’imigabane, kugeza ubwo cy’amasezerano y’ibanze arangirije igihe.
Yakomeje iti “Gusa EGH na ATMA biteganya gukomeza ibiganiro mu 2020 mu kugerageza kwemeranya ku ngingo z’ubucuruzi zijyanye n’ihererekanya ryemeranyijwe, cyangwa ibindi bihwanye naryo. Kugeza ubu nta kigaragaza ko iri hererekanya rizabaho.”
Mu kiganiro na Rwanda Today, Guverineri Rwangombwa yavuze ko umwanzuro wa nyuma utarafatwa kuri iri huzwa rya banki zombi mu Rwanda, “ndetse nta wamenya igihe bizafata.”
Yakomeje ati “Mbibona nk’igikorwa cyiza. Ubundi iyo isoko riyobowe na banki imwe gusa biba birimo imbogamizi. Kugira ngo igihugu kibashe gutera imbere, uba ukeneye banki zitandukanye zifite ubushobozi bwo kwishingira ibikorwa binini, kandi zishobora gushyira amafaranga mu bukungu bw’igihugu.”
“Turamutse dufite banki ebyiri nini zifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga inguzanyo nini, izindi banki zishobora gufatanya gushyira amafaranga mu zindi nguzanyo zisigaye.”
Magingo aya banki iruta izindi ku isoko ry’imari mu Rwanda ni Banki ya Kigali, aho nibura ifite 33% by’umutungo mbumbe w’urwego rw’amabanki mu Rwanda. Mu zindi banki ziza inyuma aho harimo Equity Bank na KCB.
Mu Ukuboza 2018 BNR yatangaje izamuka ry’imari shingiro isabwa kugira ngo banki cyangwa ikigo cy’ubwishingizi cyemererwe gukorera mu Rwanda. Muri icyo gihe byatangajwe ko imari shingiro isabwa banki y’ubucuruzi yavuye kuri miliyari 5Frw igera kuri miliyari 20 Frw, isabwa banki z’iterambere iva kuri miliyari 3 Frw igera kuri miliyari 50 Frw, banki zikora nka koperative zo zisabwa miliyari 10 Frw.
Banki zahawe imyaka itanu yo kongera imari shingiro ariko nibura mu myaka itatu zikaba zigejeje kuri miliyari 15Frw, zikuzuza miliyari 20Frw mu yindi ibiri ikurikira.
Ubwo iyo myanzuro yatangazwaga, Rwangombwa yagize ati “Abenshi mu mabanki yacu bafite imari shingiro uyu munsi irenze kure cyane izi miliyari 20Frw tumaze gushyiraho. Iyo urebye nk’amabanki yaje nyuma ya 2008, yatangiranye na miliyari eshanu ariko kugira ngo ubucuruzi bwabo bukomeze gutera imbere benshi bamaze kongeramo miliyari zirenze 17Frw. Ntabwo tubona ko hari banki izagira ikibazo ku mafaranga yo gushyiramo.”
Nyuma y’umwaka urenga ayo mabwiriza ashyizeho, Guverineri Rwangombwa yavuze agamije gutuma banki zikora ubucuruzi mu buryo buboneye, nubwo hari avuga ko bikigoye kubona inyungu kuri iryo shoramari.
Yakomeje ati “Uko imari shingiro iba nini niko na banki ishobora gutera inkunga imishinga minini kandi ni nako ibona inyungu. Nk’urugero nka Banki ya Kigali, niyo banki ya mbere nini ku isoko aho ifite imari shingiro igera muri miliyari zisaga 100 Frw, ariko mu mwaka ushize yagiye ku isoko gushakaho andi mafaranga ku mari shingiro.”
Rwangombwa yashimangiye ko urwego rw’ubukungu mu Rwanda ruhagaze neza. Mu gihe u Rwanda n’Isi bihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, urwego rwo kwakira inama ni rumwe mu zishobora guhungabana mu rwego rw’ubukungu, kubera ko inyinshi zikomeje gusubikwa.
Gusa avuga ko hari icyizere ko ingaruka zayo zitatinda, kuko hari amahirwe ko iki cyorezo gishobora kutinjira mu mwaka utaha wa 2021.

Title: Impuguke zisanga gukaza ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus byihutirwa kurusha gutekereza ibihombo
Body:
Umusesenguzi mu by’Ubukungu, Teddy Kaberuka, yavuze ko mbere y’uko abantu batekereza ku ngaruka icyorezo cya Coronavirus gishobora guteza mu bukungu, igikwiye gukomeza gukorwa ari ugukaza ingamba zo kugihagarika.
Umusesenguzi mu by’Ubukungu, Teddy Kaberuka, yavuze ko mbere y’uko abantu batekereza ku ngaruka icyorezo cya Coronavirus gishobora guteza mu bukungu, igikwiye gukomeza gukorwa ari ugukaza ingamba zo kugihagarika.
Kaberuka yatangaje ko nk’uko guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangije ingamba zo gukumira iki cyorezo, abanyarwanda basabwa kubyubahiriza cyane ko bidakozwe vuba, byaba ikibazo gikomeye no ku bukungu bw’igihugu.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda, ubu itangaza ko abantu umunani aribo bamaze kwandura ubu bwandu.
Amezi arenga ane arashize Isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibubye ryita ku buzima, OMS, rigaragaza ko abantu barenga ibihumbi 190 bamaze kwandura naho abandi barenga ibihumbi birindwi bamaze gupfa.
Mu Ukuboza 2019, iki cyorezo nibwo cyatangiriye mu Mujyi wa Wuhan uherereye mu Ntara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa, ariko ubu ibihugu birenga 140 kimaze kubigeramo harimo n’u Rwanda.
Uretse kuba iki cyorezo kirimo guhitana ubuzima bwa benshi, ubukungu bw’Isi nabwo burimo kugana ahabi cyane ko imirimo yahagaze mu bihugu bitandukanye.
Inzobere mu by’ubukungu zivuga ko iki aricyo cyorezo cya mbere kibaye ku Isi, ku buryo ibihugu byose bihura n’ingaruka zacyo.
Ibihugu birimo gutanga akayabo mu guhangana n’iki cyorezo
Nko mu Bushinwa aho iki cyorezo cyahereye, byasabye leta ko ihagarika ibikorwa hafi ya byose by’ubucuruzi, ingendo zo mu kirere n’ibindi bikorwa.
U Bushinwa bwashoye akayabo k’amadorali miliyari 50 kugira ngo bufashe ibigo by’ubucuruzi ngo bidahomba burundu.
Mu bihugu bikomeye cyane cyane iby’i Burayi, nabyo byagiye bigira amafaranga bigenera ibigo by’ubucuruzi nk’amabanki, bashaka gukomeza ubucuruzi muri ibi bihe.
Igihugu cy’u Butaliyani cyugarijwe cyane, cyashoye miliyari 10 z’amadorali mu gufasha ubucuruzi.
U Bwongereza nabwo bwatangaje ko bugiye gushora arenga miliyari 30 z’ama-pound yo gufasha ubukungu bw’igihugu ngo budasubira inyuma.
Kugeza ubu Banki y’Isi yatangaje inkunga ya miliyari 3.3 z’amadorali yo gufasha ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajyambere mu guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Imari, IMF, nacyo cyatangaje ko kizatanga inkunga ya miliyari 50 z’amadorali, amwe muri aya akaba nta nyungu afite.
Ku rwego rw’Isi, ibigo bitwara abagenzi mu by’indege birateganya guhomba akayabo ka miliyari 29 z’amadorali ya Amerika, nk’uko Ikigo Mpuzamahanga mu by’ingendo zo mu kirere kibigaragaza.
U Rwanda rurasabwa kwitwara gute muri iki kibazo?
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama, RCB, Nelly Mukazayire, yavuze ko kubera Coronavirus, zimwe mu nama zari kubera mu Rwanda zimuwe, ubu harimo gushakishwa amatariki mashya.
Yagize ati “Uyu mwaka hari hateganyijwe inama 147 zagombaga kuzatwinjiriza miliyoni $88 (asaga miliyari 83 Frw) aturuka mu bijyanye n’inama ndetse n’amahuriro mpuzamahanga.”
“Nk’uko bigaragara hose, iki cyorezo cyagiye gituma hari ibihinduka, ndetse muri urwo rwego rwacu, ubu hari inama zigeze kuri 20 zimuwe, zikaba zitarasubitswe burundu ahubwo zarimuwe, turi kuvugana n’ababishinzwe, abazikurikirana, kugira ngo turebe aho zazashyirwa.”
Uretse izi nama kandi ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi busanzwe mu baturage, nabyo byagiye bisubira inyuma kubera kubura abaguzi.
Teddy Kaberuka yabwiye IGIHE ko iki ari ikibazo cyugarije Isi muri rusange, gusa ko icyo u Rwanda rusabwa ari ukubanza guhagarika iki cyorezo mbere y’ibindi byose, cyane ko kiramutse kidakumiriwe aribwo cyateza ibibazo bikomeye.
Kaberuka avuga ko iyo ukuirkiye usanga iki aricyo cyorezo kibayeho kikibasira ibihugu byose.
Ibi ngo biterwa n’uko Isi yabaye nk’Umudugudu, aho usanga umuntu ava ahantu hamwe akajya ahandi mu buryo bworoshye, bikaba ari nabyo byatumye icyorezo cyaduka mu Bushinwa ariko kikaba cyarakwiriye Isi yose.
Yagize ati “Kugeza ubu haracyari kare ku Rwanda kuba umuntu yagira byinshi avuga ariko icyihutirwa ni ugushaka uko iki cyorezo cyakumirwa, iki kibazo gitangira mu Bushinwa mu 2019, icyo bahise bashyira imbere ni ugushaka uko bagikumira, uyu munsi niyo mpamvu barimo gushaka uko bakongera kuzahura ubukungu.”
“Ubu ikiriho ni uko hashyirwaho ingamba, nko kugabanya inyungu ku nguzanyo, korohereza abantu kubona inguzanyo n’ibindi ariko mu Rwanda ho haracyari kare kuko nta n’uzi ngo biragana he, uburemere bw’icyorezo nibwo butuma abantu bamenya ingamba bafata kugira ngo zikemure ibibazo bihari.”
Gusa Kaberuka avuga ko izi ngaruka z’ubukungu zamaze kugera ku Rwanda, kuko nk’amafaranga igihugu kirimo gukoresha cyita ku bamaze kwandura, gupima abo abakwaho ubu bwandu n’ibindi, ari amafaranga yakagombye kuba akora ibindi.
Kaberuka avuga ko icyo buri munyarwanda asabwa ari ukwirinda no kugira isuku, bagakurikiza uburyo butuma umuntu atandura.
Yagize ati “Abantu ntibirare kuko hagize uwirara icyorezo kiziyongera, abantu babanze bashyire imbere ubuzima kuko ntabwo waba udafite ubuzima ngo ugire icyo ukora, ibi bisobanuye ko icyihutirwa kurusha ibindi ni uko icyorezo cyahagarara ibindi bizaza nyuma.”
Kaberuka avuga ko leta ikwiye kandi gucungira hafi abacuruzi bamwe bashaka kungukira muri ibyo bibazo bazamura ibiciro ku bicuruzwa, ariko ikanafasha abacuruzi harebwa ko ibicuruzwa bitabura ku masoko.

Title: Ibyo wamenya kuri ‘GANZA na I&M SME Banking’ igiye kuzamura abafite imishinga mito n’iciriritse
Body:
Mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi ni bwo I&M Bank Rwanda yatangije gahunda idasanzwe yo korohereza abantu ku giti cyabo, ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse, cyane cyane ibikora mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli, kubona inguzanyo yo kwifashisha mu mishinga itandukanye y’iterambere n’ubujyanama bubafasha kugera ku ntego zabo.
Mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi ni bwo I&M Bank Rwanda yatangije gahunda idasanzwe yo korohereza abantu ku giti cyabo, ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse, cyane cyane ibikora mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli, kubona inguzanyo yo kwifashisha mu mishinga itandukanye y’iterambere n’ubujyanama bubafasha kugera ku ntego zabo.
Iyi gahunda izwi nka ‘GANZA NA I&M SME BANKING’ yashyizweho hagamijwe gusubiza ibibazo by’abashaka gutangira ubucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse cyangwa abasanzwe babukora binubiraga ko ibigo by’imari byinshi bifasha abafite imishinga migari, bo bakabura na kimwe kibafasha gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga yabo.
I&M Bank Rwanda ivuga ko muri iyi gahunda umukiliya asabwa gufunguza konti imwe muri eshatu zitangwa bijyanye n’urwego rw’ubucuruzi agezemo.
Hari konti y’imishinga yitwa TANGIRA, ifungurirwa abifuza gutangira ubucuruzi; iyitwa AGUKA, ifungurirwa abasanzwe bakora ubucuruzi ariko bifuza kubwagura n’iyitwa GWIZA, ihabwa umaze igihe mu bucuruzi ariko akaba ashaka kubugeza ku rundi rwego.
Umwihariko wa Konti yiswe ‘TANGIRA’
Iyi konti ifungurirwa umuntu wese wifuza gutangira umushinga w’ubucuruzi ako kanya, akaba yemerewe kubitsa no kubikuza ku buntu ndetse n’ikarita ya mbere yo kubikuza akayihabwa nta kiguzi atanze.
Ufunguje iyi konti aba yemerewe guhabwa inguzanyo y’ingoboka ndetse akemererwa guhamagara umurongo w’ubufasha amasaha 24/7.
Anahabwa kandi ifatabuguzi ry’ubuntu kuri serivisi zose z’ikoranabuhanga kandi mu gihe adafite ingwate, ashobora guhabwa inguzanyo yifashisha, yishyurwa mu buryo bumunogeye.
Izindi serivisi uwafunguje konti ya ‘TANGIRA’ ahabwa zijyanye no kugirwa inama mu mushinga we, mu rwego rwo gukumira icyatuma atagera ku ntego ze uko abyifuza.
Ibyo wamenya kuri Konti ya ‘AGUKA’
Iyi konti ifungurirwa umuntu usanzwe afite umushinga w’ubucuruzi, akaba yemerewe kubitsa no kubikuza amafaranga ku buntu kandi agahabwa bwa mbere ikarita ya MasterCard Prepaid Multi-currency ku buntu.
Nyir’iyi konti ahabwa inguzanyo mu buryo bworoshye kandi ifatabuguzi kuri serivisi zose z’ikoranabuhanga arihabwa ku buntu. Iyi konti ifite umwihariko w’uko ifungurwa ako kanya, ikanahabwa umukozi uyitaho by’umwihariko n’umurongo w’ubufasha wo guhamagaraho amasaha 24/7.
Igihe uwafunguje iyi konti adafite ingwate, ntibimubuza gusaba inguzanyo ngo ayihabwe kandi akayishyura mu buryo bumunogeye.
Uyu kandi yemerewe guhabwa serivisi za I&M Bank zikubiyemo inyigisho, amahugurwa n’impanuro zirebana no guteza imbere imishinga mito n’iciriritse (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises-MSME).
Iyi konti kandi itanga amahirwe adasanzwe yo gusubika kwishyura inguzanyo mu gihe bikenewe kandi nyirayo akabona igisubizo cyihuse ku cyifuzo cye kijyanye n’inguzanyo.
Ibyiza bya Konti ya ‘GWIZA’
Iyi konti ifungurirwa umuntu umaze igihe mu bucuruzi kandi akaba yemerewe kubitsa no kubikuza ndetse agahabwa inyungu ishimishije ku bwizigame akoze. Nyir’iyi konti ahabwa ikarita ya mbere y’ideni ku buntu ndetse agahabwa n’inguzanyo ku nzu y’ubucuruzi.
Iyi konti ifasha umukiliya guhabwa inguzanyo mu buryo bworoshye, gufunguza konti by’ako kanya, ifatabuguzi ry’ubuntu kuri serivisi zose z’ikoranabuhanga, kwishyura inguzanyo mu buryo bunoze kandi nyirayo agahabwa serivisi za I&M Bank zikubiyemo inyigisho, amahugurwa n’impanuro zirebana na MSME.
GWIZA kandi ifasha umukiliya gusubika kwishyura inguzanyo mu gihe bikenewe, kubona igisubizo cyihuse ku cyifuzo cye cy’inguzanyo, n’umukozi wita kuri konti ye by’umwihariko.
Gufunguza izi konti bisaba kwandika ibaruwa ubisaba, kuzuza urwandiko rwabigenewe, amafoto magufi na fotokopi y’indangamuntu cyangwa Passport by’uyikeneye.

Title: Leta igiye gukorera ubuvugizi abafite imyenda ya banki n’abishyura imisoro bashobora guhomba kubera Coronavirus
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yatangaje ko igiye gukorana n’inzego zirebwa, hakwigwa uburyo abantu bishyura imisoro kimwe n’abafite imyenda muri banki bafashwa kuko bashobora kubura ubwishyu kubera ibura ry’abakiliya riturutse ku ifungwa ry’ibikorwa mu gukumira Coronavirus.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yatangaje ko igiye gukorana n’inzego zirebwa, hakwigwa uburyo abantu bishyura imisoro kimwe n’abafite imyenda muri banki bafashwa kuko bashobora kubura ubwishyu kubera ibura ry’abakiliya riturutse ku ifungwa ry’ibikorwa mu gukumira Coronavirus.
U Rwanda rwakajije ingamba mu gukumira ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyakwirakwira mu gihugu hose, nyuma y’uko umuntu wa mbere agaragaye mu gihugu agifite.
Mu ngamba zafashwe, harimo ko ibikorwa bihuriramo abantu benshi byafunzwe, amashuri arafungwa n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Iryo fungwa ry’ibikorwa binyuranye n’izindi ngamba, nta kabuza ko zizagira ingaruka ku bantu benshi, cyane nk’abari basanzwe bakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bashobora kuzabura icyashara.
Kuba ibi bikorwa byarahagaze kandi byari bishamikiyeho ubucuruzi bwa benshi biri mu byatumye leta itangira kuganira n’inzego bireba kugira ngo abo ubucuruzi bwakomwe mu nkokora n’izi ngamba boroherezwe kwishyura imisoro n’imyenda ya banki.
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Soraya Hakuziyaremye, yatangaje ko batangiye kuvugana n’inzego zirebwa ku buryo aho biri ngombwa abantu bakoroherezwa.
Ati “Twanagize n’ibiganiro na RRA ku byerekeye imisoro. Murabizi ko uku kwezi kwa Werurwe ibigo byinshi n’inganda n’abacuruzi aribwo bishyura imisoro, kugira ngo turebe ko abadashoboye kwishyura kubera ikibazo bagize, kuba batabona abakiliya nk’abo bagiraga, bashobore kuba bakoroherezwa ntibabace amande. ”
Yakomeje avuga ko “Biri gusesengurwa kugira ngo tugende tureba urwego ku rundi, uruganda, umucuruzi ingaruka byamugizeho; zirangana gute, ese twamufasha gute […] na PSF yatwemereye ko ku wa Mbere iri buduhe ibyo babona twabafashamo. Ntabwo bivuze ko byose tuzabibemerera ariko ingaruka bagize n’ababona bashobora kugira igihombo ku buryo twabafasha byaba muri ibyo by’imisoro.”
Minisitiri Hakuziyaremye yakomeje avuga ko hari burebwe ku bafite imyenda muri banki baba bagomba kwishyura kuko nabo bashobora guhura n’ibibazo bakabura ubwishyu.
Ati “Nabyo ni ikibazo kuko banki irakomeza kubishyuza buri kwezi ariko niba atarashoboye kwinjiza amafaranga yajyaga yinjiza nk’uko byari bisanzwe, naho ni ukuganiriza za banki na BNR ari nayo ireberere urwego rw’amabanki nayo irabidufashamo kugira ngo nabo bacuruzi ntibahungabane, ntitubone ubushabitsi bufunga kandi ari ibintu twashoboraga gufasha. Twese ni ubufatanye, tugomba gushyira imbere ubuzima bw’abantu imbere.”
Minisitiri Hakuziyaremye yasabye abo ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bitahagaze kubikorana ubwitonzi kandi bakirinda kuzamura ibiciro; ari nako bubahiriza ingamba zo kugira isuku mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo.

Title: Abaturiye uruganda rwa Skol barishimira uko rwabahinduriye ubuzima
Body:
Abatuye mu Nzove mu Murenge wa Kanyinya mu Karere ka Nyarugenge bavuga ko Uruganda rwa Skol ruherereye muri aka gace rwahinduye ubuzima bwabo, bamwe bakava mu bukene n’ubwigunge.
Abatuye mu Nzove mu Murenge wa Kanyinya mu Karere ka Nyarugenge bavuga ko Uruganda rwa Skol ruherereye muri aka gace rwahinduye ubuzima bwabo, bamwe bakava mu bukene n’ubwigunge.
Iyo ugeze muri aka gace kazwi nko mu Nzove usanga inzu nyinshi ziriho ibara y’umuhondo, hariho ikirango cya Skol na bamwe baturage baba bambaye imyambaro iriho ikirango cyayo.
Abaturage muri ako gace bavuga ko guturana n’urwo ruganda byabaye umugisha kuri bo kuko rwahinduye byinshi mu buzima bwabo.
Bamwe mu baganiriye na IGIHE bemeza ko babayeho neza ndetse bamaze kwigeza ku iterambere kubera uru ruganda kuko abaturiye inkengero zarwo bahawe akazi kandi hakaba hari n’abana bo mu miryango itishoboye rugurira imyambaro.
Ruhebuza Luck ukora mu kabari ka Skol yagize ati “ Skol ni nk’umubyeyi wacu kuko mbere na mbere abaturiye inkengero z’uruganda bose yabahaye akazi kugira ngo batere imbere, ikindi iyo igiye gutanga akazi ihera ku baturiye uruganda.”
Mukantwari Odette we avuga ko ashimishwa cyane n’uburyo uru ruganda rurihira buri mwaka abaturage mituweli.
Ati “ Ejo bundi rwarihiye imiryango 600 mituweli , ibirori byabereye muri kariya kabari kayo ikindi kandi abana bacu nkatwe b’abakene rubaha imyambaro y’ishuri bigatuma ya yandi twakabikoreshejemo tuyizigamira.”
Yongeyeho ko na we ubwe yiteje imbere kuko amaze kugira ihene ebyiri abikesha uruganda rwa Skol kuko amafaranga yari kujya aguriramo abana be imyambaro y’ishuri n’ayo yari kwishyura mituweli yayazigamye.
Nzayishima Denyse wiga muri G.S Nzove, yemeza ko kuba Skol imuha imyenda y’ishuri byamufashije byinshi kuko ubu atsinda nk’abandi.
Ati “ Kumpa imyenda y’ishuri byaramfashije cyane kuko byandinze umwanda kandi buri gihe nza ku ishuri nkeye nta kimwaro mfite cy’uko ejo nzagaruka ku ishuri nambaye imyenda icitse.”
Ashimangira ko mbere yambaraga umwenda w’ishuri iminsi itatu atarawumesa ariko ubu asigaye ayihinduranya nk’abandi.
Umuyobozi wa G.S Nzove, Barahirwa Thierry yavuze ko Skol imaze guha abanyeshuri barenga 2000 imyenda y’ishuri kandi hari icyo byahinduye ku myigire y’abo bana.
Ati “Umwaka ushize yahaye imyambaro abana 600 batari bayifite. Mu byumweru bibiri bishize nabwo yayihaye abandi 1650 nabo bavuka mu miryango itishoboye kandi bitanga umusaruro ufatika kuko iyo umwana yize yambaye imyenda idasa nk’iy’abandi bimutera ipfunwe ariko iyo yamaze kuyihabwa ubona ko yisanzuye akanatsinda kuko aba yiga atuje.”
Mu mwaka wa 2009 nibwo uruganda rwo mu Bubiligi rukora ibinyobwa bisembuye n’ibidasembuye, Unibra rwaguze imigabane ingana na 51 % mu yahoze ari Brasseries de Mille Collines, ruhinduka SKOL . Icyo gihe urwo ruganda rwari rufite ubushobozi bwo kwenga hegitolitiro 80 000 ku mwaka ariko mu 2017 rwaguye umuyoboro rugira ubushobozi bwo kwenga hegitolitilo ibihumbi 500 ku mwaka.

Title: Ingo ibihumbi 22 mu Burasirazuba zahawe amashanyarazi mu myaka ibiri zirishimira iterambere yazigejejeho
Body:
Akanyamuneza ni kose ku miryango isaga ibihumbi 22 yo mu turere twa Rwamagana, Kayonza, Ngoma na Kirehe yahawe amashanyarazi mu myaka hafi ibiri ishize bayahawe, akayifasha kwiteza iterambere binyuze mu guhanga ibikorwa bibyara inyungu.
Akanyamuneza ni kose ku miryango isaga ibihumbi 22 yo mu turere twa Rwamagana, Kayonza, Ngoma na Kirehe yahawe amashanyarazi mu myaka hafi ibiri ishize bayahawe, akayifasha kwiteza iterambere binyuze mu guhanga ibikorwa bibyara inyungu.
Sosiyete y’u Rwanda ishinzwe Ingufu (REG) igaragaza ko yahaye amashanyarazi aba baturage binyuze mu mushinga uterwa inkunga n’u Bubiligi watangijwe mu mwaka wa 2014, ukaba umaze kuyageza ku ngo 22,387 mu Ntara y’Uburasirazuba ndetse biteganijwe ko uyu mwaka wa 2020 uzarangira izindi zirenga 5,400 ziyahawe.
Uretse gutanga amashanyarazi ku batuye muri izo ngo, uyu mushinga urimo no kuvugurura umuyoboro w’amashanyarazi ungana na kilometero zisaga 280 mu Ntara y’Uburasirazuba, wongererwa ingufu ukavanwa ku rwego rwa ‘Monophasé’ cyangwa single phase ushyirwa ku rwa triphasé cyangwa three phase.
Bamwe mu baturage batuye mu Karere ka Rwamagana, bavuze ko mbere bari babayeho mu buzima bugoye kuko abenshi bakoraga urugendo rurerure bajya gushaka serivisi zikoreshwa n’ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Uwitwa Sarabwe Isaac, utuye mu Kagari ka Nyarubuye mu Murenge wa Munyiginya, usanzwe akora ubucuruzi mu gasantere ka Nyarubuye yavuze ko umuriro utaraza atabonaga inyungu ihagije mu bucuruzi bwe.
Ati “Kuva tubonye amashayarazi twagize amahirwe, mbere twacanaga mazutu cyangwa tugakoresha buji, bigatuma dutanga amafaranga menshi ku mwaka kandi kubera n’imyotsi tukarwara n’indwara z’ubuhumekero. Aho umuriro uziye rero twagize amahirwe, ubu dukora na nijoro tukagira n’abakiriya benshi kandi nta n’abajura bakitwikira ijoro ngo batwibe.”
Akomeza avuga ko mu bucuruzi bwe yungutse kurushaho akabasha kuvugurura inzu ye ubu ikaba iriho inzugi z’ibyuma (métallique).
Mugenzi we witwa Nzabonimana Augustin ukoresha icyuma gisya yavuze ko yabonye aka kazi kubera amashanyarazi.
Ati “Nabonye akazi ari uko amashanyarazi aje. Ubu ndakora nkabasha gukodesha inzu nkabona n’ibintunga njye n’umuryango wanjye.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Nyarubuye, Uwamahoro Delphine, yavuze ko amashanyarazi yazanye impinduka nyinshi mu baturage ayobora.
Ati “Mvugiye nk’aha mu biro, murabona turacana, abarara izamu n’irondo ry’umwuga nta kibazo bagira babasha kubona hose. Ikindi kandi iyo twakeneraga gukoresha mudasobwa byaratugoraga ariko ubu turazikoresha tukabasha gutanga serivisi byihuse nko gufasha abaturage kwinjiza abana bavutse muri sisiteme y’Ubudehe, kwandukuza abapfuye, n’ibindi bitandukanye.”
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko ibyo byose mbere byasabaga kubikorera ku Biro by’Umurenge, bakabanza gufata umwanya wo gukusanya abasaba kubikorerwa, bamara kuba benshi akabona kujya kubakorera, ugasanga birakerereza abasabye serivisi.
Uwamahoro avuga ko amashanyarazi yafunguye amarembo bituma abaturage ayobora bahanga akazi gashya.
Ati “Gusudira byakorerwaga kwa Karangara, harimo intera y’ibirometero hafi umunani kugira ngo uve inaha ugereyo. Urumva ko byatumaga abantu batakaza amafaranga bajyayo banagaruka. Dufite n’abashoramari baje kubera umuriro.”
Umucungamutungo w’Urwunge rw’Amashuri rw’Abadivantisite b’umunsi wa Karindi rwa Nyarubuye, riherereye mu Murenge wa Munyiginya, Muhiyumva Jean Marie, yavuze ko amashanyarazi yabafashije cyane mu kazi kabo ka buri munsi.
Ati “Kuva twabona umuriro hahindutse ibintu byinshi bitandukanye mu kazi kacu ka buri munsi. Icya mbere byihutishije akazi, mu gutanga amaraporo mu nzego zo hejuru ubu byaroroshye, kubona internet biroroha, no mu myigire y’abana biratworohereza kubategurira ibizamini no kubisohora mu mashini (printing). Impinduka nyinshi zo zaragaragaye.”
Muhiyumva yasobanuye ko buri mwarimu ashobora gukoresha mudasobwa n’abana bakaboneraho kwiga ikoranabuhanga mu buryo buboroheye.
Si ibyo gusa kuko n’abasengera mu nsengero zirimo urw’Itorero ry’Abadivantisite babasha guhimbaza Imana bisanzuye, kuko bakoresha ibyuma by’umuziki batagombye gucana moteri ikenera Lisansi ihenze.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo Nderabuzima cya Munyiginya mu Karere ka Rwamagana, Ezechiel Ndabarinze, yavuze ko kuva babona amashanyarazi babashije gutanga serivisi nyinshi ndetse akazi karushaho kuborohera.
Ati “Iyo bwabaga bwije umuganga agomba gufasha umurwayi, yagombaga kwifashisha itoroshi. Ubu nijoro dutanga serivisi habona, umuforomo yakenera igikoresho akakibona vuba, agafata umutsi w’umurwayi ahantu habona bitamubangamiye, ndetse n’umurwayi nawe iyo agiye kwivuriza ahantu abona hari amashanyarazi aba yumva atekanye.”
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko hari imiti n’inkingo ziba zigomba kubikwa mu byumva bikonjesha ngo zitangirika ku buryo uyu munsi amashanyarazi yaborohereje kubikonjesha.
Avuga ko batarabona amashanyarazi, buri mugoroba bagombaga kujya kubibitsa ku bindi bigo nderabuzima bifite amashanyarazi bagasubira kubifata mu gitondo.
Ati “Urumva ko habaga harimo gutakaza igihe n’amafaranga. Ubu rero twungutse igihe, twunguka n’amafaranga twatakazaga. Mbese ni iterambere.”
REG ivuga ko ubu abafatabuguzi bamaze kubona amashanyarazi yo ku muyoboro mugari basaga miliyoni imwe (38.5%), mu gihe habarurwa n’abandi babarirwa mu bihumbi 400 (14.3%) bakoresha amashanyarazi adakomoka ku muyoboro mugari.

Title: Rusizi: Abakiliya ba BK basabwe kurushaho gukoresha ikoranabuhanga bakoresha neza igihe
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali (BK) bwashishikarije abakiliya bayo bo mu Turere twa Rusizi na Nyamasheke kwitabira serivisi z’iyo banki, bakoresha ikoranabuhanga birinda gutakaza umwanya no gusigasira umutekano w’amafaranga yabo.
Ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali (BK) bwashishikarije abakiliya bayo bo mu Turere twa Rusizi na Nyamasheke kwitabira serivisi z’iyo banki, bakoresha ikoranabuhanga birinda gutakaza umwanya no gusigasira umutekano w’amafaranga yabo.
Byagarutsweho mu busabane ubuyobozi bwa BK Plc bwagiranye n’abakiliya bayo i Rusizi na Nyamasheke kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 6 Werurwe 2020.
Ni ibiganiro byahuje Umuyobozi Mukuru wa BK Plc, Dr Diane Karusisi n’abakiliya, aho bunguranye ibitekerezo mu rwego rwo gukomeza kubaha serivisi nziza.
Bamwe mu bakiliya b’iyi banki bavuze ko bifuza ko mu Mujyi wa Kamembe hafungurwa irindi shami kubera abakiliya ba BK ari benshi.
Sibo Martin yagize ati “Ni ugushima uburyo banki yacu baduha serivisi nziza baduha no kutwumva. Turashima amasaha mwaduhaye kuko hari banki saa kumi n’ebyiri ziba zafunze. Mu Karere ka Rusizi turacyafite imbogamizi abenshi dufite ubucuruzi, umurongo uraturambiye twifuza ko mwakongera amashami.”
Hari undi wagize ati “Turashima uburyo Banki ya Kigali igenda ikura ariko abakiliya ni benshi ntabwo byoroshye biratuvuna cyane. Mu by’ukuri ikoranabuhanga rirahari ariko hari abantu benshi bataramenyera iryo koranabuhanga.”
Umuyobozi wa Banki ya Kigali, Dr Diane Karusisi, yashimiye abakiliya ba banki bakomeje gukorana nayo, abashishikariza kurushaho gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda gukoresha umwanya munini bashaka serivisi.
Yavuze ko ikibazo cy’uko bamara umwanya munini ku murongo kizakemurwa gusa abashishikariza kuyoboka ikoranabuhanga kuko ari ryo ryizewe kandi ridatwara umwanya.
Ati “Ntabwo dushaka ko abantu baza ku murongo rwose, twashyizeho abakozi (agents) kugira ngo abantu bajye bajya kubitsa amafaranga hirya no hino, dushyiraho uburyo bwo guhererekanya amafaranga kuri telefoni. Turashaka ko abantu babyitabira bagasirimuka aho kujya gutonda umurongo. Ntabwo ari ngombwa rwose umwanya wanyu ugomba kujya mu ishoramari mukiteza imbere, mugateza imbere n’igihugu.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rusizi, Kayumba Ephrem, yashimiye Banki ya Kigali uburyo ifatanya n’inzego za leta mu guteza imbere imibereho myiza y’abaturage ndetse asaba abakiliya ba BK kurushaho gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda ubujura.
Abakiliya ba BK mu Turere twa Rusizi na Nyamasheke nyuma yo gusobanurirwa uburyo bwo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga biyemeje kurushaho kubinoza baryitabira.

Title: Rubavu:Abacuruza inkoko barataka igihombo nyuma yo kujyanwa kure y’umujyi
Body:
Abacuruzi b’inkoko mu Mujyi wa Rubavu barashinja ubuyobozi bw’Akarere kubahombya kuko bwabavanye aho babonaga abaguzi byoroshye bukabajyana mu Murenge wa Rubavu ahantu batabasha kubona abakiliya.
Abacuruzi b’inkoko mu Mujyi wa Rubavu barashinja ubuyobozi bw’Akarere kubahombya kuko bwabavanye aho babonaga abaguzi byoroshye bukabajyana mu Murenge wa Rubavu ahantu batabasha kubona abakiliya.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Rubavu bwo buvuga ko bwabajyanye mu isoko ryubatse mu rwego rwo guca akajagari.
Aba bacuruzi bahoze bacururiza inkoko hafi y’umupaka muto no mu Isoko rya Mbugangari mu Murenge wa Gisenyi. Mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize basabwe kuva hafi y’umupaka, bakajya mu Murenge wa Rubavu mu Isoko rya Rukoko hirindwa akajagari.
Abacuruzi bimuwe bavuga ko nta baguzi bakibona nkuko byari bimeze mbere ndetse ngo n’uburyo bwo kugera mu isoko rishya buragoye.
Nyirasafari Marie Jeanne, umubyeyi ucuruza inkoko yagize ati “Hano nta kintu dukora ni ukwanga kwirirwa mu rugo. Abana baratsinze tubura amafaranga yo kwishyura. Nk’ubu bigeze saa sita nta muntu urambaza inkoko, sinzi impamvu batuzanye hano. Mbugangari aho nakoreraga mu cyumweru nacuruzaga inkoko 50 ariko hano n’inkoko icumi ntiwazigezaho kuko Abanye-Congo bazifatira muri karitsiye. Badufashe rwose dusubire hafi y’umupaka.’’
Umunyamabanga wa Koperative Tubumwe y’abacuruzi b’inkoko, Abeli Kalisa, yavuze ko bimuwe mu buryo butunguranye batiteguye.
Yagize ati “Abayobozi baraje badusanga mu isoko rya Mbugangari baratubwira ngo umunsi ukurikiyeho tuzabe twimukiye mu Murenge wa Rubavu kandi Koperative yacu yakoranaga n’Abanye-Congo. Ahantu batujyanye ni kure y’umupaka mu bilometero birenga bitanu, nta muhanda uhari; urangura inkoko ukagerayo harimo izapfuye.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni kure ku buryo nta muntu wava mu mujyi ngo ategeshe igihumbi aje kugura inkoko y’ibihumbi bine. Twarahombye abacuruzi bamwe barabiretse, tumaze guhomba miliyoni ebyiri kubera inkoko zapfuye.’’
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rubavu, Habyarimana Gilbert, yavuze ko bimuye abo bacuruzi birinda akajagari, kandi ko isoko ritaba aho buri wese yifuza.
 Ati “Si byiza ko buri muntu wese ashyira isoko iwe yitwaje ko irindi riri kure yaba abacuruzi n’abagura. Ibintu byose tugomba kubisanga ku isoko ntabwo ryaba aho umuntu yifuza. Ririya Soko rya Rukoko ni isoko ryubatswe ahantu hatuwe n’igice kinini kitagira isoko kuko Umurenge wa Rubavu n’igice cy’uwa Cyanzarwe nta rindi soko bagiraga.”
Yakomeje avuga ko iyi gahunda ari mu rwego rwo kwagura ubucuruzi, guca akajagari no kurwanya umwanda.
Ati “Turashaka guca akajagari mu bucuruzi, ntabwo ahantu hose hacururizwa. Turashaka no guca umwanda kuko isoko riba rifite ahagenewe imyanda, ikindi turashaka kwagura ubucuruzi no mu yindi mirenge hakagera ubucuruzi.’’
Iri soko rya Rukoko ryari rimaze imyaka irindwi ridakora neza ku bushobozi bwaryo. Nko mu nzu 38 zo gucururizamo, eshanu zonyine ni zo zakorerwagamo mbere y’uko iki cyemezo gifatwa.

Title: Coronavirus imaze guhombya miliyari 9000$ ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane, igihombo gikomeje kwiyongera
Body:
Amasoko y’imari n’imigabane ku isi akomeje kugwa mu gihombo, aho kuri uyu wa gatanu, imigabane yo ku isoko rya Wall Street yakomeje guta agaciro nk’uko byagenze mu cyumweru gishize; ikimenyetso gishimangira ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus kizateza igihombo gikabije mu bukungu bw’isi.
Amasoko y’imari n’imigabane ku isi akomeje kugwa mu gihombo, aho kuri uyu wa gatanu, imigabane yo ku isoko rya Wall Street yakomeje guta agaciro nk’uko byagenze mu cyumweru gishize; ikimenyetso gishimangira ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus kizateza igihombo gikabije mu bukungu bw’isi.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Banki ya Amerika bugaragaza ko mu minsi icyenda gusa ishize, amasoko y’imari n’imigabane yahombye miliyari 9000$, byatumye amasoko yose yo muri Amerika kuri uyu wa gatanu yafunze ari mu ibara ritukura.
Kuri uyu wa gatanu, agaciro k’imigabane ku isoko ry’u Buyapani, Nikkei 225 (N225), kagabanutse ku gipimo cya 2,7%. Isoko ryo muri Koreya y’Epfo (KOSPI) ryo ryafunze agaciro k’imigabane kagabanutseho 2,2%.
Ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane rya Hong Kong (HSI), imigabane yagabanutse ku rugero rwa 2,3%, naho irya Shanghai Composite (SHCOMP), agaciro kagabanutse kagera kuri 1,2%.
Mu Burayi, isoko rya Londres (FTSE100), imigabane yagabanutse ku rugero rwa 3%, mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa gatanu. Mu Budage (DAX) imigabane yagabanutseho 3,5% naho mu Bufaransa (CAC40) yari yagabanutseho 3,6%.
Nk’uko amasoko yo muri Aziya n’u Burayi agaciro k’imigabane kayo kaguye, ni ko no muri Amerika byagenze kuko isoko rya Dow, imigabane yaryo yamanutseho amanota 580 (2,2%). Amasoko ya S&P 500 na Nasdaq Composite (COMP) nayo imigabane yaho yagabanutseho 2%.
Uburyo amasoko ari guhindagurika muri iyi minsi ishize, byerekana uburyo abashoramari bafite ubwoba kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ubu ku isi hose hamaze kubarurwa abarenga 101, 860 banduye coronavirus, abamaze gupfa ni 3,462.
Koreya y’Epfo, u Butaliyani, u Buyapani na Iran ni byo bihugu birimo ubwandu bwiyongera ku muvuduko wo hejuru, nyuma y’u Bushinwa bwakomotsemo iki cyorezo, kandi umuvuduko w’ubwandu ukomeje kwiyongera muri Amerika no mu Bwongereza.
Ibiciro bya peteroli byongeye kugabanuka, nubwo ishyirahamwe ry’ibihugu bicukura bikanatungana peteroli, OPEC, ryari ryatangaje umugambi wo kugabanya umubare w’utugunguru miliyoni 1,5 twa peteroli itaranyuzwa mu nganda ducuruzwa buri munsi hirya no hino ku isi.
Abatumiza peteroli baragabanutse ku buryo abayicukura batangiye gushaka uko bagabanya utugunguru miliyoni 2,1 buri munsi ku yo bajyana ku isoko. Kugeza ubu igiciro cy’akagunguru ka peteroli cyagabanutse ku rugero rwa 4% kuko kari kugura amadorali 47,80.
CNN yatangaje ko abashoramari bagitinye gushora amafaranga yabo kubera ubwoba batewe n’iki cyorezo.
Agaciro ka zahabu ko gakomeje kuzamuka kubera abashoramari benshi bari gushaka kubitsa umutungo wabo aho bizeye ko wakomeza kugira agaciro n’umutekano.
Abasesenguzi bahamya ko kongera kuzahura ubukungu buri gusubira inyuma bizagorana, ariko ubw’u Bushinwa bwo bushobora kuzazamuka ku gipimo cya 4.8%.
Ibihugu by’u Buyapani na Koreya y’Epfo biri mu bizagorwa cyane no kongera gusubira ku muvuduko w’ubukungu byari bigezeho kuko ingano y’ibicuruzwa byaba ibyoherezwa hanze n’iby’imbere mu gihugu bizagabanuka.
Biteganyijwe kandi ko ibyo abanyamerika n’abanyaburayi batumizaga hanze bizagabanuka, bigasubiza inyuma ibikorwa by’inganda nyinshi ku isi hose.
Ibigo mpuzamahanga bitwara abagenzi mu ndenge bizahomba miliyari 113 z’amadolari mu gihe coronavirus yakomeza gukwirakwira, nk’uko isuzuma riheruka gutangwa n’ishyirahamwe mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu mu kirere ryabitangaje.
Ikigo cy’abanyamerika gicuruza ikawa, Starbucks, cyavuze ko giteganya igabanuka rya 50% ku bucuruzi bwacyo mu maduka yo mu Bushinwa muri iki gihembwe cya Mutarama-Werurwe.

Title: MININFRA igiye guha akazi urubyiruko rwahuguwe mu gukoresha ubuhanga bwa Do-Nou basana imihanda
Body:
Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo (MININFRA) ku bufatanye n’uturere yijeje ko igiye gutanga imirimo ku rubyiruko rwibumbiye mu makoperativa atandukanye yahuguwe n’Umuryango w’Abayapani udaharanira inyungu, CORE mu gukoresha ubuhanga bwa Do-nou basana imihanda y’ibitaka yangiritse.
Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo (MININFRA) ku bufatanye n’uturere yijeje ko igiye gutanga imirimo ku rubyiruko rwibumbiye mu makoperativa atandukanye yahuguwe n’Umuryango w’Abayapani udaharanira inyungu, CORE mu gukoresha ubuhanga bwa Do-nou basana imihanda y’ibitaka yangiritse.
Don-nou ni ubuhanga bukomoka mu Buyapani bwo gusana igice cy’umuhanda cyangiritse hakoreshejwe udufuka turimo itaka risanzwe rikoreshwa mu kubaka imihanda rya ‘Laterite’ tukifashishwa mu kubaka ibikuta bibuza imihanda kuriduka, gusibanganya ibinogo by’aho umuhanda wacukutse, cyangwa gukamura ahasanzwe hazwi ko haba isayo mu bihe by’imvura.
Kuri uyu wa 5 Werurwe Ubwo habaga inama isuzuma aho uyu umuryango wa CORE ugeze ushyira mu bikorwa ibikubiye mu masezerano wagiranye na Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo mu 2018, MININFRA yishimiye ibyo uyu muryango wakoze birimo no guhugura urubyiruko mu gukoresha ubu buhanga, inarwizeza kurushakira akazi ku bufatanye n’uturere rukomokamo.
Umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu muri Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo, Byiringiro Fred yavuze ko mu minsi ya vuba barafashwa kubona akazi.
Ati “Turumva ko mu minsi ya vuba rwose aya makoperative yamaze guhugurwa dufatanyije n’uturere kuko imihanda myinshi n’iy’uturere, tuzafatanya nabo kugira ngo turebe amafaranga bahabwaga yo kwita ku mihanda twumvikane uburyo bagiye kuyakoresha baha akazi aba bantu bamaze guhugurwa”.
Uretse kugabanya ubushomeri, Byiringiro asanga ibi bizarushaho no kugabanya amafaranga yakoreshwaga yahabwaga ba rwiyemezamirimo baturutse i Kigali ngo bajye gusana imihanda yangiritse hirya no hino mu turere.
Ibi Byiringiro yabigarutseho nyuma yo kugaragarizwa n’uru rubyiruko rwahuguwe ko rugifite imbogamizi y’amikoro kugira ngo bashyire mu bikorwa ibyo bize.
Dusengimana Marie ukomoka mu karere ka Nyamagabe akaba n’umwe mu rubyiruko rwahuguwe yagize Ati “Twabanje kubona amahugurwa y’iminsi 12 dusana umuhanda ungana na metero 130, twongera dukora undi muhanda ungana na metero 180 ariko kugeza iyi saha ubu bumenyi twahawe ntabwo turi kubukoresha kubera ko nta ngengo y’imari irashyirwa mu karere yo gukoreshwa mu buryo bwo gusana umuhanda hakoreshejwe Do-nou”
Ibi Dusengimana abisangiye na Ahishakiye Vincent wagize ati “ Kuva twahugurwa nta kandi kazi twari twabona kugira ngo tubashe gukora imihanda yahaza akarere, mu gihe icyo ari cyo cyose twabona amafaranga n’ubundi ni akazi, indi minsi tuba turi mu mirimo yacu mu gihe tutarabona uduha akazi gahoraho”
Urubyiruko rwahuguwe ni urwo mu karere ka Gakenke, Rulindo, Nyamasheke, Rusizi, Ruhango, Nyamagabe, Rutsiro na Nyaruguru
Ubwiza bw’imihanda yasanwe n’uru rubyiruko mu gihe cy’amahugurwa ishimwa n’abayobozi b’uturere bakozemo barimo n’umukozi w’Akarere ka Ruhango Mukwiye Jean Pierre uhamya ko uburyo bakora bitandukanye n’ibyakorwaga mu zindi gahunda za leta zitandukanye.
Yagize ati “Umuntu avuze ko nta tandukaniro yaba abeshye kuko rirahari rinini, urebye aho bakoze ukanagereranya na mbere umuganda ukijyamo, ubushobozi bw’umuganda bugarukira mu guharura ibyatsi ntabwo bujya mu bijyanye no kuyobora amazi, gutsindagira imihanda nta nubwo bukora n’ibindi byose mu kwita ku muhanda ariko muri ubu buhanga urubyiruko byose rwarabisobanukiwe”
Mu karere ka Ruhango uru rubyiruko rwasannye imihanda ifite ibilometero 5 yo mu murenge wa Mwendo na Bweramana
Mu myaka ibiri ishize, Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo na CORE basinye amasezerano y’ubufatanye urubyiruko rugera kuri 368 rumaze guhugurwa mu gukoresha Do-nou hakaba hari na gahunda y’uko umwaka utaha hazahugurwa abandi 150.

Title: BPR Atlas Mara yafunguye Ishami ry’Icyicaro gikuru i Kigali ryihariye kuri serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga
Body:
Banki y’Abaturage y’u Rwanda (BPR Atlas Mara) yafunguye ku mugaragaro Ishami rishya mu Mujyi wa Kigali rikaba n’icyicaro gikuru rifite umwihariko kuri serivisi zifashisha ikoranabuhanga aho abakiliya bashyiriweho uburyo zimwe bazazibona bifashishije iPad.
Banki y’Abaturage y’u Rwanda (BPR Atlas Mara) yafunguye ku mugaragaro Ishami rishya mu Mujyi wa Kigali rikaba n’icyicaro gikuru rifite umwihariko kuri serivisi zifashisha ikoranabuhanga aho abakiliya bashyiriweho uburyo zimwe bazazibona bifashishije iPad.
Iri shami riherereye mu nyubako nshya BPR Atlas Mara iheruka kuzuza muri Kigali, ryafunguwe ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa 5 Werurwe 2020, risimbura iryari mu nyubako ishaje iherereye ruguru ya Hôtel des Mille Collines.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa BPR Atlas Mara, Maurice K. Toroitich, yashimiye abifatanyije na banki mu birori byo gufungura ishami rishya, anashimangira ko ibyo banki ikora byose biri mu nyungu z’abaturage.
Yavuze ko ishami rishya rifite umwihariko wo gutanga serivisi z’imari mu buryo bugezweho ku buryo abakiliya bazaryifashisha mu gufungura konti, kureba amafaranga aziriho na raporo y’ibyazikoreweho, kohereza amafaranga n’ibindi.
Ati “Ishami tuberetse uyu munsi ni rishya ry’icyicaro gikuru dufite muri iyi nyubako yacu nshya. Niryo rikuru kandi rigezweho kuko nk’uko twabyerekanye ntidufite gusa aho abakiliya bakirira amafaranga ahubwo hari n’ahatangirwa serivisi z’imari mu buryo bugezweho.”
Muri iri shami rishya, BPR Atlas Mara yateganyije igice abakiliya bashaka gukoresha serivisi z’imari bifashishije ikoranabuhanga ariko badafite internet basangaho iPad bakazikoresha, bakaba bakitabaza abakozi ba banki mu gihe bakeneye ubufasha bwisumbuyeho.
Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi muri Banki y’Abaturage, Prof Njuguna Ndung’u, yavuze ko gufungura ishami rishya ari ikimenyetso gitanga icyizere ko banki izakomeza gutanga serivisi z’imari mu gihe kirambye.
Uretse serivisi abakiliya bashobora kubona bakoresheje BPR Mobile Banking cyangwa ku mashami y’iki kigo cy’imari ari hirya no hino mu gihugu, kinafite abagihagarariye basaga 310 bashobora gufasha abakiliya kubona serivisi z’imari bitabagoye.
Kugeza ubu BPR Atlas Mara ikorera mu gihugu cyose aho ifite amashami 186. Mu 2018 yagaragazaga ko yabonye inyungu ingana na miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Title: U Rwanda na Congo byiyemeje kubungabunga ibidukikije mu icukurwa rya gaz méthane mu Kivu
Body:
U Rwanda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, byasinye amasezerano agamije kurinda ibidukikije mu bikorwa byo gucukura gaz méthane mu kiyaga cya Kivu, n’ubundi bucukuzi bushobora kuzakorwamo.
U Rwanda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, byasinye amasezerano agamije kurinda ibidukikije mu bikorwa byo gucukura gaz méthane mu kiyaga cya Kivu, n’ubundi bucukuzi bushobora kuzakorwamo.
Aya masezerano yasinywe kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 5 Werurwe 2020 hagati ya Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije mu Rwanda, Dr Mujawamariya Jeanne d’Arc, n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta mu Minisiteri y’ingufu muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Rubens Mikindo Muhima.
Aya masezerano kandi yari ahagarariwe na Minisitiri w’ibikorwa remezo, Ambasaderi Gatete Claver.
Mu Ukwakira 2019, nibwo Ikigo Shema Power Lake Kivu Limited (SPLK Ltd), cyatangije umushinga wo kubyaza amashanyarazi gaz méthane iri mu kiyaga cya Kivu, aho byitezwe ko uzatanga megawatt 56 z’amashanyarazi.
Uyu mushinga witezweho gufasha igihugu kongera ingufu z’amashanyarazi zikagera kuri megawatt 556 mu mwaka wa 2024, zivuye kuri megawatt 224.5. Ugiye kwiyongera kuwa KivuWatt ubyaza gaz méthane megawatt 26, wubatswe n’ikigo cy’Abanyamerika, ContourGlobal, watashywe mu 2016.
Ambasaderi Gatete avuga ko muri iki kiyaga harimo gaz méthane nyinshi, kandi iramutse idacukuwe ishobora guteza ibibazo mu bihugu byombi.
Yagize ati “Muri iki kiyaga harimo gaz méthane nyinshi, tutayicukuye bishobora guteza ikibazo, ariko birasaba ko ibihugu byombi biyicukura mu buryo iki kiyaga gikomeza kubaho neza ndetse n’ibinyabuzima birimo.”
Dr Mujawamariya avuga ko aya masezerano agamije kurinda ibidukikije muri iki kiyaga, ku buryo buri ruhande rwitwararika mu bikorwa byarwo.
Yagize ati “Aya masezerano agomba kwita ku bikorwa byo gucukura gaz méthane ndetse n’ubundi bucukuzi bushobora kuzakorwamo, byose birinda ibidukikije cyane cyane inyamanswa zo mu mazi.”
Yavuze ko kuba u Rwanda rwashyize iyi Minisiteri muri aya masezerano, ari ukugira ngo azajye ireberera ikiyaga cya Kivu kugira ngo abacukura babikore mu buryo butabangamiye ibidukikije.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta mu Minisiteri y’ingufu muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Rubens Mikindo Muhima we agaragaza ko RDC yiteguye gukomeza gufatanya n’u Rwanda mu bijyanye no gucukura gaz méthane mu kiyaga cya Kivu, no kurengera ibinyabuzima birimo.
Yavuze ko gaz méthane iri mu kiyaga cya Kivu izifashishwa mu gutanga amashanyarazi ku batuye ibi bihugu, ariko bikaba bikwiye gukorwa hitawe ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima n’ibidukikije.
Yagaragaje ko igihugu cye cyiteguye gukorana n’u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’umushinga wo gucukura Megawatt zirenga 200 muri iki kiyaga.
Ikiyaga cya Kivu gifite metero zisaga 500 z’ubujyakuzimu, aho usanga cyohereza mu mazi yacyo Gaz méthane iturutsemo hasi. Mu kuyibyaza umusaruro hoherezwa ibitembo binini mu mazi bikayivangura n’amazi.
Inyigo zerekanye ko mu kiyaga cya Kivu harimo Gaz méthane ishobora gutanga hagati ya megawatt kuva ku 160 kugeza kuri 960, bitewe n’uburyo bwakoreshwa mu kuyibyaza amashanyarazi, igacukurwa mu gihe gishobora kugera ku myaka 50.
U Rwanda rwateganyije ibice bitanu bishobora gucukurwamo gaz méthane, mu gihe muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo bisangiye uyu mutungo kamere, hateganyijwe ibice bitandatu. Ibice by’u Rwanda bishobora gutanga megawatt 300.
Mu bice bitanu byo mu Rwanda bishobora gucukurwamo, bibiri biri mu Karere ka Rubavu, kimwe kiri mu karere ka Karongi mu gihe ibindi bibiri biri ku gice kigana ku karere ka Rusizi.

Title: Gisagara: Umuhanda mushya wa Kaburimbo wamaze gushyirwaho amatara
Body:
Umuhanda wa kaburimbo uva mu Mujyi wa Huye ukerekeza mu Karere ka Gisagara wamaze gushyirwaho amatara awucanira nk’uko ubuyobozi bwari bwabisezeranyije abaturage.
Umuhanda wa kaburimbo uva mu Mujyi wa Huye ukerekeza mu Karere ka Gisagara wamaze gushyirwaho amatara awucanira nk’uko ubuyobozi bwari bwabisezeranyije abaturage.
Uwo muhanda wa kilometero 13.8 uturuka i Huye ukagera ku Biro by’Akarere ka Gisagara; bawemerewe na Perezida Kagame Paul. Watangiye kubakwa tariki ya 8 Ukwakira 2018 bikaba biteganyijwe ko uzatwara agera kuri Miliyari 6.5Frw.
Ibikorwa byo kuwusoza byajyanye no kuwushyiraho amatara awuboneshereza mu masaha y’ijoro mu rwego rwo gufasha abawukoresha kugenda neza ndetse no kubungabunga umutekano.
Bamwe mu baturage b’abacuruzi mu gasantere ka Ndora aho uwo muhanda unyura, bishimira ibyo bikorwaremezo bagerejwe bakifuza ko bakongererwa amasaha yo gukora ku mugoroba kuko haba habona.
Fideèle Mugisha ukora akazi ko kogosha ati “Turashimira ubuyobozi bwacu bwiza bwaduhaye uyu muhanda wa kaburimbo none badushyiriyeho n’amatara ku buryo hano nijoro haba habona neza. Ahubwo twifuza ko batwongerera amasaha yo gukora tugakomeza akazi tukiteza imbere.”
Umubyeyi Thacienne ukora ubucuruzi na we asanga ibikorwa remezo bahawe bije kubateza imbere no guteza imbere agace batuyemo.
Ati “Iyi kaburimbo ni iterambere, none ubwo batuzanyiye n’amashanyarazi ni ukutubwira ngo namwe mukore ntihagire usigara inyuma.”
Ubusanzwe amabwiriza asaba abakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi muri ako Gasantere ka Ndora gufunga saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba ariko bo bakifuza ko bacuruza kugeza saa mbiri kuko haba habona.
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage mu Karere ka Gisagara, Clemence Gasengayire, yavuze ko icyifuzo cy’abo baturage bazakiganiraho n’abacuruzi bakareba isaha ibabereye.
Ati “Kongera amasaha yo gukora ni byo ariko bikajyana n’umutekano;(…) ku busabe bwa benshi dushobora kubiganiraho kuko ntabwo twasubiza inyuma icyifuzo cy’abaturage. Nabo bashobora kubiganiraho mu buryo bwabo bakabimenyesha Inama Njyanama y’Umurenge ikabongerera amasaha yo gukora.”
Kugeza ubu mu nkengero z’uwo muhanda hamaze kugera ibikorwa by’amajyambere birimo uruganda rwa GABI Ltd rwenga inzoga mu bitoki; hari kubakwa uruganda rutunganya ifu ya kawunga mu bigori hamwe n’urwenga umutobe mu bitoki.
Mu mujyi wa Gisagara hatangiye gukatwa ibibanza birenga 60 byo guturamo kandi hari n’igice cyagenewe ubucuruzi na cyo kigiye kubakwa.
Mu bijyanye n’amashanyarazi; abatuye mu Karere ka Gisagara bayafite ku kigero kiri hejuru ya 54% bavuye kuri 2% yo mu 2010.
Ni ubwa mbere Akarere ka Gisagara kagize umuhanda wa kaburimbo mu mateka yako.

Title: IMF yatangaje ko ubukungu bw’Isi buzasubira inyuma uyu mwaka kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus
Body:
Ikigega mpuzamahanga cy’imari, IMF, kuri uyu wa Gatatu cyatangaje ko ubukungu bw’Isi muri uyu mwaka buzasubira inyuma, ugereranyije n’uko bwari buhagaze umwaka ushize, isaba ibihugu gufata ingamba zikomeye mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ikigega mpuzamahanga cy’imari, IMF, kuri uyu wa Gatatu cyatangaje ko ubukungu bw’Isi muri uyu mwaka buzasubira inyuma, ugereranyije n’uko bwari buhagaze umwaka ushize, isaba ibihugu gufata ingamba zikomeye mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima, OMS, riravuga ko abamaze kwandura iki cyorezo barenga ibihumbi 95 ku Isi, mu gihe kimaze guhitana abarenga ibihumbi 32.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa IMF, Kristalina Georgieva, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati “Mu cyumweru gishize twabonye ugusubira inyuma k’ubukungu bw’Isi, turimo kubona gusubira inyuma k’ubukungu bw’Isi bwa 2020 ugereranyije n’ubwa 2019.”
Georgieva yagaragaje ko ubukungu bw’Isi buzasubira inyuma kubera iki cyorezo, ariko bizanaterwa n’uburyo ibihugu bizaba byafashe ingamba, igihe bizaba byabikoreye n’uburyo bizaba byabikozemo.
Muri Mutarama, IMF yari yatangaje ko ubukungu bw’Isi mu 2019 bwari kuri 2.9%, mu gihe mu 2020 bwagombaga kugera kuri 3.3%.
Iki kigega kivuga ko iki cyorezo kizagabanya ubukungu bw’Isi ku kigero cya 0.1% muri uyu mwaka.
IMF ivuga ko ku bijyanye n’u Bushinwa, kugeza ubu abantu batangiye gusubira mu mirimo. Iki gihugu cya kabiri mu kugira ubukungu bukomeye, ni ho iki cyorezo cyatangiriye.
Georgieva ati “Ku birebana n’u Bushinwa, twumvise inzego z’ubutegetsi zikangurira abantu gusubira mu mirimo bagakora. Kugeza ubu abahwanye na 60% batangiye akazi kandi byitezwe ko mu byumweru biri imbere bazagera kuri 90%”.
Avuga ko aya ari amakuru meza ku Bushinwa n’Isi muri rusange.
Iki kigega cyatangaje ko kigiye gutanga amadolari agera kuri miliyari 50 z’amadolari azakoreshwa mu gufasha mu bikorwa bitandukanye byo guhangana n’iki cyorezo.
IMF ivuga ko yakoze ubusesenguzi isanga igomba gushyira imbaraga mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’Amajyambere, cyane cyane ku mugabane wa Afurika.
Georgieva avuga ko ubu busesenguzi bwa IMF, bugaragaza ko ibi bihugu bifite intege nke mu bijyanye n’ubuvuzi, guhangana n’ibiciro kubera ibyo byohereza mu mahanga n’ibindi.
Ati “Mu by’ukuri ubu busesenguzi bwagaragaje ko ibihugu byo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara ari byo bigomba kwitabwaho, twateganyije miliyari 10 z’amadorali mu kubifasha kandi ku nyungu igera kuri zero”.
Avuga ko ibihugu byatoranyijwe cyane kuri uyu mugabane ari ibyamaze guhura n’izi ngaruka.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Banki y’Isi yatangaje ko igiye gutanga miliyari 12 z’amadolari yo gufasha ibihugu mu bijyanye n’ubuzima no guhangana n’ihungabana ry’ubukungu.
Perezida wa Banki y’Isi, David Malpass, yatangaje ko iyi nkunga izafasha ibihugu guhangana na Coronavirus, hatangwa ibikoresho byo gupima, gushyiraho ahantu hagenewe gushyirwa abanduye n’ibindi.

Title: I&M Bank Rwanda yatangije gahunda izorohereza ibigo bito n’ibiciritse kubona inguzanyo n’ubujyanama
Body:
I&M Bank Rwanda yatangije gahunda idasanzwe yo korohereza ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse, cyane cyane ibikora mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli kubona inguzanyo byifashisha mu mishinga itandukanye y’iterambere, n’ubujyanama bubifasha kugera ku ndoto.
I&M Bank Rwanda yatangije gahunda idasanzwe yo korohereza ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse, cyane cyane ibikora mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli kubona inguzanyo byifashisha mu mishinga itandukanye y’iterambere, n’ubujyanama bubifasha kugera ku ndoto.
Iyi gahunda izwi nka ‘Ganza na I&M SME Banking’ ifite intego ivuga ngo ‘Tangira, Aguka, Ugwize’ yatangijwe ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa 4 Werurwe 2020.
Ni gahunda izibanda cyane ku bigo bito n’ibiciriritse bikora mu rwego rw’amahoteli n’ubukerarugendo, I&M Bank Rwanda ifatanyije n’imiryango irimo Master Card Foundation binyuze mu mushinga wayo Hanga Ahazaza, ugamije kongerera urubyiruko amahirwe yo kubona akazi n’Ikigega cy’imari cya Banki y’Isi gifasha abikorera, IFC.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa I&M Bank Rwanda, Robin Bairstow, yavuze ko intego y’iyi gahunda ari ukuvugurura imikorere y’ahazaza h’ibigo bito n’ibiciritse bikorana nayo.
Ati “Ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse bifatiye runini iterambere ry’igihugu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage. Ndatekereza ko ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse byihariye hagati ya 70-95% by’imirimo ihangwa.”
Robin yavuze ko muri iyi gahunda abafite ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse, uretse guhabwa inguzanyo, hazanabaho kubaba hafi mu bijyanye n’ubujyanama.
Ati “Hazaba harimo kubongerera ubushobozi no guhugura ku bijyanye n’ubucuruzi no gucunga abakiliya ariko igikomeye cyane ni uburyo bwo gusesengura no gucunga inguzanyo. Ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse bizungukiramo serivisi z’imari ariko turategura no kubabera abajyanama.”
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ishami ry’Ubucuruzi muri I&M Bank Rwanda, Mushashi Delphine, yavuze ko ubusanzwe iki kigo cy’imari cyatangaga inguzanyo ariko ugasanga zifatwa n’ibigo binini.
Ati “Ni muri urwo rwego dutangije iyi gahunda kugira ngo tubashishikarize, bamenye ko dufite gahunda yo kwakira imishinga yabo, serivisi zijyanye n’aho bashobora kubitsa amafaranga kandi mu buryo buri wese azajya yibonamo.”
“Gahunda ni ukugira ngo twongere uburyo dutanga ibyo bikorwa kuri abo bakiliya kuko isoko rinini riri muri icyo cyiciro, turifuza ko nabo bagerwaho na serivisi mu buryo bw’amafaranga kugira ngo nabo bagure ibikorwa byabo cyangwa no mu buryo bashobora kugirwa inama z’uko bayobora imishinga yabo.”
Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa wa I&M Bank Rwanda, Byishimo Faustin, yavuze ko bamaze gutegura uburyo bushoboka bwo korohereza ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse kubona inguzanyo n’inama zibifasha kugera ku ndoto.
Ati “Kuri banki ni ukugira ngo mu myaka iri imbere tuzakorane n’abakiliya benshi kuko ibigo binini biba birebwa na buri wese.”
I&M Bank Rwanda ikomeje kwagura ibikorwa byayo, ari nako irushaho kwegera abakiliya bayo no gutegura abazaba abakiliya bayo mu minsi iri imbere.

Title: Abasora batigaragaje mu myaka itanu ishize basabwe kwigaragaza bagakurirwaho ibihano
Body:
Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’amahoro(RRA) cyatangaje ko abasora batigeze bigaragaraza n’abiyandikishije batagenzuwe mu myaka itanu ishize, bazigaragaza ku bushake bwabo bazakurirwaho ihazabu ryo ku rwego rw’ubutegetsi n’inyungu z’ubukererwe zijyanye n’umusoro batishyuye.
Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’amahoro(RRA) cyatangaje ko abasora batigeze bigaragaraza n’abiyandikishije batagenzuwe mu myaka itanu ishize, bazigaragaza ku bushake bwabo bazakurirwaho ihazabu ryo ku rwego rw’ubutegetsi n’inyungu z’ubukererwe zijyanye n’umusoro batishyuye.
Itangazo RRA yasohoye ku wa 3 Werurwe 2020 risobanura ko uwo mwanzuro wafashwe ushingiye ku ngingo ya 88 y’itegeko no 026 2019 ryo ku wa 18/9/2019 rigena uburyo bw’isoresha, irebana no gukurirwaho ibihano ku musoresha wigaragaje.
Rikomeza rivuga ko Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro kinejejwe no kumenyesha abasora batigaragaje mu buyobozi bw’imisoro cyangwa abiyandikishije ariko bakaba bataragenzuwe mu myaka itanu ishize nk’uko biteganywa n’iryo tegeko, kwigaragariza RRA mu nyandiko, bayimenyesha umusoro batatanze bitarenze tariki ya 30 Kamena 2020.
Rikomeza rigira riti “Abazabikora bose bujuje ibisabwa haruguru bazakurirwaho ihazabu ryo ku rwego rw’ubutegetsi n’inyungu z’ubukererwe zijyanye n’umusoro bishyure gusa umusoro fatizo.”
Imisoro izasonerwa ihazabu n’inyungu z’ubukererwe harimo umusoro ku nyungu, umusoro ku nyongeragaciro, umusoro ku bihembo by’abakozi, umusoro ku igurishwa cyangwa itangwa ry’imigabane, umusoro ku mikino y’amahirwe, umusoro ku mabuye y’agaciro n’umusoro ku byaguzwe.
RRA igaragaza ko mu mwaka wa 2018/19 yinjije miliyari Frw 1,422.9 ku ntego ya miliyari Frw 1,392.1 yari ifite bituma irenzaho miliyari Frw 30.8 angana na 102% y’ayo yari yiyemeje kwinjiza.

Title: Ibigo bikomeje kwiyandikisha mu imurika ry’imyubakire igezweho rizabera i Kigali
Body:
Mu gihe habura iminsi mike ngo mu Rwanda hatangire imurika ry’inzu n’imyubakire igezweho ku nshuro yaryo ya kabiri, bimwe mu bigo bizobereye mu bijyanye n’ubwubatsi bikorera mu Rwanda bitegerezanyije amatsiko itangira ry’iri murikagurisha.
Mu gihe habura iminsi mike ngo mu Rwanda hatangire imurika ry’inzu n’imyubakire igezweho ku nshuro yaryo ya kabiri, bimwe mu bigo bizobereye mu bijyanye n’ubwubatsi bikorera mu Rwanda bitegerezanyije amatsiko itangira ry’iri murikagurisha.
Ibi bigo bivuga ko byiteguye kwereka abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga bazaryitabira impinduka zijyanye n’iterambere mu miturire n’imyubakire u Rwanda rwifuza kandi ku giciro gito.
Bimwe mu bigo bimaze kwiyandikisha muri iri murika harimo DND Developers, Phoenix Plaza, Silk Plaster Rwanda, Troika Design Workshop, Savanna Creek, Kigali Heights, Rwanda Housing Authority, na My Seats, byose bimenyerewe mu gutanga serivisi zijyanye n’ubwubatsi bugezweho.
Iri murika rizatangira tariki ya 17 rigasozwe kuya 21 Werurwe 2020, ryiswe “Kigali Property & Shoppers Bazaar 2020”. Rizibanda ku kugaragaza inyubako zo guturamo n’ibikorwa bitandukanye by’ubwubatsi bigezweho muri iki gihe kandi bihendutse.
Iri murikagurisha rifite insanganyatsiko igira iti “Guteza imbere udushya tugamije kubungabunga ibidukikije mu iterambere ry’imyubakire ihendutse kandi irambye”, rizabera mu nyubako ya Kigali Heights, iherereye mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Ikigo “RG Consult” kiri gutegura iri murika, cyatangaje ko rizaba ihuriro ryo kumurika ibikorwa by’abafite inyubako zigurishwa ku giciro gito n’abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye bakorera mu Rwanda.
Iki kigo gishimangira ko inzu n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi bigira ingaruka ku mibereho y’abantu n’iterambere ry’igihugu, bityo ko mu gihe hari kwihutishwa uburyo bw’imiturire igezweho iganisha ku iterambere; hanakwiye gushyigikirwa ibikorwa birengera urusobe rw’ibidukikije.
Biteganyijwe ko ibigo bisaga 30 bikorera imbere mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga, byaba byigenga cyangwa byegamiye kuri leta bizitabira iri murikagurisha, rishobora kuzakira abantu bari hagati ya 5000 na 8000 mu gihe cy’iminsi itanu rizamara.
Umwihariko w’iri murikagurisha, ni uko rizitabirwa n’abacuruza ibikoresho byifashishwa mu bwubatsi, ababigura n’ibigo by’imari n’amabanki, mu rwego rwo gufasha buri muntu kubona ibyo akeneye ngo yubake, anasane inzu ye adahenzwe cyangwa ngo ahabwe ibintu bitujuje ubuziranenge.
Hazaba kandi hari n’abatanga ibyangombwa byo kubaka, ibigo byubakisha, amabanki atanga inguzanyo mu by’ubwubatsi, ibigo bitanga ubwishingizi bw’inyubako n’abandi batandukanye.
Iri murikagurisha ryateguwe n’ikigo RG Consult, kigamije kugeza amakuru yose ashoboka ku muntu ushaka kubaka inzu ye cyangwa kuyisana ndetse no kumenyekanisha abacuruzi b’ibyo bikoresho baba abato n’abanini.
RG Consult ivuga ko iri murikagurisha ari uburyo bwiza bwo kumenyekanisha no guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda n’igisubizo ku bashaka gutunga inzu zabo bwite.
Ubuyobozi bwa RG Consult bunavuga ko bushaka guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, abazwi n’abatazwi bose bagahura bakamenyana, umuguzi na we akagira amahitamo akurikije uko abona ibintu bimeze.
Umuhango wo gutangiza ku mugaragaro iri murikagurisha ry’inzu n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi uzaba tariki ya 17 Werurwe 2020, ahazaba hari abayobozi batandukanye mu nzego bwite za leta, iz’umutekano, imiryango itegamiye kuri leta, urugaga rw’abikorera n’abandi.
Mu mwaka ushize, imurikagurisha nk’iri ryari ryitabiriwe n’ibigo bigera kuri 20 byose bikora muri uru rwego rw’inyubako.
Muri iri murika rya 2019 kandi, RG Consult yamuritse imikorere ya ‘application’ ya telefoni yiswe “Murugo App”, ifasha abantu baba mu bukode kuzuza ibisabwa, bagahabwa amahirwe yo gutunga inzu zabo.

Title: Ishimwe rya Cogebanque yifashishije Tour du Rwanda mu gusangiza Abanyarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho
Body:
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani ishyigikira umukino w’amagare by’umwihariko isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka igihugu ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020’’, aho yaryifashishije isobanurira abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho.
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani ishyigikira umukino w’amagare by’umwihariko isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka igihugu ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020’’, aho yaryifashishije isobanurira abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho.
Cogebanque ni umuterankunga w’imena wa Tour du Rwanda 2020 ndetse yaherekeje iri rushanwa aho ryanyuze hose. Isiganwa ry’uyu mwaka ryegukanywe n’Umunya- Erythrée w’imyaka 20, Natnael Tesfatsion.
Abanyarwanda bo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu baryohewe n’umukino w’amagare ariko banegerezwa serivisi z’imari.
Binyuze mu bukangurambaga bwiswe “AGUKA NA COGEBANQUE”, bamwe bafunguje konti, barizigamira, abandi bagura amakarita ya Mastercard abafasha guhererekanya amafaranga mu ikoranabuhanga.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Iyamamazabikorwa muri Cogebanque, Iyamuremye Antoine, yabwiye IGIHE ko isiganwa ryabafashije kwegereza abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari.
Yagize ati ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020 yabaye umwanya mwiza wafashije abantu kwagukana natwe, haba mu gufunguza konti, kubona inguzanyo no kwizigamira cyane ko Abanyarwanda aribyo bifuza.’’
Ubukangurambaga bwo gushishikariza Abanyarwanda kwizigamira bunajyanye na gahunda y’igihugu y’ubwiswe ‘Ejo Heza’ bwatangijwe mu Ukuboza 2018.
Inyigo yakozwe iteganya ko mu mwaka umwe ubu bwizigame buzagera ku basaga 207 000 bashobora kuzigama miliyari 14,5 Frw, mu gihe mu myaka itanu abagera kuri miliyoni ebyiri bakwizigama miliyari 195 Frw.
Iyamuremye yavuze ko ‘‘Dutanga n’umusanzu wo gukangurira abantu serivisi z’imari no kwizigamira bijyanye n’icyerekezo cy’iterambere ry’igihugu.’’
‘‘Twigishije Abanyarwanda ko badakwiye kugendana ibifurumba by’amafaranga kuko umutekano wayo utaba wizewe. Iyo ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga biba byiza kuko aho ujya hose mu Rwanda no hanze uryifashisha bikoroheye.’’
U Rwanda rufite intego ko mu mwaka wa 2024, amafaranga abarirwa ku kigero cya 80 % y’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu azajya ahererekanywa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, avuye kuri 34.6% mu 2019.
Muri gahunda za Cogebanque Plc zo gufasha Abanyarwanda kuzamura ubukungu bwabo no gukemura ibibazo bitandukanye, yakomeje gushyira abakiliya igorora ibaha inguzanyo ku mushahara izwi nka ‘Gisubizo Loan Express’, itangwa nta ngwate.
Gisubizo Loan Express ni inguzanyo Cogebanque itanga ku bakiliya bayo babona umushahara wa buri kwezi. Ikubye inshuro zigera kuri 15 z’umushahara umuntu ahembwa ku kwezi, na we akagenda yishyura agera kuri 50% by’umushahara we buri kwezi.
Muri Tour du Rwanda 2020, Cogebanque ni yo yahembye umukinnyi urusha abandi guterera imisozi ; ni igihembo cyegukanywe na Taaramäe Rein ukinira Total Direct Energie yo mu Bufaransa.
Iyamuremye yavuze ko icyo gihembo bagifata nk’uburyo bwo kugaragaza ikoranabuhanga ryambuka umupaka.
Ati ‘‘Abakinnyi batsinze tubashishikariza ko bahabwa amafaranga mu ikoranabuhanga. Uriya mukinnyi twizera ko azaduhagararira neza akaba ambasaderi wacu mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.’’
Yavuze ko Tour du Rwanda 2020 yatanze umusaruro ufatika ugereranyije n’umwaka washize.
Ati ‘‘Ibyo twateganyaga twabigezeho ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize. Byatweretse ko n’abafite konti muri banki bashobora gukoresha ikoranabuhanga cyane ko iyo mikoranire ihinduka.’’
Cogebanque Plc ifite amashami 28 mu gihugu hose aho ifite ibyuma bya ATM 34, aba-agents barenga 600 bayifasha gutanga serivisi zo gufunguza konti, kubitsa no kubikuza zirimo n’izifashisha ikoranabuhanga binyuze muri Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, smart cash card n’amakarita ya MasterCard (Debit, Credit na Prepaid) afasha abayakoresha kwishyura no kubikuza ahantu harenga miliyoni 36 ku Isi yose.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

Title: Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda mu nzira yo gushaka ahandi batumiza ibicuruzwa kubera coronavirus
Body:
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda bari gusiganwa n’igihe mu gushaka ubundi buryo batumizamo ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho bikenerwa n’abatari bake bakundaga gutumiza mu Bushinwa, kubera ihungabana ry’ubucuruzi ryatewe n’icyorezo cya ‘Coronavirus’, byatumye kugeza ubu ububiko bwabo butangiye gukendera.
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda bari gusiganwa n’igihe mu gushaka ubundi buryo batumizamo ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho bikenerwa n’abatari bake bakundaga gutumiza mu Bushinwa, kubera ihungabana ry’ubucuruzi ryatewe n’icyorezo cya ‘Coronavirus’, byatumye kugeza ubu ububiko bwabo butangiye gukendera.
U Rwanda rutumiza mu Bushinwa ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga n’amashanyarazi, imashini, ibikoresho byo kubaka, ibicuruzwa bikozwe mu ibumba, inkweto, imyenda, ibinyabiziga n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Umunyamabanga wa kabiri ushinzwe ubukungu n’ubucuruzi muri ambasade y’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, Li Zhen, yabwiye Rwanda Today ko nyuma y’aho RwandAir ihagarikiye ingendo zayo zerekeza mu Bushinwa kuva ku ya 31 Mutarama 2020, byagize ingaruka ku ngendo n’ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Ingaruka ku buryo bwo guhererekanya ibicuruzwa zageze no ku mishinga imwe n’imwe ikomeje gukorwa ishingiye ku bikoresho fatizo biva mu Bushinwa.“
Li Zhen yakomeje avuga ko u Bushinwa bwafashe ingamba nyinshi nko gushyiraho ikigega nterankunga kidasanzwe, kugabanya imisoro, kongera amafaranga y’ingengo y’imari no koroshya uburyo bwo kongera kwemerera inganda gukora mu rwego rwo kwihutisha kongera umusaruro w’inganda no gutera inkunga amasoko, hanashyirwa ingufu mu gukumira icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Usibye intara ya Hubei, ifite umurwa mukuru Wuhan ari na wo icyorezo cyatangiriyemo, izindi ntara zasubukuye ibikorwa byo gukora ibicuruzwa byari bisanzwe bikorwa. Mu ntara zimwe na zimwe, igipimo cyo gusubukura imirimo kimaze kugera kuri 70 %.
Icyakora ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa bitumizwa mu Bushinwa biteganyijwe ko bizamuka mu mezi ari imbere, niba ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus ridahagaritswe.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Michel Sebera yagize ati "Dutangiye kubona igabanuka ry’ibicuruzwa ku isoko, ariko kandi ibintu bishobora kurushaho kugenda nabi mu mezi ari imbere."
Urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda rwagaragaje ibihugu nka Turikiya, u Buhinde, Dubai na Misiri nk’ahandi haturuka ibicuruzwa byavaga mu Bushinwa.
Kugeza ubu batiri ya telefone yari isanzwe igura amafaranga ibihumbi 10 ($ 10), yageze ku bihumbi hafi 15 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ($ 15); ikirahure cya telefone ya iPhone 6 cyaguraga amafaranga 20 000 ($ 20), ubu ni hafi 25 000 ($ 25) cyangwa 30 000 ($ 30) mu maduka amwe n’amwe.
Izabiriza Jeanne, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Heart of Africa Trading, isosiyete itumiriza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa abacuruzi benshi bakorera i Kigali yavuze ko bari gukorana na PSF kugira ngo barebe ko hari ahandi bakura ibicuruzwa.
Ati "Itsinda rya mbere rizerekeza muri Turikiya kuya 9 Werurwe, ariko na none bizatwara igihe kugira ngo turangure ibicuruzwa tunabihabwe; hagati aho tuzahura n’igabanuka ry’ibicuruzwa ku isoko."
Izabiriza yavuze ko abacuruzi benshi baheruka gutumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa hagati y’Ugushyingo na tariki ya 15 Ukuboza 2019, bityo bakaba bagombaga kwinjiza ibindi bicuruzwa bishya muri Gashyantare, ariko bikaba bitarashobotse kubera iki cyorezo.
Guhungabana k’ubucuruzi bw’ikoranabuhanga
Gufunga amabanki mu Bushinwa byakomeje iki kibazo, kubera ko bitashobokaga koherereza amafaranga abacuruzi bo mu Bushinwa kugira ngo na bo babe babasha kuboherereza ibicuruzwa.
Clement Ishimwe, usanzwe atumiza ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga mu Bushinwa, yavuze ko batajyaga barenza ukwezi batagiye mu Bushinwa kurangura ibindi bicuruzwa, ndetse bamwe bajyagayo buri cyumweru, ariko ubu ngo babuze uko basubirayo.
Ati "Nta gihugu gishobora kuduha ibyo u Bushinwa bwajyaga buduha mu bijyanye n’ibicuruzwa bihendutse".
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda basanzwe bagurisha ikawa, urusenda n’ibindi bicuruzwa bifite agaciro kari hagati y’ibihumbi 10 na 20 by’amadorari binyuze ku rubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rwa Alibaba kuri ubu babuze uko bohereza ibicuruzwa byabo mu Bushinwa.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi n’iyamamazabikorwa muri Gorillas coffee, Benjamin Nkurunziza, yagize ati "Twahagaritse by’agateganyo ibikorwa byacu, ntidushobora kwakira ubundi busabe bw’abashaka ibicuruzwa byacu kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ndetse n’abo twari tumaze kubona ntitwashoboye kubagezaho ibyo basabye; ibintu byose byarahagaze."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RwandAir, Yvonne Makolo yavuze ko kuva RwandAir yafungura inzira yerekeza Guangzhou muri Kamena umwaka ushize; byageze mu Kwakira 2019 ingendo eshatu za buri cyumweru zigaragara nk’izari zihagije, kuko byatumye RwandAir iba kimwe mu bigo bitwara abagenzi mu ndege byunguka cyane.
Makolo ati “Turi gukurikiranira hafi uko iki cyorezo kiri gukwirakwira ku isi, tunakora imibare y’uburyo bizatugiraho ingaruka by’umwihariko, cyane cyane ko ari ikibazo ku bagenzi no ku mizigo. Turi gukorana na Minisiteri y’ubuzima n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa bose.”
Kubera ubushyamirane buri hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda, benshi mu banyamuryango b’Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda batangiye gutumiza ibicuruzwa bakeneye muri Aziya. Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda rwanatangije ikigega cyorohereza abacuruzi benshi gutumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa, ibintu byongereye umubare w’abanyarwanda batumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa.
Gusa ubu benshi muri bo bagowe no gutumiza ibyo bakeneye mu Bushinwa batangiye gutekereza kuyoboka inzira ya Kenya na Tanzania, aho abacuruzi baho bagifite ububiko buhagije.
Muri raporo ngarukakwezi yasohowe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy ‘Ibarurishamibare ku bucuruzi bwo hanze y’igihugu yasohotse mu kwezi k’Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwatumije mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 86,67 z’amadolari, bingana na 26% by’ibicuruzwa byose byatumijwe mu mahanga ndetse rwohereza mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 1,14 z’amadorali.
Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu igaragaza ko ibicuruzwa bituruka mu Bushinwa bingana na 20 ku ijana by’ibikomoka mu mahanga byinjira mu Rwanda buri mwaka.
Prof Thomas Kigabo, impuguke mu by’ubukungu muri Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, aherutse kuvuga ko hakiri kare ko u Rwanda rwamenya ingaruka ruzaterwa na Coronavirus ku bukungu bwarwo.
Ni mu gihe ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buteganyijwe kuzazamuka ku rugero rurenga gato 10% mu 2020, ariko bikaba byitezwe ko bushobora kuzagabanya umuvuduko nkuko byagenze ku bihugu byo mu karere bisanzwe byiringiye cyane isoko ryo mu Bushinwa.

Title: Hatangijwe imurika ry’ibyakorewe muri Oman, rifungura amarembo y’ubucuruzi hagati y’u Rwanda na Oman (Amafoto)
Body:
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yatangaje ko Oman igiye guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu n’ishoramari hagati y’icyo gihugu n’u Rwanda, ihereye ku imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri icyo gihugu ryatangijwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yatangaje ko Oman igiye guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu n’ishoramari hagati y’icyo gihugu n’u Rwanda, ihereye ku imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri icyo gihugu ryatangijwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri Oman (Omani Products Exhibition: OPEX) ry’iminsi ine ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020 riri kubera muri Kigali Convention Centre, rizanye abamurika barenga 80 bahagarariye ibigo n’inganda bikomeye muri Oman.
Ibimurikwa birimo ibicuruzwa by’inganda zitunganya ibiribwa n’ibikomoka mu Nyanja, ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi n’ibyo mu nzu, ibijyanye n’uburezi, ubukerarugendo, amavuta n’imibavu, ubukorikori n’ubugeni. Hari kandi ibijyanye na serivisi z’ubuzima, ibikoreshwa mu gukwirakwiza amazi n’amashanyarazi nk’amatiyo n’insinga, ibyerekeye ikoranabuhanga, gupfunyika ibicuruzwa bitandukanye n’ibindi.
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yavuze ko umubano wa Oman n’u Rwanda mu bya dipolomasi umeze neza bakaba bifuza kuzamura n’ushingiye ku bucuruzi n’ishoramari ari nayo ntego y’iryo murikagurisha.
Ati “Intego ni ukuzamura ubucuruzi hagati y’u Rwanda na Oman, umubano mu bya Politiki umeze neza, amateka yerekana ko ukomeye cyane, ariko imikoranire mu by’ubukungu ntabwo ikomeye nkawo, turashaka gukomeza uwo mubano tugira amamurikagurisha nk’iri kugira ngo abanyarwanda bamenye ibikorerwa muri Oman cyangwa bagure ibicuruzwa. Hari n’abanya-Oman bazifuza kuzana ibicuruzwa byabo mu Rwanda.”
Ni imurikabikorwa rya mbere Oman ikoreye mu Rwanda, rikaba irya kane muri Afurika naho muri rusange ni irya 10 mu yo bakorera hanze ya Oman.
Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan yavuze ko ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda bafunguye amarembo y’ubufatanye mu by’ubucuruzi n’ishoramari.
Ati “Nibwo bwa mbere mu Rwanda ariko turizera ko dufunguye amarembo mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.”
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda w’u Rwanda, Soraya Hakuziyaremye yavuze ko u Rwanda ruzashyigikira iyo mikoranire, asaba abanyarwanda kubyaza umusaruro ayo mahirwe.
Ati “Ndasaba abazitabira imurikagurisha kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe no kunoza imikoranire mu by’ubucuruzi ku rwego rwo hejuru rushoboka.”
Abaje kumurika babwiye IGIHE ko biteguye kuganira n’abanyarwanda ku mikoranire itandukanye irimo kuba bajya kurangurayo ibicuruzwa cyangwa guhagararira inganda n’ibigo byabo mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wa sosiyete yitwa Aljoory Boukbar ikora imibavu y’umwimerere mu bimera biboneka muri Oman cyane cyane igiti cyitwa frankincence, Muna Al Shukairi yavuze ko baje mu Rwanda kumurika ibyo bakora ariko banashaka gukorana n’abanyarwanda bakaba bahafungura iduka ricuruza iyo mibavu.
Ati “Ducururiza muri Oman ariko turi gushaka n’andi masoko hanze nko kuba twaribona mu Rwanda no mu bindi bihugu hirya no hino ku Isi.”
Nyuma y’amasaha make imurikagurisha rifunguwe, Umuyobozi w’uruganda rukora insinga z’amashanyarazi muri Oman (National Cable Factory LLC) Ali Mohd Masahli yabwiye IGIHE hari abari bamaze kumwereka ko bakeneye kumenya ibyo uruganda ahagarariye rukora kuburyo bizeye ko iminsi ine izarangira babonye abafatanyabikorwa.
OPEX ni gahunda yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa muri Oman binyuze mu mamurikabikorwa atandukanye. Yatangiye mu 2012 itangirijwe i Riyadh muri Arabie Saoudite ikaba yaratumye ibikorerwa muri Oman ubu byoherezwa mu bihugu birenga 140.
Imurikabikorwa ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa 29 Gashyantare 2020 rizajya ritangira kuva saa tanu z’amanywa kugeza saa moya z’umugoroba buri munsi kugeza ku itariki 3 Werurwe 2020 rizasoreswaho.
Amafoto: Uwihanganye Hardi

Title: Cogebanque yegereje abakunzi b’amagare serivisi zo kwizigamira (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050. Imwe mu nzira izarufasha kubigeraho ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwizigama mu Banyarwanda.
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050. Imwe mu nzira izarufasha kubigeraho ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwizigama mu Banyarwanda.
Intego igihugu cyihaye izagerwaho bigizwemo uruhare n’inzego zitandukanye n’ibigo bitanga serivisi z’imari kuko umutekano w’amafaranga uba wizewe.
Mu kwegera no gusobanurira Abanyarwanda ibyiza byo kwizigamira, Banki Nyarwanda y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani itera inkunga umukino w’amagare uri mu ikunzwe mu Rwanda yifashishije isiganwa rya 2020 mu kubagezaho ubwo butumwa.
Cogebanque ifasha abakunzi b’amagare muri buri gace gasorezwamo isiganwa gufunguza konti, kubitsa, kohereza no kubikuza amafaranga yabo kandi mu mutekano usesuye.
Mu Gace ka Kane ka Tour du Rwanda 2020 ka Rusizi-Rubavu kegukanywe n’Umunya-Erythrée Natnael Tesfatsion, Cogebanque yasangije ab’i Rubavu uko bakwizigamira.
Kabera Epimaque ukora akazi k’ubukanishi n’ubushoferi yishimiye ko yafunguje konti muri Cogebanque akabona amahirwe yo kwinjira muri tombola.
Yagize ati “Batuganirije kuri serivisi za Cogebanque, numva ari nziza nyinjiramo. Nafunguje konti ndabitsa mbona amahirwe yo kwinjira mu cyuma gitanga amafaranga, ntsindira ibihumbi 17 Frw.’’
“Kwizigamira ni ukwiteganyiriza, kuko ubitsa ukabikuza kandi isaha n’isaha ukamenya aho ubariza amafaranga yawe. Ahantu amafaranga aba abitse haba hatekanye ndetse ushobora no kubona inguzanyo ukiteza imbere.’’
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 30 utuye mu Murenge wa Gisenyi mu Karere ka Rubavu yashishikarije abadakorana na banki gukanguka bakagana ‘Cogebanque ikabibafashamo’.
Cogebanque Plc imaze imyaka 20 itanga serivisi za banki mu Rwanda aho yahinduye ubuzima bw’abayigana binyuze mu kubafasha kubona no gukoresha serivisi zitandukanye z’imari.
Ni umuterankunga w’imena wa Tour du Rwanda 2020 ndetse ihemba umukinnyi uzamuka cyane kurusha abandi muri buri gace. Ni igihembo cyerekana ubwiza bw’u Rwanda nk’igihugu cy’imisozi igihumbi n’iyi banki nk’itanga serivisi mpuzamahanga.
Cogebanque ifite konti zitandukanye zo kwizigamira! Zirimo Konti Teganya igufasha kuzigama buri kwezi, wabitsaho igihe icyo aricyo cyose ndetse n’amafaranga uko yaba angana kose; Konti Nteganyiriza Minuze igufasha kuzigamira amashuri y’abana; Konti Iyubakire igufasha kwizigamira inzu; Konti Shobora igufasha kugera ku mushinga wawe n’ubwizigame bw’igihe kirekire (Term deposit).
Konti za Cogebanque zemerewe abakiliya bose, zihuriye ku kubafasha kuzigama amafaranga mu buryo bworoshye kandi butekanye, nta mufuragiro w’ukwezi zicibwa ndetse zirungukirwa mu buryo bushimishije.
Teganya ni konti ishamikiye ku y’umukiliya, ishobora kubitswaho amafaranga ayo ariyo yose. Uyikoresha abitsaho igihe cyose kandi agakomeza kungukirwa bitewe n’amafaranga ayiriho. Amafaranga yazigamywe atangira kubyara inyungu iyo angana na 50.001 Frw.
Mu gufasha abategura ahazaza h’abana babo mu masomo, Cogebanque yanashyizeho Konti Nteganyiriza Minuze ifasha abazigamira amashuri y’abana.
Abayikoresha buri kwezi bazigama amafaranga ndetse bashobora kongera umubare w’ubwizigame igihe babishakiye, bibaha amahirwe yo kubona inyungu ihanitse.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

Title: Ibicuruzwa by’umwimerere: Isezerano ku bazitabira Expo y’ibyakorewe muri Oman rigiye kubera i Kigali
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Convention Centre nibwo imurikagurisha ry’abanya-Oman ritangira, ahitezwe kumurikirwa ibikoresho bitandukanye bikunzwe n’abatari bake ku isi kubera ubwiza n’umwihariko wo kuramba bizwiho.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Convention Centre nibwo imurikagurisha ry’abanya-Oman ritangira, ahitezwe kumurikirwa ibikoresho bitandukanye bikunzwe n’abatari bake ku isi kubera ubwiza n’umwihariko wo kuramba bizwiho.
Iri murikagurisha riri butangire kuri uyu wa 29 rikazasozwa ku wa 3 Werurwe 2020, rizitabirwa n’abacuruzi n’abashoramari basaga 80 baturutse muri Oman, aho biteguye kumurika ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi nk’amatiyo ya pulasitiki n’ay’ibyuma, insinga z’amashanyarazi n’iza fibre optique, sima n’ibindi byinshi.
Hazaba hari kandi n’ibikoreshwa mu buhinzi nk’amafumbire; ibikoresho byo mu rugo nk’ameza n’utubati; imitako y’ubukorikori; ibikomoka kuri peterori; ubuvuzi n’imiti y’ubwoko butandukanye; ibiribwa nk’amafi, amavuta, ikawa; ibikoresho bikozwe mu byuma, ubutare; imibavu n’ibindi bihuriye ku mwimerere w’ibikomoka muri Oman.
Hazaba hari kandi ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, serivisi za leta, uburezi, n’itangazamakuru biri mu mwihariko uzanywe n’iri murikagurisha.
Iri murikabigurisha ryiswe OPEX ryateguwe n’ikigo cyo muri Oman gishinzwe ishoramari no guteza imbere ibyoherezwa mu mahanga (Ithraa) n’urwego rushinzwe ubucuruzi n’inganda, Madayn.
Abategura iri murikagurisha bavuga ko ari uburyo bwiza bwo guhaha ku biciro byiza ndetse no ku bacuruzi bifuza kurangura ibicuruza bifite umwihariko kandi bihendutse.
Umuyobozi wa Komite itegura iri murikagurisha, Ayman bin Abdullah Al Hasani yavuze ko ibikoresho n’ibicuruzwa byakorewe muri Oman byujuje ubuziranenge mpuzamahanga ari naho bahera bavuga ko ibicuruzwa byabo bizishimirwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nta gushidikanya dufite ku bwitabire bw’Abanyarwanda muri iri murikagurisha kuko ibyakorewe iwacu byizewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga, ibyo bikaba byarigaragaje mu mamurikagurisha yabereye muri Qatar, Arabie Saoudite no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu.”
