Umuhango wo gutangiza ku mugaragaro iri murikagurisha ry’inzu n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi uzaba tariki ya 17 Werurwe 2020, ahazaba hari abayobozi batandukanye mu nzego bwite za leta, iz’umutekano, imiryango itegamiye kuri leta, urugaga rw’abikorera n’abandi.
Mu mwaka ushize, imurikagurisha nk’iri ryari ryitabiriwe n’ibigo bigera kuri 20 byose bikora muri uru rwego rw’inyubako.
Muri iri murika rya 2019 kandi, RG Consult yamuritse imikorere ya ‘application’ ya telefoni yiswe “Murugo App”, ifasha abantu baba mu bukode kuzuza ibisabwa, bagahabwa amahirwe yo gutunga inzu zabo.

Title: Ishimwe rya Cogebanque yifashishije Tour du Rwanda mu gusangiza Abanyarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho
Body:
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani ishyigikira umukino w’amagare by’umwihariko isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka igihugu ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020’’, aho yaryifashishije isobanurira abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho.
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani ishyigikira umukino w’amagare by’umwihariko isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka igihugu ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020’’, aho yaryifashishije isobanurira abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho.
Cogebanque ni umuterankunga w’imena wa Tour du Rwanda 2020 ndetse yaherekeje iri rushanwa aho ryanyuze hose. Isiganwa ry’uyu mwaka ryegukanywe n’Umunya- Erythrée w’imyaka 20, Natnael Tesfatsion.
Abanyarwanda bo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu baryohewe n’umukino w’amagare ariko banegerezwa serivisi z’imari.
Binyuze mu bukangurambaga bwiswe “AGUKA NA COGEBANQUE”, bamwe bafunguje konti, barizigamira, abandi bagura amakarita ya Mastercard abafasha guhererekanya amafaranga mu ikoranabuhanga.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Iyamamazabikorwa muri Cogebanque, Iyamuremye Antoine, yabwiye IGIHE ko isiganwa ryabafashije kwegereza abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari.
Yagize ati ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020 yabaye umwanya mwiza wafashije abantu kwagukana natwe, haba mu gufunguza konti, kubona inguzanyo no kwizigamira cyane ko Abanyarwanda aribyo bifuza.’’
Ubukangurambaga bwo gushishikariza Abanyarwanda kwizigamira bunajyanye na gahunda y’igihugu y’ubwiswe ‘Ejo Heza’ bwatangijwe mu Ukuboza 2018.
Inyigo yakozwe iteganya ko mu mwaka umwe ubu bwizigame buzagera ku basaga 207 000 bashobora kuzigama miliyari 14,5 Frw, mu gihe mu myaka itanu abagera kuri miliyoni ebyiri bakwizigama miliyari 195 Frw.
Iyamuremye yavuze ko ‘‘Dutanga n’umusanzu wo gukangurira abantu serivisi z’imari no kwizigamira bijyanye n’icyerekezo cy’iterambere ry’igihugu.’’
‘‘Twigishije Abanyarwanda ko badakwiye kugendana ibifurumba by’amafaranga kuko umutekano wayo utaba wizewe. Iyo ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga biba byiza kuko aho ujya hose mu Rwanda no hanze uryifashisha bikoroheye.’’
U Rwanda rufite intego ko mu mwaka wa 2024, amafaranga abarirwa ku kigero cya 80 % y’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu azajya ahererekanywa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, avuye kuri 34.6% mu 2019.
Muri gahunda za Cogebanque Plc zo gufasha Abanyarwanda kuzamura ubukungu bwabo no gukemura ibibazo bitandukanye, yakomeje gushyira abakiliya igorora ibaha inguzanyo ku mushahara izwi nka ‘Gisubizo Loan Express’, itangwa nta ngwate.
Gisubizo Loan Express ni inguzanyo Cogebanque itanga ku bakiliya bayo babona umushahara wa buri kwezi. Ikubye inshuro zigera kuri 15 z’umushahara umuntu ahembwa ku kwezi, na we akagenda yishyura agera kuri 50% by’umushahara we buri kwezi.
Muri Tour du Rwanda 2020, Cogebanque ni yo yahembye umukinnyi urusha abandi guterera imisozi ; ni igihembo cyegukanywe na Taaramäe Rein ukinira Total Direct Energie yo mu Bufaransa.
Iyamuremye yavuze ko icyo gihembo bagifata nk’uburyo bwo kugaragaza ikoranabuhanga ryambuka umupaka.
Ati ‘‘Abakinnyi batsinze tubashishikariza ko bahabwa amafaranga mu ikoranabuhanga. Uriya mukinnyi twizera ko azaduhagararira neza akaba ambasaderi wacu mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.’’
Yavuze ko Tour du Rwanda 2020 yatanze umusaruro ufatika ugereranyije n’umwaka washize.
Ati ‘‘Ibyo twateganyaga twabigezeho ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize. Byatweretse ko n’abafite konti muri banki bashobora gukoresha ikoranabuhanga cyane ko iyo mikoranire ihinduka.’’
Cogebanque Plc ifite amashami 28 mu gihugu hose aho ifite ibyuma bya ATM 34, aba-agents barenga 600 bayifasha gutanga serivisi zo gufunguza konti, kubitsa no kubikuza zirimo n’izifashisha ikoranabuhanga binyuze muri Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, smart cash card n’amakarita ya MasterCard (Debit, Credit na Prepaid) afasha abayakoresha kwishyura no kubikuza ahantu harenga miliyoni 36 ku Isi yose.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

Title: Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda mu nzira yo gushaka ahandi batumiza ibicuruzwa kubera coronavirus
Body:
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda bari gusiganwa n’igihe mu gushaka ubundi buryo batumizamo ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho bikenerwa n’abatari bake bakundaga gutumiza mu Bushinwa, kubera ihungabana ry’ubucuruzi ryatewe n’icyorezo cya ‘Coronavirus’, byatumye kugeza ubu ububiko bwabo butangiye gukendera.
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda bari gusiganwa n’igihe mu gushaka ubundi buryo batumizamo ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho bikenerwa n’abatari bake bakundaga gutumiza mu Bushinwa, kubera ihungabana ry’ubucuruzi ryatewe n’icyorezo cya ‘Coronavirus’, byatumye kugeza ubu ububiko bwabo butangiye gukendera.
U Rwanda rutumiza mu Bushinwa ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga n’amashanyarazi, imashini, ibikoresho byo kubaka, ibicuruzwa bikozwe mu ibumba, inkweto, imyenda, ibinyabiziga n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Umunyamabanga wa kabiri ushinzwe ubukungu n’ubucuruzi muri ambasade y’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, Li Zhen, yabwiye Rwanda Today ko nyuma y’aho RwandAir ihagarikiye ingendo zayo zerekeza mu Bushinwa kuva ku ya 31 Mutarama 2020, byagize ingaruka ku ngendo n’ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Ingaruka ku buryo bwo guhererekanya ibicuruzwa zageze no ku mishinga imwe n’imwe ikomeje gukorwa ishingiye ku bikoresho fatizo biva mu Bushinwa.“
Li Zhen yakomeje avuga ko u Bushinwa bwafashe ingamba nyinshi nko gushyiraho ikigega nterankunga kidasanzwe, kugabanya imisoro, kongera amafaranga y’ingengo y’imari no koroshya uburyo bwo kongera kwemerera inganda gukora mu rwego rwo kwihutisha kongera umusaruro w’inganda no gutera inkunga amasoko, hanashyirwa ingufu mu gukumira icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Usibye intara ya Hubei, ifite umurwa mukuru Wuhan ari na wo icyorezo cyatangiriyemo, izindi ntara zasubukuye ibikorwa byo gukora ibicuruzwa byari bisanzwe bikorwa. Mu ntara zimwe na zimwe, igipimo cyo gusubukura imirimo kimaze kugera kuri 70 %.
Icyakora ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa bitumizwa mu Bushinwa biteganyijwe ko bizamuka mu mezi ari imbere, niba ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus ridahagaritswe.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Michel Sebera yagize ati "Dutangiye kubona igabanuka ry’ibicuruzwa ku isoko, ariko kandi ibintu bishobora kurushaho kugenda nabi mu mezi ari imbere."
Urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda rwagaragaje ibihugu nka Turikiya, u Buhinde, Dubai na Misiri nk’ahandi haturuka ibicuruzwa byavaga mu Bushinwa.
Kugeza ubu batiri ya telefone yari isanzwe igura amafaranga ibihumbi 10 ($ 10), yageze ku bihumbi hafi 15 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ($ 15); ikirahure cya telefone ya iPhone 6 cyaguraga amafaranga 20 000 ($ 20), ubu ni hafi 25 000 ($ 25) cyangwa 30 000 ($ 30) mu maduka amwe n’amwe.
Izabiriza Jeanne, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Heart of Africa Trading, isosiyete itumiriza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa abacuruzi benshi bakorera i Kigali yavuze ko bari gukorana na PSF kugira ngo barebe ko hari ahandi bakura ibicuruzwa.
Ati "Itsinda rya mbere rizerekeza muri Turikiya kuya 9 Werurwe, ariko na none bizatwara igihe kugira ngo turangure ibicuruzwa tunabihabwe; hagati aho tuzahura n’igabanuka ry’ibicuruzwa ku isoko."
Izabiriza yavuze ko abacuruzi benshi baheruka gutumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa hagati y’Ugushyingo na tariki ya 15 Ukuboza 2019, bityo bakaba bagombaga kwinjiza ibindi bicuruzwa bishya muri Gashyantare, ariko bikaba bitarashobotse kubera iki cyorezo.
Guhungabana k’ubucuruzi bw’ikoranabuhanga
Gufunga amabanki mu Bushinwa byakomeje iki kibazo, kubera ko bitashobokaga koherereza amafaranga abacuruzi bo mu Bushinwa kugira ngo na bo babe babasha kuboherereza ibicuruzwa.
Clement Ishimwe, usanzwe atumiza ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga mu Bushinwa, yavuze ko batajyaga barenza ukwezi batagiye mu Bushinwa kurangura ibindi bicuruzwa, ndetse bamwe bajyagayo buri cyumweru, ariko ubu ngo babuze uko basubirayo.
Ati "Nta gihugu gishobora kuduha ibyo u Bushinwa bwajyaga buduha mu bijyanye n’ibicuruzwa bihendutse".
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda basanzwe bagurisha ikawa, urusenda n’ibindi bicuruzwa bifite agaciro kari hagati y’ibihumbi 10 na 20 by’amadorari binyuze ku rubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rwa Alibaba kuri ubu babuze uko bohereza ibicuruzwa byabo mu Bushinwa.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi n’iyamamazabikorwa muri Gorillas coffee, Benjamin Nkurunziza, yagize ati "Twahagaritse by’agateganyo ibikorwa byacu, ntidushobora kwakira ubundi busabe bw’abashaka ibicuruzwa byacu kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ndetse n’abo twari tumaze kubona ntitwashoboye kubagezaho ibyo basabye; ibintu byose byarahagaze."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RwandAir, Yvonne Makolo yavuze ko kuva RwandAir yafungura inzira yerekeza Guangzhou muri Kamena umwaka ushize; byageze mu Kwakira 2019 ingendo eshatu za buri cyumweru zigaragara nk’izari zihagije, kuko byatumye RwandAir iba kimwe mu bigo bitwara abagenzi mu ndege byunguka cyane.
Makolo ati “Turi gukurikiranira hafi uko iki cyorezo kiri gukwirakwira ku isi, tunakora imibare y’uburyo bizatugiraho ingaruka by’umwihariko, cyane cyane ko ari ikibazo ku bagenzi no ku mizigo. Turi gukorana na Minisiteri y’ubuzima n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa bose.”
Kubera ubushyamirane buri hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda, benshi mu banyamuryango b’Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda batangiye gutumiza ibicuruzwa bakeneye muri Aziya. Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda rwanatangije ikigega cyorohereza abacuruzi benshi gutumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa, ibintu byongereye umubare w’abanyarwanda batumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa.
Gusa ubu benshi muri bo bagowe no gutumiza ibyo bakeneye mu Bushinwa batangiye gutekereza kuyoboka inzira ya Kenya na Tanzania, aho abacuruzi baho bagifite ububiko buhagije.
Muri raporo ngarukakwezi yasohowe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy ‘Ibarurishamibare ku bucuruzi bwo hanze y’igihugu yasohotse mu kwezi k’Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwatumije mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 86,67 z’amadolari, bingana na 26% by’ibicuruzwa byose byatumijwe mu mahanga ndetse rwohereza mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 1,14 z’amadorali.
Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu igaragaza ko ibicuruzwa bituruka mu Bushinwa bingana na 20 ku ijana by’ibikomoka mu mahanga byinjira mu Rwanda buri mwaka.
Prof Thomas Kigabo, impuguke mu by’ubukungu muri Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, aherutse kuvuga ko hakiri kare ko u Rwanda rwamenya ingaruka ruzaterwa na Coronavirus ku bukungu bwarwo.
Ni mu gihe ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buteganyijwe kuzazamuka ku rugero rurenga gato 10% mu 2020, ariko bikaba byitezwe ko bushobora kuzagabanya umuvuduko nkuko byagenze ku bihugu byo mu karere bisanzwe byiringiye cyane isoko ryo mu Bushinwa.

Title: Hatangijwe imurika ry’ibyakorewe muri Oman, rifungura amarembo y’ubucuruzi hagati y’u Rwanda na Oman (Amafoto)
Body:
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yatangaje ko Oman igiye guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu n’ishoramari hagati y’icyo gihugu n’u Rwanda, ihereye ku imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri icyo gihugu ryatangijwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yatangaje ko Oman igiye guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu n’ishoramari hagati y’icyo gihugu n’u Rwanda, ihereye ku imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri icyo gihugu ryatangijwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri Oman (Omani Products Exhibition: OPEX) ry’iminsi ine ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020 riri kubera muri Kigali Convention Centre, rizanye abamurika barenga 80 bahagarariye ibigo n’inganda bikomeye muri Oman.
Ibimurikwa birimo ibicuruzwa by’inganda zitunganya ibiribwa n’ibikomoka mu Nyanja, ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi n’ibyo mu nzu, ibijyanye n’uburezi, ubukerarugendo, amavuta n’imibavu, ubukorikori n’ubugeni. Hari kandi ibijyanye na serivisi z’ubuzima, ibikoreshwa mu gukwirakwiza amazi n’amashanyarazi nk’amatiyo n’insinga, ibyerekeye ikoranabuhanga, gupfunyika ibicuruzwa bitandukanye n’ibindi.
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yavuze ko umubano wa Oman n’u Rwanda mu bya dipolomasi umeze neza bakaba bifuza kuzamura n’ushingiye ku bucuruzi n’ishoramari ari nayo ntego y’iryo murikagurisha.
Ati “Intego ni ukuzamura ubucuruzi hagati y’u Rwanda na Oman, umubano mu bya Politiki umeze neza, amateka yerekana ko ukomeye cyane, ariko imikoranire mu by’ubukungu ntabwo ikomeye nkawo, turashaka gukomeza uwo mubano tugira amamurikagurisha nk’iri kugira ngo abanyarwanda bamenye ibikorerwa muri Oman cyangwa bagure ibicuruzwa. Hari n’abanya-Oman bazifuza kuzana ibicuruzwa byabo mu Rwanda.”
Ni imurikabikorwa rya mbere Oman ikoreye mu Rwanda, rikaba irya kane muri Afurika naho muri rusange ni irya 10 mu yo bakorera hanze ya Oman.
Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan yavuze ko ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda bafunguye amarembo y’ubufatanye mu by’ubucuruzi n’ishoramari.
Ati “Nibwo bwa mbere mu Rwanda ariko turizera ko dufunguye amarembo mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.”
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda w’u Rwanda, Soraya Hakuziyaremye yavuze ko u Rwanda ruzashyigikira iyo mikoranire, asaba abanyarwanda kubyaza umusaruro ayo mahirwe.
Ati “Ndasaba abazitabira imurikagurisha kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe no kunoza imikoranire mu by’ubucuruzi ku rwego rwo hejuru rushoboka.”
Abaje kumurika babwiye IGIHE ko biteguye kuganira n’abanyarwanda ku mikoranire itandukanye irimo kuba bajya kurangurayo ibicuruzwa cyangwa guhagararira inganda n’ibigo byabo mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wa sosiyete yitwa Aljoory Boukbar ikora imibavu y’umwimerere mu bimera biboneka muri Oman cyane cyane igiti cyitwa frankincence, Muna Al Shukairi yavuze ko baje mu Rwanda kumurika ibyo bakora ariko banashaka gukorana n’abanyarwanda bakaba bahafungura iduka ricuruza iyo mibavu.
Ati “Ducururiza muri Oman ariko turi gushaka n’andi masoko hanze nko kuba twaribona mu Rwanda no mu bindi bihugu hirya no hino ku Isi.”
Nyuma y’amasaha make imurikagurisha rifunguwe, Umuyobozi w’uruganda rukora insinga z’amashanyarazi muri Oman (National Cable Factory LLC) Ali Mohd Masahli yabwiye IGIHE hari abari bamaze kumwereka ko bakeneye kumenya ibyo uruganda ahagarariye rukora kuburyo bizeye ko iminsi ine izarangira babonye abafatanyabikorwa.
OPEX ni gahunda yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa muri Oman binyuze mu mamurikabikorwa atandukanye. Yatangiye mu 2012 itangirijwe i Riyadh muri Arabie Saoudite ikaba yaratumye ibikorerwa muri Oman ubu byoherezwa mu bihugu birenga 140.
Imurikabikorwa ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa 29 Gashyantare 2020 rizajya ritangira kuva saa tanu z’amanywa kugeza saa moya z’umugoroba buri munsi kugeza ku itariki 3 Werurwe 2020 rizasoreswaho.
Amafoto: Uwihanganye Hardi

Title: Cogebanque yegereje abakunzi b’amagare serivisi zo kwizigamira (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050. Imwe mu nzira izarufasha kubigeraho ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwizigama mu Banyarwanda.
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050. Imwe mu nzira izarufasha kubigeraho ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwizigama mu Banyarwanda.
Intego igihugu cyihaye izagerwaho bigizwemo uruhare n’inzego zitandukanye n’ibigo bitanga serivisi z’imari kuko umutekano w’amafaranga uba wizewe.
Mu kwegera no gusobanurira Abanyarwanda ibyiza byo kwizigamira, Banki Nyarwanda y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani itera inkunga umukino w’amagare uri mu ikunzwe mu Rwanda yifashishije isiganwa rya 2020 mu kubagezaho ubwo butumwa.
Cogebanque ifasha abakunzi b’amagare muri buri gace gasorezwamo isiganwa gufunguza konti, kubitsa, kohereza no kubikuza amafaranga yabo kandi mu mutekano usesuye.
Mu Gace ka Kane ka Tour du Rwanda 2020 ka Rusizi-Rubavu kegukanywe n’Umunya-Erythrée Natnael Tesfatsion, Cogebanque yasangije ab’i Rubavu uko bakwizigamira.
Kabera Epimaque ukora akazi k’ubukanishi n’ubushoferi yishimiye ko yafunguje konti muri Cogebanque akabona amahirwe yo kwinjira muri tombola.
Yagize ati “Batuganirije kuri serivisi za Cogebanque, numva ari nziza nyinjiramo. Nafunguje konti ndabitsa mbona amahirwe yo kwinjira mu cyuma gitanga amafaranga, ntsindira ibihumbi 17 Frw.’’
“Kwizigamira ni ukwiteganyiriza, kuko ubitsa ukabikuza kandi isaha n’isaha ukamenya aho ubariza amafaranga yawe. Ahantu amafaranga aba abitse haba hatekanye ndetse ushobora no kubona inguzanyo ukiteza imbere.’’
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 30 utuye mu Murenge wa Gisenyi mu Karere ka Rubavu yashishikarije abadakorana na banki gukanguka bakagana ‘Cogebanque ikabibafashamo’.
Cogebanque Plc imaze imyaka 20 itanga serivisi za banki mu Rwanda aho yahinduye ubuzima bw’abayigana binyuze mu kubafasha kubona no gukoresha serivisi zitandukanye z’imari.
Ni umuterankunga w’imena wa Tour du Rwanda 2020 ndetse ihemba umukinnyi uzamuka cyane kurusha abandi muri buri gace. Ni igihembo cyerekana ubwiza bw’u Rwanda nk’igihugu cy’imisozi igihumbi n’iyi banki nk’itanga serivisi mpuzamahanga.
Cogebanque ifite konti zitandukanye zo kwizigamira! Zirimo Konti Teganya igufasha kuzigama buri kwezi, wabitsaho igihe icyo aricyo cyose ndetse n’amafaranga uko yaba angana kose; Konti Nteganyiriza Minuze igufasha kuzigamira amashuri y’abana; Konti Iyubakire igufasha kwizigamira inzu; Konti Shobora igufasha kugera ku mushinga wawe n’ubwizigame bw’igihe kirekire (Term deposit).
Konti za Cogebanque zemerewe abakiliya bose, zihuriye ku kubafasha kuzigama amafaranga mu buryo bworoshye kandi butekanye, nta mufuragiro w’ukwezi zicibwa ndetse zirungukirwa mu buryo bushimishije.
Teganya ni konti ishamikiye ku y’umukiliya, ishobora kubitswaho amafaranga ayo ariyo yose. Uyikoresha abitsaho igihe cyose kandi agakomeza kungukirwa bitewe n’amafaranga ayiriho. Amafaranga yazigamywe atangira kubyara inyungu iyo angana na 50.001 Frw.
Mu gufasha abategura ahazaza h’abana babo mu masomo, Cogebanque yanashyizeho Konti Nteganyiriza Minuze ifasha abazigamira amashuri y’abana.
Abayikoresha buri kwezi bazigama amafaranga ndetse bashobora kongera umubare w’ubwizigame igihe babishakiye, bibaha amahirwe yo kubona inyungu ihanitse.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

Title: Ibicuruzwa by’umwimerere: Isezerano ku bazitabira Expo y’ibyakorewe muri Oman rigiye kubera i Kigali
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Convention Centre nibwo imurikagurisha ry’abanya-Oman ritangira, ahitezwe kumurikirwa ibikoresho bitandukanye bikunzwe n’abatari bake ku isi kubera ubwiza n’umwihariko wo kuramba bizwiho.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Convention Centre nibwo imurikagurisha ry’abanya-Oman ritangira, ahitezwe kumurikirwa ibikoresho bitandukanye bikunzwe n’abatari bake ku isi kubera ubwiza n’umwihariko wo kuramba bizwiho.
Iri murikagurisha riri butangire kuri uyu wa 29 rikazasozwa ku wa 3 Werurwe 2020, rizitabirwa n’abacuruzi n’abashoramari basaga 80 baturutse muri Oman, aho biteguye kumurika ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi nk’amatiyo ya pulasitiki n’ay’ibyuma, insinga z’amashanyarazi n’iza fibre optique, sima n’ibindi byinshi.
Hazaba hari kandi n’ibikoreshwa mu buhinzi nk’amafumbire; ibikoresho byo mu rugo nk’ameza n’utubati; imitako y’ubukorikori; ibikomoka kuri peterori; ubuvuzi n’imiti y’ubwoko butandukanye; ibiribwa nk’amafi, amavuta, ikawa; ibikoresho bikozwe mu byuma, ubutare; imibavu n’ibindi bihuriye ku mwimerere w’ibikomoka muri Oman.
Hazaba hari kandi ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, serivisi za leta, uburezi, n’itangazamakuru biri mu mwihariko uzanywe n’iri murikagurisha.
Iri murikabigurisha ryiswe OPEX ryateguwe n’ikigo cyo muri Oman gishinzwe ishoramari no guteza imbere ibyoherezwa mu mahanga (Ithraa) n’urwego rushinzwe ubucuruzi n’inganda, Madayn.
Abategura iri murikagurisha bavuga ko ari uburyo bwiza bwo guhaha ku biciro byiza ndetse no ku bacuruzi bifuza kurangura ibicuruza bifite umwihariko kandi bihendutse.
Umuyobozi wa Komite itegura iri murikagurisha, Ayman bin Abdullah Al Hasani yavuze ko ibikoresho n’ibicuruzwa byakorewe muri Oman byujuje ubuziranenge mpuzamahanga ari naho bahera bavuga ko ibicuruzwa byabo bizishimirwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nta gushidikanya dufite ku bwitabire bw’Abanyarwanda muri iri murikagurisha kuko ibyakorewe iwacu byizewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga, ibyo bikaba byarigaragaje mu mamurikagurisha yabereye muri Qatar, Arabie Saoudite no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu.”
Umuyobozi wa Ithraa, Maymuna al Adawi yavuze ko kuba ubukungu bw’u Rwanda bukomeje kuzamuka ubutitsa, bikwiriye kubera urugero ibindi bihugu bya Afurika.
Yavuze ko uko gutera imbere k’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda no kuba butajegajega ari byo bituma abashoramari mpuzamahanga bifuza kuza kuhashora imari.
Yagize ati “Mu gihe ibihugu bitandukanye byari bizwiho kohereza ibicuruzwa hanze biri kujegajega mu bukungu, u Rwanda rwo rukomeje kongera umusaruro rukura mu byoherezwa hanze.”
Oman imaze kuba igihugu cyigaruriye imitima y’abashoramari benshi bo hirya no hino ku isi kubera umutungo kamere wa peterori gifite n’iterambere ry’inganda by’umwihariko izikora ibyuma ryashinze imizi muri kiriya guhugu.
Iki gihugu gituranye na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, hafi na Dubai, kikaba kigizwe n’imisozi, ubutayu n’imirambi hafi y’inyanja. Abaturage bacyo basaga miliyoni 4.5, biganjemo abayisilamu.
Nibura umuturage umwe wa Oman abarirwa ko yinjiza amadolari asaga ibihumbi 15 buri mwaka, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 14 Frw.
Inkuru bijyanye: Ibyo wakwitega mu imurikagurisha ry’ibicuruzwa byo muri Oman rigiye gutangira i Kigali

Title: COVID-19: Koperative Umwalimu Sacco yorohereje abayifitemo inguzanyo, ihagarika kubara inyungu z’ubukererwe
Body:
Koperative Umwalimu Sacco yemereye abanyamuryango bayo bayifitemo inguzanyo gusaba ihagarikwa ryo kuyishyura mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, igihe imishinga bashoyemo yaba yaragizweho ingaruka n’ingamba zo kwirinda COVID-19.
Koperative Umwalimu Sacco yemereye abanyamuryango bayo bayifitemo inguzanyo gusaba ihagarikwa ryo kuyishyura mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, igihe imishinga bashoyemo yaba yaragizweho ingaruka n’ingamba zo kwirinda COVID-19.
Mu gihe cy’amezi atatu kandi, yahagaritse kubara inyungu z’ubukererwe ku nguzanyo zishyurwa buri kwezi.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’umuyobozi mukuru w’iyo Koperative, Uwambaje Laurence, rivuga ko Koperative Umwalimu Sacco yiteguye gutanga amezi atatu hatishyurwa inguzanyo, bakazavugurura amasezerano nyuma ya COVID-19.
Rigira riti “Umwalimu Sacco yiteguye gutanga igihe kigera ku mezi atatu hatishyurwa inguzanyo ku bo bigaragara ko imishinga bashoyemo izo nguzanyo ari nayo yaturukagamo ubwishyu yagizweho ingaruka n’ihagarikwa ry’imirimo bityo bakazavurugururirwa amasezerano y’inguzanyo nyuma y’ibi bihe bikomeye turimo.”
Iyi Koperative ivuga ko uko koroherezwa binareba abanyamuryango batazahabwa imishahara yabo nk’uko bisanzwe, cyane cyane abarimu bigisha mu bigo byigenga.
Umwalimu Sacco itangaza kandi ko “yiteguye gufasha abanyamuryango bayo bafite inguzanyo zishyurwa ku mushahara mu gihe izo nguzanyo zashowe mu mishinga ibyara inyungu zunganiraga iyo mishahara, isubika ubwishyu bw’ishyingu (Capital) mu mezi atatu hagakomeza kwishyurwa inyungu gusa bityo igihe inguzanyo yari kuzarangirira kikaziyongeraho ayo mezi ishyingu ritishyuwemo”.
Iyo Koperative yanatangaje ko yiteguye gufasha abanyamuryango bayo bose, ihagarika kubara inyungu z’ubukererwe ku nguzanyo zishyurwa buri kwezi mu gihe cy’amezi atatu guhera muri Mata kugeza muri Kamena 2020”.
Itangazo rivuga ko abanyamuryango bifuza guhabwa izo serivisi bakohereza ubusabe bwabo kuri email: [email protected] ndetse n’izabacungamutungo b’amashami atandukanye basabiyemo inguzanyo cyangwa bakabahamagara kuri telefoni zabo ziri ku mugereka bakabafasha kubona ubufasha bwose bakeneye.
Umwalimu Sacco utangaza ko abanyamuryango bazaba bahawe imwe muri izo serivisi batazemererwa guhabwa indi nguzanyo iyo ariyo yose kugeza ibihe byo kwirinda Coronavirus birangiye ndetse ngo abashoboye gukomeza kwishyura inguzanyo bazakomeza bazishyure.
Iyi Koperative yafashe icyo cyemezo mu rwego rwo korohereza abanyamuryango kubera ko hari abagiye bafata inguzanyo ku mishahara bakazikoresha mu bikorwa bibyara inyungu bishobora kuba byarahagaze muri iki gihe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus kandi ubwishyu buturuka ku mishahara hamwe n’inyungu zikomoka kuri iyo mishinga.

Title: COVID-19: U Buyapani bwashoye miliyari hafi igihumbi zo kuzahura ubukungu
Body:
Leta y’u Buyapani yiyemeje gutanga hafi miliyari 1000 z’amadolari zo kurinda ubukungu bwayo kugwa muri ibi bihe Isi ihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Leta y’u Buyapani yiyemeje gutanga hafi miliyari 1000 z’amadolari zo kurinda ubukungu bwayo kugwa muri ibi bihe Isi ihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Minisitiri w’Intebe Shinzo Abe kuri uyu wa Mbere yatangaje ko miliyari 989 zigiye kwifashishwa mu kuzahura ubukungu n’ubucuruzi bwari butangiye guhura n’ihungabana.
Mu mafaranga yatanzwe harimo miliyari zo gufasha imiryango n’abafite ubucuruzi buciriritse batakibasha kugira icyo binjiza kubera amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus. Harimo kandi amafaranga yo kuziba icyuho cy’imisoro yinjiraga ndetse n’ayo gufasha za banki gutanga inguzanyo zitagira inyungu.
Biteganyijwe ko amakuru arambuye ku cyo ayo mafaranga azakoreshwa azatangazwa mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru Minisitiri w’Intebe Shinzo azatanga kuri uyu wa Kabiri.
U Buyapani ni kimwe mu bihugu bike bimaze gushora amafaranga menshi mu kuzahura ubukungu bwabyo muri ibi bihe by’ihungabana ry’ubukungu ryatewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus nkuko CNN yabitangaje.
Mu kwezi gushize, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zatanze miliyari ibihumbi bibiri z’amadolari yo gufasha kuzahura ubukungu. Niyo mafaranga menshi y’ingoboka yo kuzahura ubukungu icyo gihugu cyarekuye mu mateka yacyo.
Ibindi bihugu birimo u Bufaransa, u Budage, u Bwongereza, u Butaliyani na Espagne nabyo byatangaje ko bifite imigambi yo gushora menshi mu kuzahura ubukungu bwabyo.
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Mbere u Buyapani bufite abarwayi ba Coronavirus 3600 naho abamaze gupfa ni 85.

Title: Leta yagaragaje uko miliyari 100 Frw zatanzwe na IMF zizakoresha n’ingaruka zitezwe mu bukungu
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko inguzanyo ya miliyoni 100.4$ ni ukuvuga miliyari 104 Frw, yagurijwe n’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Imari, IMF, azakoreshwa mu rwego rw’ubuzima ndetse no kugoboka abaturage bagizweho ingaruka n’ingamba zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, bahabwa ibiribwa.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko inguzanyo ya miliyoni 100.4$ ni ukuvuga miliyari 104 Frw, yagurijwe n’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Imari, IMF, azakoreshwa mu rwego rw’ubuzima ndetse no kugoboka abaturage bagizweho ingaruka n’ingamba zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, bahabwa ibiribwa.
Aya mafaranga yatanzwe mu rwego rw’inguzanyo zihuse (Rapid Credit facility), zihabwa ibihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere igihe bifite impamvu zihutirwa zikeneye gushyirwamo amafaranga, zikishyurwa by’igihe kirekire kandi zihendutse.
Ni inguzanyo u Rwanda rwahawe nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe ruyisabye, ikaba iri ku nyungu ya 0%, ikazishyurwa mu gihe cy’imyaka 10 uhereye mu myaka itanu n’igice iri imbere.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Ndagijimana Uzziel, yabwiye RBA, ko aya mafaranga atagenewe umushinga runaka, ahubwo ari ayajya mu ngengo y’imari akaziba icyuho giterwa n’uko muri iki gihe leta igomba gukoresha amafaranga menshi cyane cyane nko mu rwego rw’ubuzima.
Ati “Kugira ngo haboneke ibyangombwa byose byo gupima abantu, kuvuza ababonetseho uburwayi no kubona ibikoresho bitandukanye ndetse no gutabara abaturage badafite imirimo bakeneye iby’ibanze cyane cyane nk’ibyo kurya, ibyo ni ibintu bitari biteganyijwe mu ngengo y’imari byasabye ko dukoresha ayo dufite ariko dushaka n’andi yo kugira ngo azibe icyo cyuho”.
Minisitiri Ndagijimana avuga ko kimwe n’ahandi ku Isi, icyorezo cya Coronavirus kizagira ingaruka ku izamuka ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda, aho muri uyu mwaka bushobora kuzazamuka kuri 5.1% aho kuba 8.1% nk’uko byari byitezwe.
Ati “Ingengo y’imari izagirwaho ingaruka n’ubwoko bubiri; icya mbere ni uko amafaranga yagombaga kwinjira mu isanduku ya leta ava mu misoro azagabanuka urebye no ku bucuruzi byagaragaye ko amahoro yatangiye kugabanuka avuye ku bitumizwa hanze ariko n’imisoro y’imbere mu gihugu bitewe n’uko ibikorwa nabyo byasubiye inyuma, birasobanura ko n’imisoro ivamo nayo izagabanuka”.
“Icyuho cya kabiri kijyanye no gukoresha amafaranga menshi mu bintu bitunguranye. Twasubiye mu mibare yacu ijyanye n’imizamukire y’ubukungu, muzi ko umwaka ushize twari twageze ku muvuduko w’umusaruro mbumbe wa 9.4% ubwo ni 2019, muri uyu mwaka kubera nyine icyorezo, ubu twasubiye mu mibare dufatanyije n’ikigega mpuzamahanga cy’imari turateganya ko umuvuduko wamanuka ukagera kuri 5.1%”.
Uretse guhabwa inguzanyo na IMF, u Rwanda ruri mu biganiro na Banki y’Isi na Banki Nyafurika Itsura amajyambere, mu gushaka amafaranga yo kuziba icyuho mu bukungu bwarwo no guhangana na Coronavirus.
Minisitiri Ndagijimana asobanura ko izi nguzanyo nta kibazo zizateza ubukungu bw’igihugu kuko nk’iyatanzwe na IMF, izatangira kwishyura mu myaka itanu n’igice kandi ubukungu buzaba bwarazamutse ku buryo n’ubushobozi bwo kwishyura buzaba bwaramaze kwiyongera.
Ikindi kandi ni uko buri gihugu kiguza gishingiye ku bushobozi bwo kwishyura, bityo kikaba kitafata amafaranga arengeje ubushobozi busanzwe buteganyijwe bwo gukoresha inguzanyo.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda yatangaje ko kugeza kuri uyu wa 3 Mata 2020, umubare w’abarwayi ba Coronavirus mu gihugu umaze kugera kuri 89.
Inkuru bifitanye isano: IMF yemeje miliyari zisaga 100 Frw zizafasha u Rwanda mu bikorwa byo guhangana na Coronavirus

Title: Coronavirus: BK yorohereje abo yahaye inguzanyo, itanga miliyoni 282 Frw zo gufasha abatishoboye
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali bwemereye abahawe inguzanyo ariko ibikorwa byabo bigahungabanywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ko bashobora kongererwa igihe cyo kwishyura, inatanga miliyoni 282 Frw zo kwifashishwa mu kunganira abatishoboye.
Ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali bwemereye abahawe inguzanyo ariko ibikorwa byabo bigahungabanywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ko bashobora kongererwa igihe cyo kwishyura, inatanga miliyoni 282 Frw zo kwifashishwa mu kunganira abatishoboye.
 	Abafite ibikorwa byahungabanye bashobora guhabwa amezi atatu batishyura inguzanyo
 	Abifuza gukomeza kwishyura bazakurirwaho inyungu z’ubutinde
 	BK igiye gushyikiriza Leta miliyoni 282 Frw zo gufasha abatishoboye
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ikomeje gukora ibishoboka byose mu gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi, ndetse iheruka gufata icyemezo cyo guhagarika ibikorwa bituma abantu bahurira hamwe birimo iby’ubucuruzi, abantu basabwa kuguma mu rugo ndetse imipaka irafungwa. Inama y’abaminisitiri iheruka kwemeza ko icyo gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri kizongerwaho iminsi 15.
Izi ngamba ni ingenzi mu gukumira Coronavirus, ariko zahungabanyije ibikorwa bitandukanye by’ubukungu ku buryo bikeneye kunganirwa, kugira ngo umunsi icyorezo cyagiye ku ruhande, ibikorwa bizasubire ku murongo.
Abatewe impungenge cyane n’iki cyorezo barimo abaryaga ari uko uwo munsi bakoze n’abacuruzi bafite inguzanyo ariko ibikorwa byabo byahagaze, kandi nta muntu uzi igihe ikibazo kizarangirira.
Banki ya Kigali nka banki ya mbere mu Rwanda inatanga inguzanyo nyinshi, yafashe ibyemezo bikomeye mu gushyigikira abakiliya bayo kimwe n’abanyarwanda batishoboye, bari mu bihe bitoroshye by’ubukungu kubera Coronavirus.
Mu byemezo byashyizwe ahagaragara kuri uyu wa Gatanu, ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali bwashimangiye ko “Banki ya Kigali yiteguye gutanga igihe kigeze ku mezi atatu hatishyurwa inguzanyo ku bo bigaragara ko ubukungu bwabo bwagizweho ingaruka n’ibi bihe bikomeye turimo.”
Yakomeje iti “Abakiliya bifuza gukomeza kwishyura inguzanyo zabo, tuzabakuriraho inyungu z’ubutinde ku nguzanyo zishyurwa buri kwezi, harimo n’inguzanyo za BKquick ndetse hakurweho inyungu z’ubutinde kuri Credit Card mu mezi ya Werurwe, Mata na Gicurasi 2020.”
Banki ya Kigali yatangaje ko abakiliya bifuza gufashwa muri ubwo buryo, bahamagara abakozi ba banki bakorana umunsi ku wundi cyangwa abayobozi b’amashami basabiyemo inguzanyo, bakabafasha kubona ubufasha bwose bakeneye kuri banki "muri iki igihe gikomeye turimo."
BK yatanze miliyoni 282 Frw zo gufasha abatishoboye
Banki ya Kigali yanatangaje ko mu rwego rwo gufasha imiryango ihanganye n’iki kibazo cya Coronavirus, Umuryango wa Banki ya Kigali uzatanga ku bihembo bigenerwa abakozi bayo, mu gutera inkunga ikigega cya COVID-19 Solidarity Fund.
Iyi banki yakomeje iti "Ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali buzashyikiriza Leta 282,000,000 Frw, akaba ari nayo izakurikirana uko ayo mafaranga azakoreshwa mu gufasha imiryango itishoboye yagezweho n’ingaruka z’iki cyorezo.”
Ni inkunga izunganira cyane ibikorwa bikomeje byo gushyikiriza amafunguro abantu batakiva mu rugo kubera ingamba zafashwe, kandi bararyaga ari uko bakoze.
BK ivuga ko muri ibi bihe bitoroshye, imibereho myiza y’Abaturarwanda iyiha agaciro gakomeye, ibizeza gukomeza kubaha serivisi zose za banki cyane cyane bifashisha imiyoboro y’ikoranabuhanga.
Ikomeza iti “Twiyemeje gukomeza gutanga umusanzu wacu mu guharanira umutekano wa buri wese mu rugamba rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.”
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Kane Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yari imaze gutangaza ko abanduye Coronavirus mu Rwanda ari 84. Ku rwego mpuzamahanga abamaze kuyandura barenze miliyoni imwe, abapfuye ni ibihumbi 45 naho abakize ni ibihumbi 220.
Mu rwego rwo gukumira iyi ndwara, ibihugu byahagaritse ubucuruzi mpuzamahanga ndetse ibyinshi byamaze gusaba abaturage kuguma mu ngo guhera muri Aziya, u Burayi, Amerika, Océanie na Afurika, ku buryo ubukungu bw’ibihugu n’ibikorwa by’abaturage byahungabanye.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda iheruka kwemerera banki kongerera abakiliya bazo igihe cyo kwishyura imyenda isigaye, mu gihe bagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus. Hanashyizweho inguzanyo y’ingoboka ya miliyari 50 Frw banki yakwiyambaza igihe igize ikibazo cy’amafaranga.
Kugeza ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019, inguzanyo Banki ya Kigali yatanze zazamutseho 19.3% ugereranyije n’umwaka wabanje, zigera kuri miliyari 678 Frw.
Kugeza kuri iyo tariki, BK yari imaze guha serivisi abakiliya 331,000 n’abakiliya banini 24,000. Ifite amashami 68, ibyuma 94 bya ATM n’ibyuma 2,233 bya POS bikoreshwa mu kwishyurana mu ikoranabuhanga, mu rwego rwo gukomeza kwirinda guhererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki hanirindwa ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Mu gihembwe cya kane cy’umwaka ushize wa 2019, umutungo mbumbe wa BK warenze miliyari 1000 Frw nyuma yo kuzamuka 19.3% mu gihe inyungu yayo yageze kuri miliyari 37.3 Frw, bingana n’izamuka rya 36.3%.

Title: BPR Plc yemereye abayifashemo inguzanyo kongera igihe cyo kwishyura
Body:
Banki y’Abaturage y’u Rwanda, BPR Plc yemeye gufasha abakiliya bayifashemo inguzanyo ariko ubucuruzi bwabo bugahungabanywa n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus, ko bashobora kongererwa igihe cyo kwishyura inguzanyo kugeza ku mezi atatu.
Banki y’Abaturage y’u Rwanda, BPR Plc yemeye gufasha abakiliya bayifashemo inguzanyo ariko ubucuruzi bwabo bugahungabanywa n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus, ko bashobora kongererwa igihe cyo kwishyura inguzanyo kugeza ku mezi atatu.
Ni inkuru nziza ku bakiliya b’iyi banki, kuko muri iki gihe mu buryo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus mu gihugu, ibikorwa byinshi byahagaritswe, abaturage basabwa kuguma mu rugo, ingendo hagati y’uturere n’imipaka bigafungwa.
Bamwe mu bafite impungenge ni abacuruzi bafashe inguzanyo muri banki, ibikorwa bikaba byarahagaze kandi bafite inshingano zo kwishyura buri kwezi ideni bafashe.
BPR Plc yatangaje ko yiteguye gufasha abakiliya bayo, bakongererwa igihe cyo kwishyura, yaba amafaranga bagurijwe cyangwa inyungu zayo, mu gihe ibikorwa byabo bicyisuganya kubera ingaruka za COVID-19.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa BPR Plc, Maurice Toroitich, yabwiye IGIHE ko ubu buryo buzunganira cyane abantu barimo guhura n’ingaruka z’iki cyorezo.
Ati “Birareba umukiliya wese uzagaragaraza ko ibikorwa bye byahungabanyijwe na COVID-19, kubera ko twumva neza uburyo barimo guhura n’ibibazo by’amikoro.”
Iyi banki ivuga ko izakira ubusabe bw’abakiliya bayo, buri kibazo kikazajya gisuzumwa hakurikijwe ingaruka zigaragazwa ibikorwa byagize kubera Coronavirus.
Kugeza ubu ntabwo biramenyekanya igihe Coronavirus izamara mu Rwanda cyangwa ingaruka izagira mu buryo bwimbitse, nubwo iz’ibanze zatangiye kugaragara.
BPR Plc ivuga ko abagizweho ingaruka bashobora gusaba koroherezwa kwishyura inguzanyo banditse ubusabe bwabo kuri [email protected] Ni mu gihe amwe mu mashami y’iyi banki yabaye afunzwe by’agateganyo, akaba atari gukora nk’ibisanzwe mu rwego rwo gukumira Coronavirus.
Kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Rwanda ni abantu 84, mu gihe ku rwego mpuzamahanga abamaze kwandura barenze miliyoni imwe.
BPR Atlas Mara ikorera mu gihugu hose, aho ifite amashami arenga 186. Ibarura ko mu bakiliya bayo ifitemo inguzanyo zigera kuri miliyari 174 Frw.

Title: COVID-19: Miliyoni 13 Frw zimaze gucibwa abazamuye ibiciro by’ibiribwa i Kigali: Iyo badakumirwa hari gucura iki?
Body:
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 21 Werurwe, Kampire Florence wo mu Murenge wa Nyamata yagiye guhaha, asanga bimwe mu biribwa yari asanzwe ahaha byagiye bizamurirwa igiciro, abacuruzi bitwaje ko igihugu kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo guhashya icyorezo cya COVI-19.
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 21 Werurwe, Kampire Florence wo mu Murenge wa Nyamata yagiye guhaha, asanga bimwe mu biribwa yari asanzwe ahaha byagiye bizamurirwa igiciro, abacuruzi bitwaje ko igihugu kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo guhashya icyorezo cya COVI-19.
Nubwo ibiciro byari byazamutse, Kampire yabwiye IGIHE ko atari uko abacuruzi bari basubiye kurangura ngo baranguzwe ku giciro cyo hejuru, kuko icyo gihe bari bagicuruza ibyo basanganywe mu bubiko.
Ati “Umuceri n’isukari byazamutse cyane, abacuruzi batubwira ko imipaka yafunzwe batakibasha kuyirangura hanze. Nk’umuceri wa Pakistan umufuka twawuguraga ibihumbi 21 none wageze kuri 26, urumva amafaranga yiyongereyeho ni menshi nyamara iyo urebye usanga batugurisha uwo basanganwe mu bubiko.”
Ibyabaye kuri Kampire byanabaye ku bandi hirya no hino mu gihugu, aho hari abacuruzi bumvise ko hashyizweho amabwiriza yo kuguma mu ngo ku baturage, bakazamura ibiciro kugira ngo bunguke amafaranga menshi dore ko abashaka ibiribwa muri iyi minsi ari benshi.
Ibiciruzwa nk’umuceri, isukari, kawunga, amavuta n’amakara ni bimwe mu byongerewe igiciro ku buryo bukomeye.
Bigitangira kumenyekana, tariki 15 Werurwe Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yari yatanze umuburo, ko umucuruzi uzazamura ibiciro yitwaje icyorezo azabihanirwa.
Aganira na RBA, Minisitiri Soraya Hakuziyaremye yagize ati “Ibiciro by’ibiribwa by’ibanze ntibigomba guhinduka, ibyinshi nk’umuceri, ibirayi, imboga byose ni ibyo twihingira hano iwacu [...] Turasaba abafite amaduka kuturiza ibiciro bitwaje iki cyorezo”
Yakomeje asaba abaturage gutanga amakuru aho babonye iki kibazo “Turasaba abaturage ko mu gihe habaho ko abacuruzi runaka bazamura ibiciro bitwaje ibi bihe bidasanzwe, kwegera inzego z’ibanze, kuko dufatanyije nazo ndetse n’ikigo cy’Igihugu gifite mu nshingano kurengera umuguzi."
Kugeza kuwa Gatatu tariki ya 1 Mata, uhereye tariki 17 Werurwe, Minicom yatangazaga ko imaze guhana abacuruzi n’ibigo by’ubucuruzi 157 mu Mujyi wa Kigali, aho baciwe amande angana na 13 460 000 Frw. Hari kandi n’abafungiwe ubucuruzi.
Urebye ku rwego rw’igihugu, abaciwe amande n’abafungiwe ni benshi kuko mu minsi yabanje hari abacuruzi bo mu turere two hanze ya Kigali, Minicom yagiye igaragaza bahanwe. Nko kugeza kuwa 26 Werurwe mu turere twa Muhanga na Musanze, abacuruzi 63 bari bamaze gucibwa amande angana na 1195000 Frw.
Byari kugenda bite iyo Minicom idafata ingamba?
Igihe cyose abashaka ibicuruzwa ari benshi, ababicuruza ari bake ni ihame ko abacuruzi bashaka kongera ibiciro kugira ngo bunguke menshi.
Igitandukanye kuri ubu, ni uko Minicom yijeje ko ibiribwa mu gihugu bihari kuko nubwo hahagaritswe urujya n’uruza rw’abantu, ibinyabiziga bitwaye ibicuruzwa cyane cyane imyaka n’ibiribwa ntabwo byahagaritswe ku buryo abacuruzi bavuga ko bagiye kubirangura bakabibura.
Umusesenguzi mu by’ubukungu, Teddy Kaberuka, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyo hadafatwa ingamba z’ubugenzuzi no guhana abacuruzi bazamuye ibiciro, byashoboraga kuzamurwa nta mpamvu kandi gusubira hasi bikagorana.
Ati “Bari gukomeza kuzamura ibiciro kandi mu buryo buhoraho. Ni ukuvuga ngo uyu munsi barabizamura, umunsi ukurikiye bakongera kubera ko babona ko abantu nta bwinyagamburiro, bakarushaho kuzamura ku buryo ushobora gusanga nko mu byumweru bibiri ibiciro bimaze guhinduka nk’inshuro zirenga eshanu.”
Kaberuka avuga ko ubusanzwe ibiciro bihinduka bitewe n’uko aho byaturukaga bitagihari, bikaba ngombwa ko abacuruzi bajya kubivana kure noneho bakongeraho amafaranga ya rwa rugendo bakoze bajya kubizana.
Ntabwo ariko ubu bimeze kuko imodoka zavanaga ibicuruzwa mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu ziracyagenda, ndetse n’izivana ibicuruzwa mu mahanga zikomeje kuza.
Ati “Iyo ibiciro bikomeje kuzamuka, wa muguzi atakaza ubushobozi cyane ko nta n’icyo noneho aba yinjiza mu gihe nk’iki. Niba warizigamiye ibihumbi ijana uvuga uti bizantunga mu byumweru bibiri, iyo ibiciro bitumbagiye ntabwo bwa bushobozi wari ufite bwo kugutunga mu byumweru bibiri biba bigishoboka. Ushobora gusanga nyuma y’iminsi ine ya mafaranga arangiye.”
Hategekimana Léonard ucururiza ahazwi nko mu Gihogere munsi ya Controle Technique arangurira mu isoko rya Kimironko. Yabwiye IGIHE ko ibiciro Minicom yashyizeho byari byiza kandi bikwiye ariko ko nabo bahendwa iyo bagiye kurangura.
Ati “Ni ibiciro bikwiriye koko ku banyarwanda ariko ni uko akenshi ibicuruzwa kuri ibyo biciro bashyizeho bitaboneka neza tukabishaka tukabibura, ariko ubundi ibiciro byashyizweho byari ibiciro byiza kandi bikwiriye.”
Kaberuka Teddy yavuze ko ubugenzuzi bw’ibiciro n’ibihano aho bibaye ngombwa mu bihe nk’ibi kuko bishobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku bukungu bw’igihugu kuko ibiciro byazamutse bidapfa kongera kugabanyuka.
Ati “Iyo habaye igihungabanya ubukungu , umuntu wese icyo afite yumva yacyungukaho birenze. Leta itabashije gushyiramo izo mbaraga ibiciro byakomeza kuzamuka. Ikibaho ku isoko, iyo igiciro cyazamutse biragoye ko kimanuka.”
Kuwa 16 Werurwe nibwo Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom) yatangaje ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa bimwe na bimwe bitagomba kurenzwa ku maguriro yo hirya no hino mu gihugu, iburira abazabirengaho bitwaje ko igihugu kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Inkuru bijyanye: Minicom yatangaje ibiciro ntarengwa by’ibicuruzwa, iburira abacuruzi babirenza bitwaje Coronavirus
MINICOM yashyizeho ibiciro ntarengwa by’amakara akomeje kuzamura ibiciro

Title: IMF yemeje miliyari zisaga 100 Frw zizafasha u Rwanda mu bikorwa byo guhangana na Coronavirus
Body:
Inama y’Ubuyobozi y’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Imari, IMF, yemeje ko u Rwanda ruhabwa inguzanyo ya miliyoni 109.4 z’amadorali ya Amerika (agera muri miliyari 104 Frw), azifashishwa mu bikorwa byo guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa n’agakoko gashya ka Coronavirus, gikomeje kwibasira Isi.
Inama y’Ubuyobozi y’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Imari, IMF, yemeje ko u Rwanda ruhabwa inguzanyo ya miliyoni 109.4 z’amadorali ya Amerika (agera muri miliyari 104 Frw), azifashishwa mu bikorwa byo guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa n’agakoko gashya ka Coronavirus, gikomeje kwibasira Isi.
Aya mafaranga yatanzwe mu rwego rw’inguzanyo zihuse (Rapid Credit facility), zihabwa ibihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere igihe bifite impamvu zihutirwa zikeneye gushyirwamo amafaranga, zikishyurwa by’igihe kirekire kandi zihendutse.
IMF ivuga ko ingaruka z’icyorezo cya COVID-19 mu bukungu ziri kugaragara, bikazagera no ku cyerekezo cya hafi ibihugu byari bifite. Gusa abayobozi bihutiye gushyiraho ingamba zo gufasha kwirinda no kugabanya ikwirakwizwa ry’iki cyorezo.
Byitezwe ko aya mafaranga azunganira ingufu z’ubuyobozi mu guhagarika igabanuka ry’ubwizigame mu mafaranga y’amahanga akenerwa, no kunganira ingengo y’imari mu kongera amafaranga ashyirwa mu bikorwa byo gukumira icyorezo no kugabanya ingaruka cyagira ku bukungu. Aya mafaranga kandi byitezwe ko asembura izindi nkunga z’amahanga, cyane cyane mu buryo bw’impano.
Nyuma y’ibiganiro byemerejwemo ayo mafaranga, Umuyobozi wungirije w’Inama y’Ubuyobozi ya IMF, Tao Zhang, yavuze ko icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyahungabanyije ubukungu bw’u Rwanda, ku buryo byari kugira ingaruka ku mafaranga igihugu cyinjiza n’ayo gikeneye gukoresha.
Ubwo Coronavirus yatahurwaga mu Rwanda, hafashwe ingamba zo kuyikumira zirimo gufunga imipaka, ingendo n’ibikorwa byinshi by’ubucuruzi, ku buryo ingaruka za Coronavirus zageze ku bikorwa byose bibyara inyungu. Bitewe n’ibibazo bijyana n’iki cyorezo no kuba nta wamenya igihe kizarangirira, ingaruka zishobora gukomeza kwiyongera.
Zhang yakomeje ati "Inkunga ya IMF binyuze mu nguzanyo zihutirwa izafasha mu kugabanya igitutu COVID-19 ikomeje gushyira ku bucuruzi, ubukerarugendo n’ububiko bw’amafaranga y’amahanga akenerwa mu ivunjisha, kandi izatanga ubushobozi bukenewe cyane mu rwego rw’ubuzima, ku ngo n’ibigo byagizweho ingaruka n’ibi bibazo. Ikwiye kandi kuba nk’intangiriro y’abaterankunga."
IMF inatanga inama ko mu mikoreshereze y’imari, amafaranga aba akwiye kwifashishwa mu bintu byihutirwa, ariko ntihanibagirane izindi nzego z’ingenzi mu buzima bw’abaturage.
Aya mafaranga yemejwe mu gihe umubare w’abamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Rwanda wageze ku bantu 82.
Ku rwego mpuzamahanga, abamaze kwandura Coronavirus bamaze kurenga miliyoni imwe, abamaze gupfa ni ibihumbi 53 naho abamaze gukira ni ibihumbi 212.

Title: COVID-19: Sosiyete z’indege zizahomba miliyari 252$ kubera guhagarika ingendo
Body:
Igihombo ibigo bikora ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bizaterwa n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, biteganyijwe ko kiziyongera kikagera kuri miliyari 252$, bitewe n’uko ibihugu byinshi byafunze imipaka ku ndege zitwara abagenzi ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa, ibi byose bikazasubiza inyuma ubukungu.
Igihombo ibigo bikora ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bizaterwa n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, biteganyijwe ko kiziyongera kikagera kuri miliyari 252$, bitewe n’uko ibihugu byinshi byafunze imipaka ku ndege zitwara abagenzi ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa, ibi byose bikazasubiza inyuma ubukungu.
Ni ku nshuro ya gatatu Ihuriro Mpuzamahanga rya Sosiyete z’indege (IATA), rigaragaza ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’ubukungu muri IATA, Brian Pierce, avuga ko ‘bitewe n’ubukana bwo guhagarika ingendo ndetse n’igabanuka ry’ubukungu ku Isi, kuri ubu hateganyijwe ko igihombo ku byinjizwa n’indege zitwara abagenzi gishobora kugera kuri miliyari 252$, bingana n’igabanuka rya 44% by’ibyabonetse mu 2019”.
Iri teganya rishingiye ku bishobora guterwa no guhagarika ingendo kugeza ku mezi atatu, ndetse n’uburyo ubukungu bwakongera kuzahurwa nyuma yaho muri uyu mwaka.
Kuwa 5 Werurwe, IATA yateganyaga ko igihombo sosiyete z’ubwikorezi bw’indege zizahura nacyo kizaba miliyari 113$. Ibi byari mbere y’uko ibihugu byinshi bihagarika ingendo z’indege zitwara abagenzi.
Umuyobozi wa IATA, Alexandre de Juniac, yavuze ko sosiyete z’ubwikorezi bw’indege zikeneye miliyari 200$ ako kanya zo gushyigikira ibikorwa byazo.
IATA ivuga ko gusubira inyuma k’urwego rw’ubwikorezi bw’indege bizatuma hari akazi kagera kuri miliyoni 65 kazabura.
Nubwo ubwikorezi bw’imizigo bwiyongereye bitewe n’ibikenewe cyane muri iyi minsi, IATA, ivuga ko kugabanuka kw’ingendo z’abagenzi bisobanuye ko hari amafaranga yinjizwaga azagabanyuka.
Umwaka ushize sosiyete z’indege zahombye miliyoni ijana z’amadolari, mu gihe Covid-19, yakomeza kwiyongera igihombo kizazamuka cyane.

Title: Access Bank Rwanda yasabye abakiriya bayo gukoresha uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga birinda COVID-19
Body:
Access Bank Rwanda irashishikariza abakiriya bayo gukoresha uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga, bufasha abakiriya kuba bakoresha serivisi za banki bari mu rugo. Ibi biri mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus no kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda yashyizweho.
Access Bank Rwanda irashishikariza abakiriya bayo gukoresha uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga, bufasha abakiriya kuba bakoresha serivisi za banki bari mu rugo. Ibi biri mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus no kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda yashyizweho.
Iyi banki yagize iti “Hagendewe ku ngamba zashyizweho mu guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, turabakangurira gukoresha uburyo banki yanyu yabashyiriyeho, kugira ngo mukomeze gahunda zanyu aho muri hose.”
 “Uburyo bwacu bw’ikoranabuhanga buzabafasha kohererezanya mafaranga, kwishyurana, kugenzura konti zanyu n’ibindi.”
 Access Bank Rwanda ivuga ko umuntu ashobora kwiyandikisha ku miyoboro itandukanye nka ‘Access Mobile USSD’ kuburyo yabasha gukoresha serivisi za Banki kuri telefone ye ngendanwa. Kwiyandikisha biroroshye ni ugukanda *903*1# ugakurikiza amabwiriza.
 Ushobora kureba amafaranga ari kuri konti yawe, kohereza amafaranga (kuri mobile money no mu zindi banki), kubona PayDay Loan (Inguzanyo ku mushahara itangirwa kuri telefone), kugura ikarita yo guhamagara, umuriro, Startimes ndetse n’ibindi.
Ushobora kandi kuba wanakoresha uburyo bwa Access Pay online banking wishyura imisoro ndetse unohereza amafaranga ku bantu benshi batandukanye icyarimwe (Bulk transfers).
Hari kandi WhatsApp Banking yagufasha kugera kuri serivizi za Access Bank Rwanda ukoresheje WhatsApp, bisaba kwandikira izi nimero +250738000903 ukoresheje WhatsApp.
Access Bank Rwanda ivuga ko ukeneye ibindi bisobanuro, wabariza kuri: 0788145300, cyangwa kuri [email protected]
Access Bank Rwanda Plc ni imwe muri banki zikomeye mu Rwanda, umwaka ushize ikaba yarahawe impamyabushobozi eshatu zikomeye ku rwego rw’amabanki, zishimangira ubushobozi bwayo mu gutanga serivisi nziza ku bakiriya no kurinda umutekano wa konti zabo n’uw’amakuru ya banki muri rusange.

Title: Ibigo by’imari bigeze he bifasha ababigana mu guhangana na COVID-19?
Body:
Nyuma y’aho Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda ishyiriyeho ingamba zizafasha ibigo by’imari n’amakoperative guhangana n’ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’igihugu; ibigo bitandukanye bikomeje gushyiraho gahunda zo gufasha abakiriya n’abanyamuryango babyo, zirimo kuborohereza mu kwishyura inguzanyo bari baratse no gukurirwaho ikiguzi cya serivisi zitandukanye.
Nyuma y’aho Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda ishyiriyeho ingamba zizafasha ibigo by’imari n’amakoperative guhangana n’ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’igihugu; ibigo bitandukanye bikomeje gushyiraho gahunda zo gufasha abakiriya n’abanyamuryango babyo, zirimo kuborohereza mu kwishyura inguzanyo bari baratse no gukurirwaho ikiguzi cya serivisi zitandukanye.
Mu itangazo BNR yashyize hanze ku wa Gatatu tariki 18 Werurwe 2020, yavuze ko mu ngamba zafashwe harimo kwemerera banki kongerera abakiliya bazo igihe cyo kwishyura imyenda isigaye, mu gihe bagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus.
BNR yakomeje itangaza ko yasanze ari ngombwa gufasha amabanki kubona amafaranga ahagije, bituma kuri gahunda isanganywe yo kuyafasha kubona amafaranga, yongeraho ‘Inguzanyo y’ingoboka yishyurwa mu gihe cyisumbuye ku gisanzwe’.
Koperative yo kuzigama no kugiriza ‘Zigama CSS’ yatangaje ko ku ruhande rwayo yorohereje abanyamuryango bayo bafite umwenda, ubu bakaba bemerewe kwishyura inyungu gusa muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19, ishyingu (capital) bakazaryishyura ibihe bikomeye birangiye.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Zigama CSS, Col Corneille Emile Nkundimana, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyo habaye icyorezo nk’iki, umuntu aba akwiye kureba niba ibyo ashinzwe gukora yarushaho kubikora neza bikagirira akamaro abo abikorera.
Ati “Abanyamuryango bacu ntibaba mu ngo zabo, ubwo abandi babasaba kuguma mu rugo, bo ubu nibwo bari ku kazi. Bamwe barinze imipaka, abandi barinze abantu bari kugenda kandi imiryango yabo na yo iri mu rugo.”
Yongeyeho ko bavuganye n’ubuyobozi, bemeza ko guhera muri uku kwezi abanyamuryango bafite umwenda wa koperative bazishyuzwa gusa inyungu kugira ngo ideni ritazamuka ariko inguzanyo isanzwe yo ikazishyurwa icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyarangiye.
Ati “Iki cyemezo kizakomeza gukurikizwa mu gihe cyose ibihe bitari byahinduka, ariko na none ntibizarenza umwaka umwe kuko byahita bihungabanya cyane ubukungu bwa koperative ntibe ikibashije gufasha abanyamuryango.”
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) iherutse kwemerera ibigo by’imari bikorera mu Rwanda gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo byagiranye n’abakiliya babyo kugira ngo azorohereze ababibereyemo imyenda mu gihe cyo kwishyura no gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Equity Bank Rwanda, Hannington Namara, na we yabwiye IGIHE ko mu rwego rwo kurushaho gufasha abakiriya babo n’abataraba abakiliya kuguma mu rugo kandi bakabona serivisi za banki bakeneye; bashyizeho uburyo butandukanye burimo gukuraho ikiguzi icyo ari cyo cyose kijyana no gukura amafaranga kuri konti ndetse no gufungura konti nshya bidasabye umuntu kujya kuri banki cyangwa kwegera umu-agent.
Ati “Icyo twakoze ni ugukuraho impamvu yose yakajyanye abantu kuri banki ku buryo ibyo bakeneye byose babikorera kuri telephone zabo.”
Mu rwego rwo gufasha amabanki, BNR yatangaje ko igiye ‘kugabanya igipimo gitegetswe cy’amafaranga y’ubwizigame banki itajya munsi’, aho yatangaje ko “mu rwego rwo gufasha amabanki gukomeza gufasha inzego z’ubucuruzi zizahungabanywa na coronavirus, yiyemeje ko kuva tariki 1 Mata 2020, igipimo gitegetswe cy’amafaranga y’ubwizigamo banki zitajya munsi kigabanukaho 1% bityo bikaba 4% aho kuba 5%.”
BNR kandi yashyizeho inguzanyo y’ingoboka ya miliyari 50 Frw banki zakwiyambaza igihe zigize ikibazo cy’amafaranga.
Yanatangaje ko izakomeza gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ingamba zose zashyizweho mu rwego rw’ubukungu no gukomeza gusesengura ingaruka za Coronavirus kandi yiteguye kuba yafata izindi ngamba zikwiye.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda yashishikarije abaturarwanda gukoresha amahirwe yo gukurikirwaho ikiguzi cyo kwishyurana no guhererekanya amafaranga hadakoreshejwe kashi bityo bakitabira uburyo buhari bw’imiyoboro y’ikoranabuhanga.
Kugeza ubu ibikorwa hafi ya byose ubukungu bw’ibihugu bushingiyeho byasubiye inyuma kubera umuvuduko icyorezo cya COVID-19 kiri gukwirakwiraho hirya no hino ku Isi.
Abasesenguzi bavuga ko ubukungu bw’isi buzasubira inyuma kuruta uko byagenze mu myaka 12 ishize, ubwo ubukungu bw’isi bwahungabanaga muri rusange kuko amasoko y’imari n’imigabane nka kimwe mu bimenyetso bikomeye bigaragaza uko ubukungu buhagaze, yahungabanye cyane ku ikubitiro.

Title: Kigali: Ku munsi umwe abacuruzi 18 bahaniwe kuzamura ibiciro
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yatangaje ko ikomeje gahunda yo guhana abacuruzi bari kuzamura ibiciro bitwaje ibihe bidasanzwe byo kwirinda no kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Novel Coronavirus, cyugarije Isi.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yatangaje ko ikomeje gahunda yo guhana abacuruzi bari kuzamura ibiciro bitwaje ibihe bidasanzwe byo kwirinda no kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Novel Coronavirus, cyugarije Isi.
Kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki ya 26 Werurwe 2020, MINICOM yatangaje ko yahannye abacuruzi 18 bo mu turere twa Gasabo na Nyarugenge, bafatiwe mu makosa yo kuzamura ibiciro, kudatanga inyemezabwishyu no kutamanika ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa byabo aho abakiriya babibona, bagamije na bwo kugurisha ku giciro kinyuranye n’ibyashyizweho.
Tariki ya 16 na 22 Werurwe 2020, MINICOM yasohoye amatangazo asaba abacuruzi bose kubahiriza ibikubiye mu itegeko nomero 36/2012 ryo ku wa 21 Nzeri 2012 rigena ihiganwa no kurengera abaguzi ndetse n’itegeko nomero 35/91 ryo ku wa 5 Kanama 1991 rigena imitunganyirize y’ubucuruzi bw’imbere mu gihugu nk’uko ryavuguruwe n’itegeko nomero 15/2001 ryo ku wa 21 Mutarama 2001.
Iyi minisiteri ivuga ko ishingiye ku igenzura imaze iminsi ikora ku masoko manini n’ahandi hakorerwa ubucuruzi mu Mujyi wa Kigali, aho bigaragara ko hari abacuruzi bakomeje kuzamura ibiciro ku biribwa, abandi bagakoresha iminzani itujuje ubuziranenge, hakaba n’abatanga inyemezabuguzi zitajyanye n’ibyaguzwe […] isaba abacuruzi kureka kwica amategeko.
MINICOM yanasabye ko igiciro cy’umufuka w’amakara yari amaze kuba ikibazo hirya no hino, ko kitagomba kurenza amafaranga y’u Rwanda 10 500 mu kurangura, abacuruza na bo bagasabwa kutarenza 12 000 mu gihe bari kuyaha abakiriya babo.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda ivuga ko umucuruzi uzafatwa anyuranya n’amategeko yashyizweho, azahanwa n’ingingo ya 52 n’iya 55 zigize itegeko rigenga ihiganwa no kurengera abaguzi ndetse no gukurwaho kuva kuri 5% kugeza ku 10% by’umusaruro w’ikigo cye mu mwaka ukurikiyeho cyangwa akaba yatanga amande ari hagati y’ibihumbi 200 na miliyoni eshanu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, mu gihe umucuruzi yaba ananiwe kwerekana impapuro zigaragaza ibicuruzwa bye mu mwaka.
Kuva tariki ya 17 kugera ku ya 26 Werurwe 2020, MINICOM imaze guhana abacuruzi n’ibigo by’ubucuruzi 108 mu Mujyi wa Kigali baciwe amande angana na 8 500 000 Frw. Mu Karere ka Musanze na Muhanga, hamaze guhanwa abacuruzi 63 baciwe amande angana na 1 195 000 Frw.
Itegeko rigenga imitunganyirize y’ubucuruzi bw’imbere mu gihugu ryemerera leta gutanga ihazabu y’inyongera, isaba uwagaragaweho kunyuranya n’amategeko kwishyura inyungu yungutse ku muguzi no guhagarika ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byateye ayo makosa mu gihe cy’amezi atatu.

Title: Afreximbank igiye gutanga miliyari 3$ yo guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus muri Afurika
Body:
Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi (Afreximbank), yatangaje ko izatanga inkunga ya miliyari eshatu z’amadolari ya Amerika, yo gufasha ibihugu binyamuryango kuri uyu mugabane ngo bishobore guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi (Afreximbank), yatangaje ko izatanga inkunga ya miliyari eshatu z’amadolari ya Amerika, yo gufasha ibihugu binyamuryango kuri uyu mugabane ngo bishobore guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi nkunga yemejwe n’ubuyobozi bw’inama y’ubutegetsi y’iyi banki, yateranye tariki 20 Werurwe 2020.
Umugabane wa Afurika ukomeje kwibasirwa na Coronavirus yibasiye Isi muri rusange, imibare igaragaza ko mu bihugu 54 bigize uyu mugabane, iki cyorezo cyamaze kugera mu bihugu 43, abantu barenga 1700 bamaze kwandura naho 56 bamaze gupfa.
Ibi byatumye ibihugu byinshi kuri uyu mugabane bifata ingamba zikomeye kugira ngo iki cyorezo kidakomeza gukwirakwira mu buryo bworoshye, harimo guhagarika ingendo z’indege n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubucuruzi.
Tariki 13 uku kwezi, Ikigo Nyafurika cy’ibarurishamibare (ECA), cyatangaje ko uyu mugabane uzahomba akayabo ka miliyari 65 z’amadolari ya Amerika kubera ihungabana ry’ibikomoka kuri peteroli na miliyari 101 z’amadolari kubera ibyo woherezaga mu mahanga muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Iyi banki ivuga ko iyi nkunga izakoreshwa mu gufasha ibihugu bigize Afreximbank mu bijyanye n’ingaruka iki cyorezo kirimo guteza, byaba mu by’ubuzima ndetse n’ubukungu.
Itangazo ryayo rivuga ko izafasha kandi banki nkuru z’ibihugu n’ibindi bigo by’imari, kubera ingaruka iki cyorezo cyabigizeho.
Izafasha kandi mu gushyira mu gushyira ku murongo ibijyanye n’amadevize, ikibazo cy’ibyinjizwa mu bihugu n’ibindi.
Ivuga ko izafasha ibihugu aho wasangaga ubukungu bwabyo bushingiye ku byo byohereza mu mahanga harimo nk’amabuye y’agaciro, ubu bikaba byarahuye n’isubira inyuma ry’amafaranga byavanagamo.
Ubu bufasha buzaza buciye mu nkunga zihabwa ibyo bihugu, mu nguzanyo, ingwate n’ubundi buryo.
Perezida wa Afreximbank, Prof. Benedict Oramah, yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyazanye akaga gakomeye n’ihungabana ry’ubukungu.
Yagize ati “Uretse ingaruka zikomeye kirimo kugira ku kiremwamuntu, iki cyorezo cyagize ingaruka ku bukungu bw’Isi, kizatuma kandi ubukungu buhungabana ku kigero cya 0.4%.”
Yavuze kandi ko ubukungu bw’Isi buzava kuri 2.9% bwariho mu 2019, bugere kuri 2.5% mu 2020.
Ati “Uburyo bwihuse bwo gufasha burakenewe mu guhangana n’iki kibazo kuri uyu mugabane, Afurika irimo kugira ihungabana rikomeye mu byo yakuraga mu bukerarugendo, isubira inyuma ry’amafaranga, ihindagurika ry’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ihungabana ry’ibyo bakoraga.”
Yavuze ko Afreximbank izakorana n’amabanki y’iterambere mu bihugu bisanzwe, kugira ngo ibi bihugu bishobore guhangana n’ingaruka zirimo guterwa n’iki cyorezo.
Afreximbank isanzwe ifite amateka mu gufasha ibihugu bya Afurika mu gihe havutse ikibazo cy’ihungabana ry’ubukungu.
Mu 2015 ubwo habaga ikibazo cy’ihungabana ry’ubukungu, iyi banki yatanze inkunga ya miliyari 10 z’amadolari ya Amerika ku bihugu binyamuryango.
Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi yashinzwe mu 1993, ishingwa na za leta kuri uyu mugabane n’abikorera. Kuva mu 1994 imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyari 67 ku bikorwa by’ubucuruzi, naho umutungo fatizo wayo ugera kuri miliyari 13 z’amadolari ya Amerika.

Title: COVID-19: RRA yorohereje abasora; itariki ntarengwa yo kwemeza ibitabo by’ibaruramari yimuriwe Gicurasi
Body:
Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro mu Rwanda (Rwanda Revenue Authority) cyatangaje ko cyashyizeho ingamba nshya z’igihe gito, zigamije gufasha abasora guhangana n’ingaruka bazatezwa n’icyorezo cya Novel Coronavirus cyibasiye isi muri rusange.
Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro mu Rwanda (Rwanda Revenue Authority) cyatangaje ko cyashyizeho ingamba nshya z’igihe gito, zigamije gufasha abasora guhangana n’ingaruka bazatezwa n’icyorezo cya Novel Coronavirus cyibasiye isi muri rusange.
Izi ngamba zije mu gihe ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo n’iby’ubucuruzi byahagaze mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ingamba zo gukumira no kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Novel Coronavirus.
Zimwe mu ngamba zafashwe harimo ko RRA ihagaritse ubugenzuzi mu gihe cy’ukwezi kumwe, kubarwa haherewe ku itariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020.
RRA ivuga ko ibaye ihagaritse igenzura risesuye n’igenzura ku misoro n’amahoro bya gasutamo, ariko hakazakomeza ubugenzuzi bukorewe mu biro.
Iki kigo kandi kivuga ko cyongereye igihe cyo kwemeza ibitabo by’ibaruramari, aho abasora bagomba kumenyekanisha no kwishyura umusoro ku nyungu z’umwaka wa 2019 bitarenze tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2020 nk’uko biteganywa n’itegeko.
Gusa ngo kubasabwa ko ibitabo by’ibaruramari ryabo ry’umwaka ribanza kwemezwa n’ababigize umwuga ariko bakaba batarabikora kugira ngo bamenyekanishe ndetse banishyure, bemerewe gukora imenyekanisha no kwishyura umusoro ku nyungu bagize mu mwaka washize bashingiye ku bitabo by’ibaruramari bafite, kabone n’ubwo byaba bitaremezwa n’ababigize umwuga.
Igihe cyo kwemeza ibitabo cyongereweho amezi abiri ku batarabikora, bivuze ko itariki ntarengwa ari 31 Gicurasi 2020.
RRA kandi yemeje ko abasora bose basaba ubwumvikane mu gukemura ibibazo by’imisoro, ko ubusabe bwabo buzajya bwakirwa badasabwe kubanza kwishyura avansi ya 25% y’umusoro wose baciwe; ibi bikazamara igihe cy’iminsi 30, uhereye tariki ya 23 Werurwe 2020.
Ku bijyanye na serivisi zisanzwe nko kumenyekanisha no kwishyura umusoro hifashishijwe telefone cyangwa umurongo wo guhamagaraho, abasora bahawe umurongo wa telefone na imeri (Email) byihariye, bizabafasha kubona serivisi bifuza bitabagoye kandi mu buryo bwihuse.
RRA ivuga ko ubwo bufasha bwose buboneka ku mashami yose y’Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro mu Rwanda, haba kuri za gasutamo, ahatangirwa imisoro y’imbere mu gihugu ndetse n’imisoro yeguriwe inzego z’ibanze.
Ku bashaka kohereza busabe bwabo, ngo bazajya babwohereza bifashishije internet kuri email ya Umuhire Regine ([email protected]) cyangwa bagahamagara kuri 0788312953.
Ingamba z'igihe gito z'Ikigo cy'Imisoro n'Amahoro zo guhangana n'ingaruka za COVID-19 ku basora.Short Term Measures to COVID-19: Support to Taxpayers. pic.twitter.com/Yzhgqp85VO
— Rwanda Revenue Authority (@rrainfo) March 25, 2020

Title: Banki zasabwe gufunga amwe mu mashami yazo mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya COVID-19
Body:
Ihuriro ry’Amabanki mu Rwanda (RBA) ryasabye banki zose gufunga amashami yazo mu gihugu ariko zibanda ku yo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hagamijwe gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Ihuriro ry’Amabanki mu Rwanda (RBA) ryasabye banki zose gufunga amashami yazo mu gihugu ariko zibanda ku yo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hagamijwe gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Mu itangazo ryo ku mugoroba wo ku wa 24 Werurwe 2020, RBA yagaragaje ko iki cyemezo cyafashwe bijyanye n’ingamba zashyizweho zo guhangana n’ubwiyongere bwa COVID-19.
Kuva umurwayi wa mbere yaboneka mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, abagera kuri 40 ni bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye iki cyorezo cyibasiye Isi.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RBA, Robin Bairstow, rivuga ko “RBA yasabye amabanki gufunga by’agateganyo amwe mu mashami yayo by’umwihariko ayo mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu kugabanya ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 no gushyigikira ingamba zashyizweho na leta zo gukuraho ingendo zitari ngombwa mu gihugu.’’
RBA yijeje gukomeza kugenzura uko ikibazo kimeze, kumenyesha abanyamuryango, abakozi, abakiliya n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa amakuru agezweho kuri COVID-19.
Mu butumwa bwa RBA igira iti “Buri banki izamenyesha abakiliya bayo binyuze mu buryo isanzwe ibikoramo uko bazakomeza kubona serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga.”
Leta y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba zo guhangana n’ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 zirimo gufunga ibigo by’amashuri na kaminuza, insengero no guhagarika ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yasabye abaturarwanda gukomeza kwitwararika no gukurikiza ingamba zashyizweho na Leta zijyanye no kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 zirimo guhagarika ubucuruzi bw’ibikorwa bitari iby’ibanze, guhagarika ingendo zihuza imijyi n’uturere n’izindi zitari ngombwa no kuva mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa.
Abantu bose bageze mu Rwanda mu byumweru bibiri bishize basabwa kwishyira mu kato mu gihe cy’iminsi 14 guhera igihe bagereye mu Rwanda ndetse no gukurikiza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima yo gukaraba intoki kenshi kandi neza no kubahiriza intera ya metero imwe hagati y’abantu.
Ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 saa 23:59, nibwo Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, yasohoye amabwiriza avuga ko ingendo zitari ngombwa zihagaritswe, abantu basabwa guhagarika gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa, uretse abatanga n’abashaka serivisi z’ingenzi zirimo kwivuza, guhaha, iza banki n’izindi.
Serivisi za banki zari zimaze iminsi itatu zikoreshwa ariko hibandwa ku kwinjiza abakiliya bazo mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga haba mu kubitsa no kubikuza amafaranga.
Ku wa 18 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yanzuye kwemerera amabanki gusubiramo amasezerano y’inguzanyo kugira ngo azorohereze abayabereyemo imyenda mu gihe cyo kwishyura, yanakuyeho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga ku bigo by’itumanaho mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Mu gushishikariza abantu kwishyurana no kohererezanya amafaranga batayahererekanyije mu ntoki bishobora gukwirakwiza Coronavirus, BNR yemeje ko mu mezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki.
BNR yatangaje ko izakomeza gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’izo ngamba no gukomeza gusesengura ingaruka za Coronavirus kandi yiteguye kuba yafata izindi ngamba zikwiye.

Title: MINAGRI yasabye abahinzi n’aborozi kongera ingufu mu bikorwa byabo, birinda coronavirus
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (MINAGRI) yatangaje ko ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, gusarura, kugura, gutunganya umusaruro no kuwugeza ku isoko bigomba gukomeza, isaba inzego z’ibanze gukoresha indangururamajwi n’ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka abahinzi bakamenya ko bagomba guhinga ubuso bwose buhingwa.
Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (MINAGRI) yatangaje ko ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, gusarura, kugura, gutunganya umusaruro no kuwugeza ku isoko bigomba gukomeza, isaba inzego z’ibanze gukoresha indangururamajwi n’ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka abahinzi bakamenya ko bagomba guhinga ubuso bwose buhingwa.
Itangazo MINAGRI yashyize hanze ku itariki 23 Werurwe 2020 rigaragaza ko ibikorwa by’umuhinzi n’ubworozi bigomba gukomeza kugira ngo hatazagira ikibazo cy’ibiribwa kibaho bikubitiyeho n’ibihe bikomeye byo kwirinda coronavirus.
Iyo Minisiteri itangaza ko serivisi zo kubona imiti n’ibiribwa by’amatungo, inyongeramusaruro, kugura no gukusanya umusaruro w’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, iyamamaza buhinzi n’ubworozi n’inganda zitunganya ibiribwa bitagomba guhagarara.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Minisitiri Dr. Geraldine Mukeshimana rivuga ko Farumasi z’imiti y’amatungo zirakomeza gukora, isaba abayicuruza bakeneye kujya kuyirangura i Kigali kubisabira uruhushya rubigaragara ku Mirenge bakoreramo.
Inganda zisanzwe zemerewe gukora ibiryo by’amatungo zasabwe gushyiraho gahunda y’abakozi bake mu buryo bikomeza gukorwa bikagezwa ku maguriro ari hirya no hino mu Turere aho aborozi bakomeza kubigura.
Inganda zikeneye kugura ibikenerwa mu gukora ibiryo by’imvange by’amatungo i Kigali zibisabira uruhushya rw’inzira ku buyobozi bw’Akarere zikoreramo.
Ni mu gihe kandi ku bijyanye n’inyongeramusaruro aho zicururizwa hose hakomeza gukora mu rwego rwo kugeza imbuto z’indobanure n’ifumbire ku bahinzi hagamijwe kongera umusaruro.
Mu gucuruza no kugura inyongeramusaruro abantu bagomba gukomeza amabwiriza yo kwirinda. Umucuruzi asabwa kuba yambaye agapfukamunwa n’uturinda ntoki, abaguzi bakinjira umwe umwe kandi bakazirikana intera nibura ye metero imwe hagati yabo.
Abacuruzi b’inyongeramusaruro bakeneye kujya kurangura ku bubiko buri hafi yabo basabwa gukorana n’ubuyobozi bw’Imirenge baherereyemo kugira ngo bahabwe uburenganzira bwo kujyayo.
Amakamyo atwara inyongeramusaruro n’imodoka zitwara umwuka ubika intanga byemerewe gukomeza ingendo ariko ntizitware abantu barenze babiri. Ibyo bigakorwa no ku zijyanye ibyatunganyijwe ku isoko.
Muri iryo tangazo MINAGRI yasabwe gukangurira abahinzi guhinga ubuso bwose.
Yagize iti “ Hakoreshejwe indangururamajwi n’ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka harimo n’ubw’ikoranabuhanga mu Midugudu no mu Tugari, abakozi bashinzwe ubuhinzi ku nzego zose barasabwa gukomeza gufasha abahinzi babagezaho amakuru yose bakenera, babashishikariza guhinga ubuso bwose kandi neza hakoreshwa inyongeramusaruro ariko banabagezaho ubutumwa bwo kwirinda coronavirus.”
Inganda nini, ibigo na Koperative bifite imirima minini cyane cyane abafite inganda z’ icyayi, isukari, amata, umuceri, ikawa n’amafu zasabwe gusigarana abakozi bake ariko batuma imirimo ikomeza. Abari mu bikorwa byo gusarura no gutubura imbuto nabo basabwe gukorana n’imirenge kuburyo bahabwa ibyangombwa bibemerera gukomeza iyo mirimo.

Title: Airtel yijeje abakiliya bayo gukomeza kunoza serivisi zibafasha kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya Airtel Rwanda yatangaje ko yiteguye gukomeza gufasha abakiliya bayo kugerwaho na serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga zigamije kwimakaza uburyo bwo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gihangayikishije Isi.
Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya Airtel Rwanda yatangaje ko yiteguye gukomeza gufasha abakiliya bayo kugerwaho na serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga zigamije kwimakaza uburyo bwo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gihangayikishije Isi.
Ubuyobozi bwa Airtel buvuga ko buzirikana ibihe bigoranye igihugu kiri kunyuramo n’ingaruka biri kugira ku buzima busanzwe bw’abakiliya n’abakozi bayo nyuma y’ingamba zafashwe zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bitandukanye mu gihugu kubera Coronavirus.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Airtel mu Rwanda, Amit Chawla, yavuze ko biteguye gukora igishoboka cyose bagahangana n’imbogamizi abakiliya babo bashobora guhura na zo mu bihe by’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Yagize ati “Mu rwego rwo gushyira mu bikorwa amabwiriza yatanzwe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe na RURA ku ngamba nshya zigamije guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo mu Rwanda, twiyemeje gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zose zidufasha kugikumira ku bakiliya bacu.”
Chawla yakomeje avuga ko ibiro bya Airtel bitanga serivisi zayo zose bizajya biba bifunguye guhera saa 08:00 za mu gitondo kugeza saa 15:00 z’igicamunsi.
Yasabye abakiliya ba Airtel kwimenyereza gukoresha imiyoboro ibafasha kubona ibyo bakeneye bitabasabye kwifashisha undi muntu nka serivisi ya Airtel Money, kugura ama-inite na internet, kuko ari inyungu za buri ruhande kuba ibikenewe byose bibasha kuboneka muri telefoni y’umukiliya.
Airtel ivuga ko abacuruzi bayo ba Airtel Money bakomeje gukora nk’ibisanzwe, batanga serivisi zose z’ingenzi. Iyi sosiyete yijeje abakiliya ko abo bacuruzi bazakomeza kwita ku isuku y’intoki kandi bubahiriza intera ya metero imwe hagati ya bo mu gihe babaha serivisi.
Abakiliya ba Airtel bazakomeza guhabwa serivisi za Airtel Money no kwishyurana mu buryo butandukanye ku mashami ari hirya no hino hubahirizwa ingamba z’isuku nk’uko zagenwe.
Iyi sosiyete yongeye kwibutsa ko inyandiko zose z’abafatanyabikorwa bayo n’abakiliya bose zigomba koherezwa kuri email ya [[email protected]] kuko nta nyandiko zifatika zemewe muri iki gihe cyo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Airtel iri muri sosiyete zikomeye mu zitanga serivisi z’itumanaho mu gihugu igendera ku ihame ryo kwibanda cyane cyane ku kubungabunga umutekano n’imibereho myiza y’abakozi n’abakiliya bayo hashyirwaho uburyo butuma ibikorwa bidahungabana.

Title: BPR Atlas Mara yakuyeho ikiguzi kuri zimwe muri serivisi, isaba abayigana kwimakaza ikoranabuhanga
Body:
Tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yafashe ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga ku bigo by’itumanaho mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yafashe ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gukuraho ibiciro byo guhererekanya amafaranga ku bigo by’itumanaho mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Mu rwego rwo gushishikariza abantu kwishyurana no kohererezanya amafaranga batayahererekanyije mu ntoki bishobora gukwirakwiza Coronavirus, BNR yemeje ko mu gihe cy’amezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki.
Izi ngamba zafashwe mu gihe abarwayi bamaze kubonekaho Coronavirus mu Rwanda bageze kuri 19 , ariko bakaba barahuye n’abandi bantu basaga 680.
BPR Atlas Mara nka Banki y’Abaturage yatangiye gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro igamije gufasha abakiliya n’abakozi kurushaho kwirinda Coronavirus ihangayikishije u Rwanda n’Isi muri rusange.
Iyi banki yiyemeje gukuraho ikiguzi cya zimwe muri serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga mu gihe cy’iminsi 90.
Rigira riti “Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umukiliya wese wohereza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya BPR ajya ku yindi konti ya BPR hakoreshejwe mobile banking na internet banking.’’
“Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umukiliya wese wohereza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya BPR ajya ku yo mu yindi banki hakoreshejwe mobile banking na internet banking. Nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umukiliya wese wohereza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya BPR ajya kuri konti ya Mobile Money (haba kuri Airtel na MTN).’’
Mu kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yo guhangana n’ikwirakwizwa rya Coronavirus, BPR Atlas Mara, yashyizeho amabwiriza agamije gufasha abakiliya n’abakozi kurushaho kwirinda.
Muri yo harimo gusaba abakiliya gukoresha konti bifashishije telefoni igendanwa (Mobile Banking), ukoresha iyi serivisi akanda *150# agakurikiza amabwiriza cyangwa se agakoresha “BPR Mobile Banking App” iboneka muri “playstore cyangwa Appstore” muri telefoni.
Ikomeza iti “Serivisi za banki zishobora kandi gukoreshwa hifashishijwe interineti “Internet Banking”. Igihe waba utarayindikisha kugira ngo ubashe gukoresha konti yawe ukoresheje telefoni igendanwa (Mobile Banking ) cyangwa internet (internet banking), urashishikarizwa kwegera Ishami rikwegereye kugira ngo bagufashe.’’
Abakiliya ba BPR Atlas Mara banasabwe gukoresha ikarita yo kubikuza mu kwishyura ibyo bakeneye byose ahantu hatandukanye bakira ayo makarita ndetse no kwifashisha ikarita zo kubikuza mu gihe bashaka serivisi za banki kuri agent (BPR Hafi).
BPR Atlas Mara yashishikarije abakiliya n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa kwishyura no kohererezanya amafaranga hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga bashyiriweho kugira ngo bagabanye ikwirakwizwa ry’ubwandu bwa COVID-19 ryaturuka ku gukora ku mafaranga n’intoki.
Iyi banki yashyizeho umurongo wa 1500, ushobora kwifashishwa ku muntu ukeneye ibindi bisobanuro.
Usibye serivisi abakiliya bashobora kubona bakoresheje BPR Mobile Banking cyangwa ku mashami ya BPR Atlas Mara ari hirya no hino mu gihugu, inafite abayihagarariye basaga 310, basanzwe bafasha abakiliya kubona serivisi z’imari bitabagoye.
BPR Atlas Mara ikorera mu gihugu cyose aho ifite amashami 186. Mu 2018 yagaragazaga ko yabonye inyungu ingana na miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Title: Umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu wiyongereye ku kigero cya 9.4% mu 2019
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare, NISR, cyatangaje ko mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu (GDP) wiyongereye ku rugero rwa 9.4 %, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare, NISR, cyatangaje ko mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu (GDP) wiyongereye ku rugero rwa 9.4 %, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Mu mibare yatangajwe kuri uyu wa Mbere, NISR yerekana ko mu mwaka ushize umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wagize uruhare rwa 24% mu musaruro mbumbe, inganda zigira uruhare rwa 18%, Serivisi 49% mu gihe ibindi bisigaye byagize uruhare ku kigero cya 9%.
Ubukungu bw’u Rwanda bwazamutse 9.4% mu gihe byari biteganyijwe ko buzazamuka 7.8% mu 2019.
Umuyobozi wa NISR, Yusuf Murangwa avuga ko ‘uyu mwaka wagenze neza kuruta uko byari byitezwe’.
Ati “Turabona ibijyanye no kubaka byaragenze neza cyane, ubuhinzi nabwo ntabwo bwakoze nabi 5% nubwo haba hifuzwa ko biba byiza kurushaho, na serivisi byagenze neza, ubucuruzi umwaka ushize bwagenze neza, ibijyanye n’ingendo cyane cyane iy’indege yazamutse neza”.
Murangwa avuga ko iyo ubukungu buzamutse cyane kuriya bivuze ko hafi ya byose byagenze neza kuko ‘ntabwo ubukungu bwazamuka kuriya bitewe n’ibintu bike’.
Umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 5%, uw’inganda uzamuka ku rugero rwa 16% naho uwa serivisi uzamuka ku rugero rwa 8%.
Ibihingwa ngandurarugo byiyongereye ku kigero cya 4%, ibihingwa byoherezwa mu mahanga byiyongera 5% bitewe n’ikawa yiyongereye ku kigero cya 7% n’icyayi cyazamutse ku kigero cya 3%.
Izamuka ry’umusaruro w’inganda ryatewe ahanini n’ubwubatsi bwazamutseho 33% n’inganda zitunganya ibintu bitandukanye zazamutseho 11%. Mu bijyanye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, umusaruro wa gasegereti wagabanyutse 23.7% naho uwa Wolfram ugabanyuka 6.6% mu ngano yoherejwe mu mahanga mu gihe uwa Coltan wiyongereyeho 42%.
Ubwiyongere bw’umusaruro wa serivisi bwatewe n’ubucuruzi budandaza n’ubugurisha ibintu icyarimwe bw’ibyakorewe mu Rwanda bwiyongereyeho 16%, ubwikorezi bwazamutse ku kigero cya 12% ahanini bitewe n’ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bwazamutse ku kigero cya 17%.
Serivisi z’imari zazamutse ku kigero cya 8% naho serivisi za hoteli na za restaurant zizamuka ku gipimo cya 10%.
Biteganyijwe kandi ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buzazamuka 8.1% mu 2020 na 8.2% mu 2021, bitewe n’ubuhinzi kubera ingamba mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga no kuhira.

Title: Minicom yijeje ko ibiribwa bitazabura ku isoko ry’u Rwanda mu gihe ruhanganye na coronavirus
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom) yasabye abaguzi n’abacuruzi kubahiriza amabwiriza y’ibiciro n’ingano y’ibihahwa umuntu yemerewe guhaha, yizeza ko ibiribwa bitazabura ku isoko kuko aho biva hafunguye.
