Title: Ibigo bikomeje kwiyandikisha mu imurika ry’imyubakire igezweho rizabera i Kigali
Body:
Mu gihe habura iminsi mike ngo mu Rwanda hatangire imurika ry’inzu n’imyubakire igezweho ku nshuro yaryo ya kabiri, bimwe mu bigo bizobereye mu bijyanye n’ubwubatsi bikorera mu Rwanda bitegerezanyije amatsiko itangira ry’iri murikagurisha.
Mu gihe habura iminsi mike ngo mu Rwanda hatangire imurika ry’inzu n’imyubakire igezweho ku nshuro yaryo ya kabiri, bimwe mu bigo bizobereye mu bijyanye n’ubwubatsi bikorera mu Rwanda bitegerezanyije amatsiko itangira ry’iri murikagurisha.
Ibi bigo bivuga ko byiteguye kwereka abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga bazaryitabira impinduka zijyanye n’iterambere mu miturire n’imyubakire u Rwanda rwifuza kandi ku giciro gito.
Bimwe mu bigo bimaze kwiyandikisha muri iri murika harimo DND Developers, Phoenix Plaza, Silk Plaster Rwanda, Troika Design Workshop, Savanna Creek, Kigali Heights, Rwanda Housing Authority, na My Seats, byose bimenyerewe mu gutanga serivisi zijyanye n’ubwubatsi bugezweho.
Iri murika rizatangira tariki ya 17 rigasozwe kuya 21 Werurwe 2020, ryiswe “Kigali Property & Shoppers Bazaar 2020”. Rizibanda ku kugaragaza inyubako zo guturamo n’ibikorwa bitandukanye by’ubwubatsi bigezweho muri iki gihe kandi bihendutse.
Iri murikagurisha rifite insanganyatsiko igira iti “Guteza imbere udushya tugamije kubungabunga ibidukikije mu iterambere ry’imyubakire ihendutse kandi irambye”, rizabera mu nyubako ya Kigali Heights, iherereye mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Ikigo “RG Consult” kiri gutegura iri murika, cyatangaje ko rizaba ihuriro ryo kumurika ibikorwa by’abafite inyubako zigurishwa ku giciro gito n’abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye bakorera mu Rwanda.
Iki kigo gishimangira ko inzu n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi bigira ingaruka ku mibereho y’abantu n’iterambere ry’igihugu, bityo ko mu gihe hari kwihutishwa uburyo bw’imiturire igezweho iganisha ku iterambere; hanakwiye gushyigikirwa ibikorwa birengera urusobe rw’ibidukikije.
Biteganyijwe ko ibigo bisaga 30 bikorera imbere mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga, byaba byigenga cyangwa byegamiye kuri leta bizitabira iri murikagurisha, rishobora kuzakira abantu bari hagati ya 5000 na 8000 mu gihe cy’iminsi itanu rizamara.
Umwihariko w’iri murikagurisha, ni uko rizitabirwa n’abacuruza ibikoresho byifashishwa mu bwubatsi, ababigura n’ibigo by’imari n’amabanki, mu rwego rwo gufasha buri muntu kubona ibyo akeneye ngo yubake, anasane inzu ye adahenzwe cyangwa ngo ahabwe ibintu bitujuje ubuziranenge.
Hazaba kandi hari n’abatanga ibyangombwa byo kubaka, ibigo byubakisha, amabanki atanga inguzanyo mu by’ubwubatsi, ibigo bitanga ubwishingizi bw’inyubako n’abandi batandukanye.
Iri murikagurisha ryateguwe n’ikigo RG Consult, kigamije kugeza amakuru yose ashoboka ku muntu ushaka kubaka inzu ye cyangwa kuyisana ndetse no kumenyekanisha abacuruzi b’ibyo bikoresho baba abato n’abanini.
RG Consult ivuga ko iri murikagurisha ari uburyo bwiza bwo kumenyekanisha no guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda n’igisubizo ku bashaka gutunga inzu zabo bwite.
Ubuyobozi bwa RG Consult bunavuga ko bushaka guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, abazwi n’abatazwi bose bagahura bakamenyana, umuguzi na we akagira amahitamo akurikije uko abona ibintu bimeze.
Umuhango wo gutangiza ku mugaragaro iri murikagurisha ry’inzu n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi uzaba tariki ya 17 Werurwe 2020, ahazaba hari abayobozi batandukanye mu nzego bwite za leta, iz’umutekano, imiryango itegamiye kuri leta, urugaga rw’abikorera n’abandi.
Mu mwaka ushize, imurikagurisha nk’iri ryari ryitabiriwe n’ibigo bigera kuri 20 byose bikora muri uru rwego rw’inyubako.
Muri iri murika rya 2019 kandi, RG Consult yamuritse imikorere ya ‘application’ ya telefoni yiswe “Murugo App”, ifasha abantu baba mu bukode kuzuza ibisabwa, bagahabwa amahirwe yo gutunga inzu zabo.

Title: Ishimwe rya Cogebanque yifashishije Tour du Rwanda mu gusangiza Abanyarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho
Body:
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani ishyigikira umukino w’amagare by’umwihariko isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka igihugu ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020’’, aho yaryifashishije isobanurira abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho.
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani ishyigikira umukino w’amagare by’umwihariko isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka igihugu ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020’’, aho yaryifashishije isobanurira abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari zigezweho.
Cogebanque ni umuterankunga w’imena wa Tour du Rwanda 2020 ndetse yaherekeje iri rushanwa aho ryanyuze hose. Isiganwa ry’uyu mwaka ryegukanywe n’Umunya- Erythrée w’imyaka 20, Natnael Tesfatsion.
Abanyarwanda bo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu baryohewe n’umukino w’amagare ariko banegerezwa serivisi z’imari.
Binyuze mu bukangurambaga bwiswe “AGUKA NA COGEBANQUE”, bamwe bafunguje konti, barizigamira, abandi bagura amakarita ya Mastercard abafasha guhererekanya amafaranga mu ikoranabuhanga.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Iyamamazabikorwa muri Cogebanque, Iyamuremye Antoine, yabwiye IGIHE ko isiganwa ryabafashije kwegereza abaturarwanda serivisi z’imari.
Yagize ati ‘‘Tour du Rwanda 2020 yabaye umwanya mwiza wafashije abantu kwagukana natwe, haba mu gufunguza konti, kubona inguzanyo no kwizigamira cyane ko Abanyarwanda aribyo bifuza.’’
Ubukangurambaga bwo gushishikariza Abanyarwanda kwizigamira bunajyanye na gahunda y’igihugu y’ubwiswe ‘Ejo Heza’ bwatangijwe mu Ukuboza 2018.
Inyigo yakozwe iteganya ko mu mwaka umwe ubu bwizigame buzagera ku basaga 207 000 bashobora kuzigama miliyari 14,5 Frw, mu gihe mu myaka itanu abagera kuri miliyoni ebyiri bakwizigama miliyari 195 Frw.
Iyamuremye yavuze ko ‘‘Dutanga n’umusanzu wo gukangurira abantu serivisi z’imari no kwizigamira bijyanye n’icyerekezo cy’iterambere ry’igihugu.’’
‘‘Twigishije Abanyarwanda ko badakwiye kugendana ibifurumba by’amafaranga kuko umutekano wayo utaba wizewe. Iyo ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga biba byiza kuko aho ujya hose mu Rwanda no hanze uryifashisha bikoroheye.’’
U Rwanda rufite intego ko mu mwaka wa 2024, amafaranga abarirwa ku kigero cya 80 % y’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu azajya ahererekanywa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, avuye kuri 34.6% mu 2019.
Muri gahunda za Cogebanque Plc zo gufasha Abanyarwanda kuzamura ubukungu bwabo no gukemura ibibazo bitandukanye, yakomeje gushyira abakiliya igorora ibaha inguzanyo ku mushahara izwi nka ‘Gisubizo Loan Express’, itangwa nta ngwate.
Gisubizo Loan Express ni inguzanyo Cogebanque itanga ku bakiliya bayo babona umushahara wa buri kwezi. Ikubye inshuro zigera kuri 15 z’umushahara umuntu ahembwa ku kwezi, na we akagenda yishyura agera kuri 50% by’umushahara we buri kwezi.
Muri Tour du Rwanda 2020, Cogebanque ni yo yahembye umukinnyi urusha abandi guterera imisozi ; ni igihembo cyegukanywe na Taaramäe Rein ukinira Total Direct Energie yo mu Bufaransa.
Iyamuremye yavuze ko icyo gihembo bagifata nk’uburyo bwo kugaragaza ikoranabuhanga ryambuka umupaka.
Ati ‘‘Abakinnyi batsinze tubashishikariza ko bahabwa amafaranga mu ikoranabuhanga. Uriya mukinnyi twizera ko azaduhagararira neza akaba ambasaderi wacu mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.’’
Yavuze ko Tour du Rwanda 2020 yatanze umusaruro ufatika ugereranyije n’umwaka washize.
Ati ‘‘Ibyo twateganyaga twabigezeho ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize. Byatweretse ko n’abafite konti muri banki bashobora gukoresha ikoranabuhanga cyane ko iyo mikoranire ihinduka.’’
Cogebanque Plc ifite amashami 28 mu gihugu hose aho ifite ibyuma bya ATM 34, aba-agents barenga 600 bayifasha gutanga serivisi zo gufunguza konti, kubitsa no kubikuza zirimo n’izifashisha ikoranabuhanga binyuze muri Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, smart cash card n’amakarita ya MasterCard (Debit, Credit na Prepaid) afasha abayakoresha kwishyura no kubikuza ahantu harenga miliyoni 36 ku Isi yose.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

Title: Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda mu nzira yo gushaka ahandi batumiza ibicuruzwa kubera coronavirus
Body:
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda bari gusiganwa n’igihe mu gushaka ubundi buryo batumizamo ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho bikenerwa n’abatari bake bakundaga gutumiza mu Bushinwa, kubera ihungabana ry’ubucuruzi ryatewe n’icyorezo cya ‘Coronavirus’, byatumye kugeza ubu ububiko bwabo butangiye gukendera.
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda bari gusiganwa n’igihe mu gushaka ubundi buryo batumizamo ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho bikenerwa n’abatari bake bakundaga gutumiza mu Bushinwa, kubera ihungabana ry’ubucuruzi ryatewe n’icyorezo cya ‘Coronavirus’, byatumye kugeza ubu ububiko bwabo butangiye gukendera.
U Rwanda rutumiza mu Bushinwa ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga n’amashanyarazi, imashini, ibikoresho byo kubaka, ibicuruzwa bikozwe mu ibumba, inkweto, imyenda, ibinyabiziga n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Umunyamabanga wa kabiri ushinzwe ubukungu n’ubucuruzi muri ambasade y’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, Li Zhen, yabwiye Rwanda Today ko nyuma y’aho RwandAir ihagarikiye ingendo zayo zerekeza mu Bushinwa kuva ku ya 31 Mutarama 2020, byagize ingaruka ku ngendo n’ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Ingaruka ku buryo bwo guhererekanya ibicuruzwa zageze no ku mishinga imwe n’imwe ikomeje gukorwa ishingiye ku bikoresho fatizo biva mu Bushinwa.“
Li Zhen yakomeje avuga ko u Bushinwa bwafashe ingamba nyinshi nko gushyiraho ikigega nterankunga kidasanzwe, kugabanya imisoro, kongera amafaranga y’ingengo y’imari no koroshya uburyo bwo kongera kwemerera inganda gukora mu rwego rwo kwihutisha kongera umusaruro w’inganda no gutera inkunga amasoko, hanashyirwa ingufu mu gukumira icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Usibye intara ya Hubei, ifite umurwa mukuru Wuhan ari na wo icyorezo cyatangiriyemo, izindi ntara zasubukuye ibikorwa byo gukora ibicuruzwa byari bisanzwe bikorwa. Mu ntara zimwe na zimwe, igipimo cyo gusubukura imirimo kimaze kugera kuri 70 %.
Icyakora ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa bitumizwa mu Bushinwa biteganyijwe ko bizamuka mu mezi ari imbere, niba ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus ridahagaritswe.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Michel Sebera yagize ati "Dutangiye kubona igabanuka ry’ibicuruzwa ku isoko, ariko kandi ibintu bishobora kurushaho kugenda nabi mu mezi ari imbere."
Urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda rwagaragaje ibihugu nka Turikiya, u Buhinde, Dubai na Misiri nk’ahandi haturuka ibicuruzwa byavaga mu Bushinwa.
Kugeza ubu batiri ya telefone yari isanzwe igura amafaranga ibihumbi 10 ($ 10), yageze ku bihumbi hafi 15 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ($ 15); ikirahure cya telefone ya iPhone 6 cyaguraga amafaranga 20 000 ($ 20), ubu ni hafi 25 000 ($ 25) cyangwa 30 000 ($ 30) mu maduka amwe n’amwe.
Izabiriza Jeanne, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Heart of Africa Trading, isosiyete itumiriza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa abacuruzi benshi bakorera i Kigali yavuze ko bari gukorana na PSF kugira ngo barebe ko hari ahandi bakura ibicuruzwa.
Ati "Itsinda rya mbere rizerekeza muri Turikiya kuya 9 Werurwe, ariko na none bizatwara igihe kugira ngo turangure ibicuruzwa tunabihabwe; hagati aho tuzahura n’igabanuka ry’ibicuruzwa ku isoko."
Izabiriza yavuze ko abacuruzi benshi baheruka gutumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa hagati y’Ugushyingo na tariki ya 15 Ukuboza 2019, bityo bakaba bagombaga kwinjiza ibindi bicuruzwa bishya muri Gashyantare, ariko bikaba bitarashobotse kubera iki cyorezo.
Guhungabana k’ubucuruzi bw’ikoranabuhanga
Gufunga amabanki mu Bushinwa byakomeje iki kibazo, kubera ko bitashobokaga koherereza amafaranga abacuruzi bo mu Bushinwa kugira ngo na bo babe babasha kuboherereza ibicuruzwa.
Clement Ishimwe, usanzwe atumiza ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga mu Bushinwa, yavuze ko batajyaga barenza ukwezi batagiye mu Bushinwa kurangura ibindi bicuruzwa, ndetse bamwe bajyagayo buri cyumweru, ariko ubu ngo babuze uko basubirayo.
Ati "Nta gihugu gishobora kuduha ibyo u Bushinwa bwajyaga buduha mu bijyanye n’ibicuruzwa bihendutse".
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda basanzwe bagurisha ikawa, urusenda n’ibindi bicuruzwa bifite agaciro kari hagati y’ibihumbi 10 na 20 by’amadorari binyuze ku rubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rwa Alibaba kuri ubu babuze uko bohereza ibicuruzwa byabo mu Bushinwa.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi n’iyamamazabikorwa muri Gorillas coffee, Benjamin Nkurunziza, yagize ati "Twahagaritse by’agateganyo ibikorwa byacu, ntidushobora kwakira ubundi busabe bw’abashaka ibicuruzwa byacu kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ndetse n’abo twari tumaze kubona ntitwashoboye kubagezaho ibyo basabye; ibintu byose byarahagaze."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RwandAir, Yvonne Makolo yavuze ko kuva RwandAir yafungura inzira yerekeza Guangzhou muri Kamena umwaka ushize; byageze mu Kwakira 2019 ingendo eshatu za buri cyumweru zigaragara nk’izari zihagije, kuko byatumye RwandAir iba kimwe mu bigo bitwara abagenzi mu ndege byunguka cyane.
Makolo ati “Turi gukurikiranira hafi uko iki cyorezo kiri gukwirakwira ku isi, tunakora imibare y’uburyo bizatugiraho ingaruka by’umwihariko, cyane cyane ko ari ikibazo ku bagenzi no ku mizigo. Turi gukorana na Minisiteri y’ubuzima n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa bose.”
Kubera ubushyamirane buri hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda, benshi mu banyamuryango b’Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda batangiye gutumiza ibicuruzwa bakeneye muri Aziya. Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda rwanatangije ikigega cyorohereza abacuruzi benshi gutumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa, ibintu byongereye umubare w’abanyarwanda batumiza ibicuruzwa mu Bushinwa.
Gusa ubu benshi muri bo bagowe no gutumiza ibyo bakeneye mu Bushinwa batangiye gutekereza kuyoboka inzira ya Kenya na Tanzania, aho abacuruzi baho bagifite ububiko buhagije.
Muri raporo ngarukakwezi yasohowe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy ‘Ibarurishamibare ku bucuruzi bwo hanze y’igihugu yasohotse mu kwezi k’Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwatumije mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 86,67 z’amadolari, bingana na 26% by’ibicuruzwa byose byatumijwe mu mahanga ndetse rwohereza mu Bushinwa ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 1,14 z’amadorali.
Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu igaragaza ko ibicuruzwa bituruka mu Bushinwa bingana na 20 ku ijana by’ibikomoka mu mahanga byinjira mu Rwanda buri mwaka.
Prof Thomas Kigabo, impuguke mu by’ubukungu muri Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, aherutse kuvuga ko hakiri kare ko u Rwanda rwamenya ingaruka ruzaterwa na Coronavirus ku bukungu bwarwo.
Ni mu gihe ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buteganyijwe kuzazamuka ku rugero rurenga gato 10% mu 2020, ariko bikaba byitezwe ko bushobora kuzagabanya umuvuduko nkuko byagenze ku bihugu byo mu karere bisanzwe byiringiye cyane isoko ryo mu Bushinwa.

Title: Hatangijwe imurika ry’ibyakorewe muri Oman, rifungura amarembo y’ubucuruzi hagati y’u Rwanda na Oman (Amafoto)
Body:
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yatangaje ko Oman igiye guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu n’ishoramari hagati y’icyo gihugu n’u Rwanda, ihereye ku imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri icyo gihugu ryatangijwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yatangaje ko Oman igiye guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu n’ishoramari hagati y’icyo gihugu n’u Rwanda, ihereye ku imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri icyo gihugu ryatangijwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa muri Oman (Omani Products Exhibition: OPEX) ry’iminsi ine ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020 riri kubera muri Kigali Convention Centre, rizanye abamurika barenga 80 bahagarariye ibigo n’inganda bikomeye muri Oman.
Ibimurikwa birimo ibicuruzwa by’inganda zitunganya ibiribwa n’ibikomoka mu Nyanja, ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi n’ibyo mu nzu, ibijyanye n’uburezi, ubukerarugendo, amavuta n’imibavu, ubukorikori n’ubugeni. Hari kandi ibijyanye na serivisi z’ubuzima, ibikoreshwa mu gukwirakwiza amazi n’amashanyarazi nk’amatiyo n’insinga, ibyerekeye ikoranabuhanga, gupfunyika ibicuruzwa bitandukanye n’ibindi.
Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda muri Oman, Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan Al Dheeb yavuze ko umubano wa Oman n’u Rwanda mu bya dipolomasi umeze neza bakaba bifuza kuzamura n’ushingiye ku bucuruzi n’ishoramari ari nayo ntego y’iryo murikagurisha.
Ati “Intego ni ukuzamura ubucuruzi hagati y’u Rwanda na Oman, umubano mu bya Politiki umeze neza, amateka yerekana ko ukomeye cyane, ariko imikoranire mu by’ubukungu ntabwo ikomeye nkawo, turashaka gukomeza uwo mubano tugira amamurikagurisha nk’iri kugira ngo abanyarwanda bamenye ibikorerwa muri Oman cyangwa bagure ibicuruzwa. Hari n’abanya-Oman bazifuza kuzana ibicuruzwa byabo mu Rwanda.”
Ni imurikabikorwa rya mbere Oman ikoreye mu Rwanda, rikaba irya kane muri Afurika naho muri rusange ni irya 10 mu yo bakorera hanze ya Oman.
Eng. Ahmed Bin Hassan yavuze ko ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda bafunguye amarembo y’ubufatanye mu by’ubucuruzi n’ishoramari.
Ati “Nibwo bwa mbere mu Rwanda ariko turizera ko dufunguye amarembo mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.”
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda w’u Rwanda, Soraya Hakuziyaremye yavuze ko u Rwanda ruzashyigikira iyo mikoranire, asaba abanyarwanda kubyaza umusaruro ayo mahirwe.
Ati “Ndasaba abazitabira imurikagurisha kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe no kunoza imikoranire mu by’ubucuruzi ku rwego rwo hejuru rushoboka.”
Abaje kumurika babwiye IGIHE ko biteguye kuganira n’abanyarwanda ku mikoranire itandukanye irimo kuba bajya kurangurayo ibicuruzwa cyangwa guhagararira inganda n’ibigo byabo mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wa sosiyete yitwa Aljoory Boukbar ikora imibavu y’umwimerere mu bimera biboneka muri Oman cyane cyane igiti cyitwa frankincence, Muna Al Shukairi yavuze ko baje mu Rwanda kumurika ibyo bakora ariko banashaka gukorana n’abanyarwanda bakaba bahafungura iduka ricuruza iyo mibavu.
Ati “Ducururiza muri Oman ariko turi gushaka n’andi masoko hanze nko kuba twaribona mu Rwanda no mu bindi bihugu hirya no hino ku Isi.”
Nyuma y’amasaha make imurikagurisha rifunguwe, Umuyobozi w’uruganda rukora insinga z’amashanyarazi muri Oman (National Cable Factory LLC) Ali Mohd Masahli yabwiye IGIHE hari abari bamaze kumwereka ko bakeneye kumenya ibyo uruganda ahagarariye rukora kuburyo bizeye ko iminsi ine izarangira babonye abafatanyabikorwa.
OPEX ni gahunda yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa muri Oman binyuze mu mamurikabikorwa atandukanye. Yatangiye mu 2012 itangirijwe i Riyadh muri Arabie Saoudite ikaba yaratumye ibikorerwa muri Oman ubu byoherezwa mu bihugu birenga 140.
Imurikabikorwa ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa 29 Gashyantare 2020 rizajya ritangira kuva saa tanu z’amanywa kugeza saa moya z’umugoroba buri munsi kugeza ku itariki 3 Werurwe 2020 rizasoreswaho.
Amafoto: Uwihanganye Hardi

Title: Cogebanque yegereje abakunzi b’amagare serivisi zo kwizigamira (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050. Imwe mu nzira izarufasha kubigeraho ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwizigama mu Banyarwanda.
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050. Imwe mu nzira izarufasha kubigeraho ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwizigama mu Banyarwanda.
Intego igihugu cyihaye izagerwaho bigizwemo uruhare n’inzego zitandukanye n’ibigo bitanga serivisi z’imari kuko umutekano w’amafaranga uba wizewe.
Mu kwegera no gusobanurira Abanyarwanda ibyiza byo kwizigamira, Banki Nyarwanda y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque imaze imyaka umunani itera inkunga umukino w’amagare uri mu ikunzwe mu Rwanda yifashishije isiganwa rya 2020 mu kubagezaho ubwo butumwa.
Cogebanque ifasha abakunzi b’amagare muri buri gace gasorezwamo isiganwa gufunguza konti, kubitsa, kohereza no kubikuza amafaranga yabo kandi mu mutekano usesuye.
Mu Gace ka Kane ka Tour du Rwanda 2020 ka Rusizi-Rubavu kegukanywe n’Umunya-Erythrée Natnael Tesfatsion, Cogebanque yasangije ab’i Rubavu uko bakwizigamira.
Kabera Epimaque ukora akazi k’ubukanishi n’ubushoferi yishimiye ko yafunguje konti muri Cogebanque akabona amahirwe yo kwinjira muri tombola.
Yagize ati “Batuganirije kuri serivisi za Cogebanque, numva ari nziza nyinjiramo. Nafunguje konti ndabitsa mbona amahirwe yo kwinjira mu cyuma gitanga amafaranga, ntsindira ibihumbi 17 Frw.’’
“Kwizigamira ni ukwiteganyiriza, kuko ubitsa ukabikuza kandi isaha n’isaha ukamenya aho ubariza amafaranga yawe. Ahantu amafaranga aba abitse haba hatekanye ndetse ushobora no kubona inguzanyo ukiteza imbere.’’
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 30 utuye mu Murenge wa Gisenyi mu Karere ka Rubavu yashishikarije abadakorana na banki gukanguka bakagana ‘Cogebanque ikabibafashamo’.
Cogebanque Plc imaze imyaka 20 itanga serivisi za banki mu Rwanda aho yahinduye ubuzima bw’abayigana binyuze mu kubafasha kubona no gukoresha serivisi zitandukanye z’imari.
Ni umuterankunga w’imena wa Tour du Rwanda 2020 ndetse ihemba umukinnyi uzamuka cyane kurusha abandi muri buri gace. Ni igihembo cyerekana ubwiza bw’u Rwanda nk’igihugu cy’imisozi igihumbi n’iyi banki nk’itanga serivisi mpuzamahanga.
Cogebanque ifite konti zitandukanye zo kwizigamira! Zirimo Konti Teganya igufasha kuzigama buri kwezi, wabitsaho igihe icyo aricyo cyose ndetse n’amafaranga uko yaba angana kose; Konti Nteganyiriza Minuze igufasha kuzigamira amashuri y’abana; Konti Iyubakire igufasha kwizigamira inzu; Konti Shobora igufasha kugera ku mushinga wawe n’ubwizigame bw’igihe kirekire (Term deposit).
Konti za Cogebanque zemerewe abakiliya bose, zihuriye ku kubafasha kuzigama amafaranga mu buryo bworoshye kandi butekanye, nta mufuragiro w’ukwezi zicibwa ndetse zirungukirwa mu buryo bushimishije.
Teganya ni konti ishamikiye ku y’umukiliya, ishobora kubitswaho amafaranga ayo ariyo yose. Uyikoresha abitsaho igihe cyose kandi agakomeza kungukirwa bitewe n’amafaranga ayiriho. Amafaranga yazigamywe atangira kubyara inyungu iyo angana na 50.001 Frw.
Mu gufasha abategura ahazaza h’abana babo mu masomo, Cogebanque yanashyizeho Konti Nteganyiriza Minuze ifasha abazigamira amashuri y’abana.
Abayikoresha buri kwezi bazigama amafaranga ndetse bashobora kongera umubare w’ubwizigame igihe babishakiye, bibaha amahirwe yo kubona inyungu ihanitse.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

Title: Ibicuruzwa by’umwimerere: Isezerano ku bazitabira Expo y’ibyakorewe muri Oman rigiye kubera i Kigali
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Convention Centre nibwo imurikagurisha ry’abanya-Oman ritangira, ahitezwe kumurikirwa ibikoresho bitandukanye bikunzwe n’abatari bake ku isi kubera ubwiza n’umwihariko wo kuramba bizwiho.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Convention Centre nibwo imurikagurisha ry’abanya-Oman ritangira, ahitezwe kumurikirwa ibikoresho bitandukanye bikunzwe n’abatari bake ku isi kubera ubwiza n’umwihariko wo kuramba bizwiho.
Iri murikagurisha riri butangire kuri uyu wa 29 rikazasozwa ku wa 3 Werurwe 2020, rizitabirwa n’abacuruzi n’abashoramari basaga 80 baturutse muri Oman, aho biteguye kumurika ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi nk’amatiyo ya pulasitiki n’ay’ibyuma, insinga z’amashanyarazi n’iza fibre optique, sima n’ibindi byinshi.
Hazaba hari kandi n’ibikoreshwa mu buhinzi nk’amafumbire; ibikoresho byo mu rugo nk’ameza n’utubati; imitako y’ubukorikori; ibikomoka kuri peterori; ubuvuzi n’imiti y’ubwoko butandukanye; ibiribwa nk’amafi, amavuta, ikawa; ibikoresho bikozwe mu byuma, ubutare; imibavu n’ibindi bihuriye ku mwimerere w’ibikomoka muri Oman.
Hazaba hari kandi ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, serivisi za leta, uburezi, n’itangazamakuru biri mu mwihariko uzanywe n’iri murikagurisha.
Iri murikabigurisha ryiswe OPEX ryateguwe n’ikigo cyo muri Oman gishinzwe ishoramari no guteza imbere ibyoherezwa mu mahanga (Ithraa) n’urwego rushinzwe ubucuruzi n’inganda, Madayn.
Abategura iri murikagurisha bavuga ko ari uburyo bwiza bwo guhaha ku biciro byiza ndetse no ku bacuruzi bifuza kurangura ibicuruza bifite umwihariko kandi bihendutse.
Umuyobozi wa Komite itegura iri murikagurisha, Ayman bin Abdullah Al Hasani yavuze ko ibikoresho n’ibicuruzwa byakorewe muri Oman byujuje ubuziranenge mpuzamahanga ari naho bahera bavuga ko ibicuruzwa byabo bizishimirwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nta gushidikanya dufite ku bwitabire bw’Abanyarwanda muri iri murikagurisha kuko ibyakorewe iwacu byizewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga, ibyo bikaba byarigaragaje mu mamurikagurisha yabereye muri Qatar, Arabie Saoudite no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu.”
Umuyobozi wa Ithraa, Maymuna al Adawi yavuze ko kuba ubukungu bw’u Rwanda bukomeje kuzamuka ubutitsa, bikwiriye kubera urugero ibindi bihugu bya Afurika.
Yavuze ko uko gutera imbere k’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda no kuba butajegajega ari byo bituma abashoramari mpuzamahanga bifuza kuza kuhashora imari.
Yagize ati “Mu gihe ibihugu bitandukanye byari bizwiho kohereza ibicuruzwa hanze biri kujegajega mu bukungu, u Rwanda rwo rukomeje kongera umusaruro rukura mu byoherezwa hanze.”
Oman imaze kuba igihugu cyigaruriye imitima y’abashoramari benshi bo hirya no hino ku isi kubera umutungo kamere wa peterori gifite n’iterambere ry’inganda by’umwihariko izikora ibyuma ryashinze imizi muri kiriya guhugu.
Iki gihugu gituranye na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, hafi na Dubai, kikaba kigizwe n’imisozi, ubutayu n’imirambi hafi y’inyanja. Abaturage bacyo basaga miliyoni 4.5, biganjemo abayisilamu.
Nibura umuturage umwe wa Oman abarirwa ko yinjiza amadolari asaga ibihumbi 15 buri mwaka, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 14 Frw.
Inkuru bijyanye: Ibyo wakwitega mu imurikagurisha ry’ibicuruzwa byo muri Oman rigiye gutangira i Kigali
